column1:
4部位それぞれで行う――
ということは、残るはあと2ヶ所
真意は分かりかねますが、我々は付き従うのみです
column2:
"Do this in each of the four sites"...
That means there are two sites still remaining.
We may not understand the intention behind this, but we tag along regardless.

A fort that was built about 600 years ago. 
After the Acre family defeated the local feudal lords, they strengthened it to fend off the Orcs and it has remained that way to this day. 
It had served its purpose for a long time, but was occupied by the Orc army shortly after the appearance of the "Evil Dragon."

大樹の意匠が彫られた壮麗なパネル状の鍵
かなり大きな扉の施錠に使われていたようだ
column2:
A magnificent panel-shaped key in which the design of the big tree was carved.
It seems that it was used to lock quite a large door.

It might be usable somewhere in this building.

column1:
<COL B6FF01>《蘇生》マスター！
さあ、お立ちください！</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《蘇生》主よ、あなたをお守りすると誓ったはず</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》 O Lord, I pledged to protect you.</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》今倒れるなんて、あたしが許さないわ！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》 I won't forgive you for collapsing now!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》自分がお助けします！　覚者さま――！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》I will help you! Lord Arisenー!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》覚者さまの命、俺が救いますぜ！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》, I will save the lives of the Arisen!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》覚者さまの命、私がお救いします！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》 I will save your life, o Arisen!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》覚者さま！　僕が助けます！　さあ！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》Revive, Lord Arisen!　I'll save you!　Come on!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《蘇生》覚者殿、貴方をお守りするのはこの私</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Resurrection》Revive, Master Arisen, it is I who will protect you.</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》あなたは地面を舐めていなさい！</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《重化》いつまで立っていられますかね？</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》 How long can you stand still?</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》この技で倒れさせる</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》 Let him fall down with this technique</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》これ以上立っていられると思うな！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》Don't think you can stand any longer!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》さっさと倒れた方が、いっそ楽だろうに！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》It would be easier to just fall down!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》て、敵の体勢を崩します！</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《重化》よしっ、ぼくがあいつの体勢を崩しますね！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》I'm going to break his posture!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》一気に体勢を崩してやります！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》, I will do it in one fell swoop!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》倒れる姿が、あなたにはお似合いよ！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》 The way you fall suits you!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》敵の体勢、打ち崩す――</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《重化》敵の体勢を崩してみせます！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》I will break the enemy's stance!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》早々に倒れさせてみせます！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》I'll make him fall as quickly as possible!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》見ててください、敵を倒れさせます！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》Watch me, I will make the enemy fall!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》覚者さま、いま倒れさせますから！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》I will make them fall down now, Master!</COL>

column1:
<COL B6FF01>《重化》調子づいてるやつから、
ぶっ飛ばしてやらぁ！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Heavy》I'm going to blast the crap out of anyone who's getting on my nerves!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《重化》足腰立たなくしてあげる</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《集中》ありったけの魔力をぶち込んでやらぁ！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》: I'll put all the magic I've got into it!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》あんなやつ、この魔力で！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》I'm going to use all my magic strength to destroy that thing!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》この魔力の高まり――すぐに見せてあげる！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》This heightened magical power--I'll show you right away!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》この魔法でお別れだよ！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》With this magic, I'm going to say goodbye!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》これより魔力を集める――</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>Concentrate, gather magic power from here――</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》さーて、いっちょう集中といきますかい</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《集中》ふふ、今ならすらすら詠唱できそう</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》I think I can chant easily now.</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》全力で集中し、詠唱します！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》 Concentrate all your energy and chant!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》大いなる力よ、我らに勝利を</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《集中》我が魔力よ、いまこそ力を！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》My magical power, now is the time to show your strength!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》精神統一により詠唱効率を高める</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>Concentration: Unifying the mind to improve chanting efficiency</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》詠唱に集中――いけます！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》Concentrate on chanting--I can do that!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》詠唱に集中します！</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《集中》詠唱に集中するので、邪魔なさらぬように</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》I'm going to concentrate on my chanting, so please don't get in my way.</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》集中すれば、もっと早く――！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》If you focus, you'll be able to do it faster--!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集中》魔力を最大限に高めます！</COL>

<COL B6FF01>《集視》いいでしょう、
しばらくはおとり役をこなしますよ</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I'll be your decoy for a while.</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》こ、こらー！　こっちだぞー！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Hey, over here! Come this way!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》ご安心を、私が前に出ます！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Rest assured, I will take the lead!</COL>
<COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I'm going to go out in front--!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》まとめて受けて立つ！　かかってこい！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I'll take it all!　Come and get me!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》よーし、ぼくが前に行きます！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Okay, I'll go to the front!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》今こそ、道を切り開く時！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Now is the time to blaze a trail!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》作戦として敵を引き付けよう</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>Use the 《Attraction》 strategy as a diversionary tactic</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》全員、俺の獲物だぁぁ！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》All of you are my prey!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》前に出るわ！　見ていてね、マスター！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I'll be in front of you!　Watch me, Master!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》前線への侵攻を開始</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Commence invasion of the front line</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》勇猛なる私の背を、しかとその目に！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I will make sure that you see my back, my back that is so valiant!</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》少しだけ、目立たせてもらうわね</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》I'm going to make you stand out a little bit.</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》死にたいやつからかかって来な</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Let the dying ones come to me.</COL>

column1: <COL B6FF01>《集視》覚者さま、私が敵を引き受けます！</COL>
column2: <COL B6FF01>《Attraction》Lord Arisen, I will take on the enemy!</COL>

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
《ガルドノック砦》の奥から続き、テゴル川の水を
堀へと引き込むための水廊。未だオークが根城とする
この場所に、侵食の影響を受けた個体が存在している
らしい。脅威が拡散する前に、芽を摘む必要がある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
Continuing from the depths of Gardnox Fortress, this water corridor is used to draw the water from the Tegor River into the moat. 
It seems that there are infected individuals affected by corruption still inhabiting this place, which the orcs still use as their stronghold. 
It is necessary to nip this threat in the bud before it spreads.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
テルの西に落下したアークの裏側から続く別階層
表側とは異なり、こちらには恐るべき危険性を
秘めた大型の錬魔も確認されたという。後に神殿を
攻める足がかりとして準備されていた可能性がある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>A door requiring a "Jewelry" key. </COL>
Another layer that continues from the back of
the ark that fell west of Tel.
This passage is far more dangerous than the
front. A strange odor is present here as well.
It's possible that this location was prepared as
a foothold in case of attack.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
バートランド平原の西側、山腹の高台にある牢を
兼ねた地下墓地。旧時代、大罪を犯した者が送られ
死してなお外界に出さぬよう秘密裏に葬られたという
近年調査が入るまで長く閉鎖されたままになっていた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
Located on the western side of the Bartland Plains, on a hillside, is an underground tomb that also serves as a prison. In ancient times, those who committed great sins were sent here and secretly buried to prevent them from returning to the outside world. It remained closed for a long time until recent investigations were carried out.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ森林から深部へ続く洞穴に埋もれていた古い
地下墓地。夜間、どこからともなく森に現れる不死者
達はこの墳墓から彷徨い出たものらしい。長く封じら
れていたため、あまり見ない魔物が潜む可能性が高い
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A hidden underground cemetery that was buried deep within the caves leading from the Mysree Forest. The undead that appear in the forest at night seem to have emerged from this tomb. Since it had been sealed for a long time, there is a high possibility that unseen enemies lurk within.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
深いディナンの森で新たに発見された森民の遺跡
鳥の鳴き声や羽ばたきが四方から響いている
内部はかなり複雑な構造になっているらしく、元は
エルテ・ディナンに次ぐ規模の居住区だったようだ
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A recently discovered forest dwelling of the forest people in the depths of Deenan.
The sounds of birds chirping and wings flapping echo from all directions.
The interior seems to have a quite complex structure, and it appears that it was once a residential area of considerable size, second only to Erte Dinan.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ深部、イニアス湖の南で新たに発見
された森民の遺跡。湖からくる湿気のせいか
白く靄がかかっている。靄は遺跡の外にまで
漏れ出し、全ての輪郭を朧にしている
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】Door</COL>
A newly discovered forest tribal ruin in the depths of Mysree, located south of Lake Inias.
Perhaps due to the moisture from the lake, a white mist hangs in the air, obscuring the outlines of everything, even leaking beyond the boundaries of the ruin.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
ブリア海岸傍の灯台下の井戸の中に入口が発見された
忘れられた古代の水路遺跡。長く閉鎖され未踏の地
であったため、独自の生態系を保持した環境と
なっているようだ
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
An entrance has been discovered within a well beneath the lighthouse near the Breya Coast. It is a forgotten ancient aqueduct relic that has long been closed off and unexplored. It appears to have maintained its own unique ecosystem.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《ボルド大坑道》の内部で発見された旧坑道
地熱の影響で坑内の気温が非常に高くなることが
あり、鉱員により早期に封鎖されていた
内部で希少な鉱石が採れるのではと推測されている
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Inside the "Volden Large Tunnels," an old tunnel was discovered.
Due to the influence of geothermal energy, the temperature inside the tunnel becomes extremely high,
and it was sealed off by miners early on.
It is speculated that rare minerals can be mined inside.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《南ザンドラ遺跡群》の一角にある旧時代の井戸
これまではその存在すら忘れられていたが
恐ろしい咆哮が奥から遺跡群一帯に響くようになった
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An ancient well in a corner of the "South Zandora Ruins".
Its existence had been forgotten until now, but a terrifying roar began to echo throughout the entire ruins.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
エラン水林西部にある自然洞窟
陽光の差し込む場所がいくつかあり、小さな虹が舞う
ような幻想的な光景が見られることがあるという
かつては周辺住人にも親しまれた場所であった
column2:
<COL ffdc78> 【Treasure】Door</COL>
A natural cave located in the western part of Elan Water Grove. 
There are several places where sunlight filters through, creating a fantastical scene with small rainbows dancing in the air. This place used to be beloved by the local residents.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
ザンドラ東部、《死者の丘》ふもとの崖から
近年発掘された旧時代の地下墓地
発見した墓荒らしによると、侵入直後に恐ろしい
までの悪寒に襲われ、命からがら逃げ出したという
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Located at the foot of the Hill of the Dead in Eastern Zandora.
A recently discovered underground tomb from ancient times. 
According to the grave robber who was found, they were attacked by a terrifying cold moment after entering and narrowly escaped with their lives.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>パーティーメンバーが死亡状態になりました
クリア時のボーナス報酬が下がります</COL>
column2: <COL ffdc78>Party member is now dead. Bonus reward for clearing will be lowered</COL>.

<COL ffdc78>敵との戦闘で一度も死亡状態になりませんでした
クリア時のボーナス報酬が多くなります</COL>
column2: <COL ffdc78>Never went into a death state in combat! More bonus rewards for clearing</COL>

column1:
<COL ffdc78>胞子の広がりを阻止――！
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加されます</COL>
column2: <COL ffdc78>Stopped the spread of spores! Additional bonus rewards for clearing the site</COL>

column1:

column2:
<COL ffdc78>Quick Rescue has failed!
Bonus Rewards are lost.</COL>

column2:
<COL ffdc78>Quick Rescue successful!
Bonus Rewards gained!</COL>

攻撃しないでください

探索したスポットの報酬や

探索に向かったポーンが

column1:
前方に猛ダッシュしつつ鋭い突き攻撃を放つ
突進距離に応じて威力が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で最大移動距離が延長／
突進距離最長時に敵のガード状態を崩す</COL>
column2:
Rushes at the target and visits a powerful blow
upon them. Damage increases the further you dash.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases maximum rush distance.
Breaks enemy guard when rushing at maximum range.</COL>

column1:
跳躍し、鋭い一撃を放って下方に突き立てる
落下距離により威力が上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Leap forward and stab your sword into the ground.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
盾による打撃特化の連続攻撃を繰り出す。敵を怯ませ
やすく、ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／
最大攻撃回数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Unleashes a barrage of strikes using the shield.
Easily staggers enemy. Can be used continously.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Motion changes.
Increases number of hits (3→5).</COL>

column1:
盾で前方ガードを固めつつ、連続突きを繰り出す
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で速度上昇／最大攻撃回数増加（５→８）</COL>
column2:
Unleashes a flurry of stabbing attacks while
maintaining the user's guard. Can be used continously.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases attack speed.
Increases maximum number of strikes (5→8).</COL>

column1:
足元から直上へ鋭く斬り上げ、
軽量の敵を上空へ打ち上げる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で速度上昇／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Traces a grand skyward arc with the blade,
sending lightweight foes into the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases attack speed and number of hits.</COL>

column1:
頭上に連続斬りを繰り出す
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で速度上昇／
最大攻撃回数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Looses a flurry of skyward slashes well-suited
to bringing flying foes to the ground.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases attack speed.
Increases maximum number of continous strikes (3→5).</COL>

column1:
円弧状に剣先を一回転させ、周囲の敵をなぎ払う
のけぞり中にも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Spins with blade extended, drawing a deadly
circle especially effective when surrounded.
Employable while under attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Motion changes. Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
後方に身を逸らし、すぐさま間合いを詰めて斬り払う
敵の攻撃を回避しつつ繰り出せば威力が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で受付時間延長／
回避成功時、攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Ducks backward afore charging in to deliver a slashing blow.
Using it as an evasive maneuver increases its power.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Extends evasion time.
When an attack is evaded, increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
素早く剣を突き、直後に引き抜く二段攻撃を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Delivers a quick stab and withdrawal slash
without distancing user and target, allowing
for further blows thereafter.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
高威力の剣舞を広範囲に繰り出す
初段を敵に接触させれば連撃に移行する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
A high-powered sword dance that covers a wide area.
If the first hit is successfully landed, it will become a full on
combo attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the number of hits in the attack, and changes
the motion of the skill.</COL>

column1:
盾を構えながら素早く踏み込む
<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>により特定方向に移動できる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に防御性能の上昇／スタミナ消費減少
LV.６で移動速度上昇／移動方向に左右追加</COL>
column2:
A quick forward lunge while guarding with a shield.
Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to dash in a specific direction.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina cost to block.
LV.6: Able to dash left and right. Increases speed.</COL>

column1:
攻撃を受け流しつつ剣で斬り抜ける。<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>により
後方への斬り抜けも可能。攻撃を受ける瞬間の発動で威力上昇
攻撃アクション中であればいつでも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大／受付時間延長</COL>
column2:
Hold your shield in wait, deflecting and seamlessly
countering enemy attacks. Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to move
forward or back. Perfect blocks deal more damage.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases range. Increases counter duration.</COL>

column1:
しがみついた状態から、力を溜めこみ豪快に切り払う
溜め中は敵の揺さぶりにも耐え、
ボタンの連打で威力が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／必要入力回数減少</COL>
column2:
While climbing an enemy, channel power into
a tremendous blow. While charging, you resist being shaken off
the enemy. The power of the attack rises with consecutive button
presses.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increase the number of hits in the attack, and decrease
amount of button presses needed for a full charge.</COL>

column1:
敵の攻撃の反動を利用し、斬りつけながら跳ね上がる
跳躍後、ボタンの追加入力で派生斬りを発動
攻撃アクション中であればいつでも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で跳び上がる高度上昇／派生斬りの攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Utilize an enemy attack to launch yourself, slashing upwards.
After ascending, invert the direction of the slash with an additional button press.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increase altitude of the launch, and number of hits of the inverted
slash.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
攻撃ヒット数が増加
チャンス攻力と疲労攻力がやや増加
<COL ff7878>人間／竜族／錬金系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Increase number of hits.
Slightly increase Chance attack and Fatigue attack.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage to
Human/Dragonkin/Alchemized type enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
前方への攻撃範囲が大幅に拡張
吹き飛ばし力が増加
ダメージ量がやや増加
チャンス攻力と疲労攻力がやや増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Extend the range of the attack.
Increase blow power.
Slightly increase damage.
Slightly increase chance attack and fatigue attack.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
吹き飛ばし力が増加
気絶攻力が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Increase blow force.
Increase knockout power.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量がやや増加
チャンス攻力と疲労攻力が増加
攻撃範囲がやや拡張
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Slightly increase damage.
Increase chance attack and exhaust attack.
Slightly extend attack range

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
引き抜きの攻撃ヒット数が増加
ジャンプの飛距離が延長
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase number of hits when pulling your sword out.
Increase leaping distance.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
空中で発動可能になる
吹き飛ばし力が増加
攻撃対象に密着した状態で空中で発動すると
対象を蹴ってより高くジャンプする
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Possible to activate in the air.
Increase blow force.
If activated near enemies, use them as steeping stones
and jump higher.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
攻撃回数が増す度に剣を振る速度が上昇
最大攻撃回数増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Increase attack speed as the number of attack increases.
Increase maximum number of attacks.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
攻撃範囲が大幅に拡張
吹き飛ばし力増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Greatly extend attack range.
Increase blow power.

column1:
敵を追従する猛ダッシュの斬りつけ攻撃を放つ
初撃が当たると連続で斬り返しを放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で移動距離が延長／
斬り返し回数増加（１→３）</COL>
column2:
Dashes past the target with blades extended, delivering
slashes that can be followed with further attacks on contact.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases moving distance.
Increases number of further attacks (1→3).</COL>

column1:
一歩踏み込み、敵を上空へ斬り上げる
ボタンの追加入力で追撃する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Steps in with a blade strike that sends
the target aloft. Additional button presses
throw and detonate a store of powder.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
シーカーロープを投げて敵を捉え、
手前に引き寄せる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に引き寄せる力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡張/捕捉敵数増加（１→３）</COL>
column2:
Casts out your seeker rope to snare lightweight foes,
pulling them to the ground to incapacitate them.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the force of the pull.
LV.6: Increase range of the effect.
Increases total enemies affected (1→3).</COL>

column1:
前方に飛び蹴りを繰り出し、敵を踏み台にして
上空へ跳び上がる
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にジャンプ力上昇
LV.６で敵のガード状態を崩すことが可能</COL>
column2:
Leaps forward in a flying kick, then uses the
target as a foothold to jump still higher.
Can be activated in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases force of the jump.
LV.6: Breaks enemy guard.</COL>

column1:
瞬時に身を引き、すぐさま前方に蹴りを放つ
敵の攻撃を回避しつつ繰り出せば威力が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Pulls back momentarily afore unleashing a
frontal kick. Using it as an evasive
maneuver increases its power.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Motion changes. Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
自身を通常の構え姿勢に戻し、様々な動作の
スキを消すことができる（連続では行えない）
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に再発禁止時間が短縮
LV.６で拘束中を除きいつでも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Returns the user to a neutral stance, eliminating
openings caused by other actions. Cannot be performed
continously. Can be activated in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Reduces the restriction time between uses.
LV.6: Can be used anytime, except when restrained.</COL>

column1:
地面に火薬を設置し、
遠方から導火線に着火して爆発させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇／仕込み時間短縮
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／爆風に風圧追加</COL>
column2:
Places an explosive on the ground to
be detonated from afar.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. Decreases charge time.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.
Adds wind pressure to the blast.</COL>

column1:
自身の体に炎をまとい触れた敵にダメージを与える
さらに武器の攻撃属性を炎にする
ただし、発動中は自身の体力が徐々に減少する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に炎属性威力の上昇／体力減少速度軽減
LV.６で最大持続時間が延長</COL>
column2:
Sets your body ablaze, inflicting damage to enemies
you touch and adds Fire attribute to your attacks.
However, your health will gradually drain during use.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. Decreases health drain.
LV.6: Increases duration of the effect.</COL>

column1:
敵の攻撃を受け流し、瞬時に背後に回り込んで
致命の一撃を与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／受付時間延長／
攻撃アクション中であればいつでも発動可能</COL>
column2:
If used to correctly parry an enemy's attack,
instantly climb behind them, and deliver a lethal blow in response.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases number of hits in the counter.
LV.6: Extends counter window duration and can be activated anytime
during attacks.</COL>

column1:
空中からシーカーロープを放って地面にひっかけ、
地上へ急降下攻撃を繰り出す。空中でも発動可能
高所から行うことで威力が上昇し気絶させやすくなる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で周囲の敵をのけぞらせることが可能</COL>
column2:
Hook the ground with your seeker rope, performing
a dive attack towards the ground. A high altitude
will increase the power. Can be activated in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Inflicts stagger on surrounding enemies.</COL>

column1:
ダガーを高速回転させ、敵を巻き込み斬りつける
<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で任意方向に移動できる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で移動距離が延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Rotate your daggers at high speed, slashing nearby
enemies. Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to move while rotating.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases movement distance.
Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
シーカーロープを放って敵を捕らえ、反動を利用して
気絶を誘うスライディング攻撃を繰り出す
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で移動距離が延長</COL>
column2:
Grapple the enemy with your seeker rope, staggering
them and sliding through with a sharp attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases movement distance.</COL>

column1:
自身の周囲に火薬を撒き、
ダガーで弾いて爆発を起こす
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Sprinkle gunpowder all around and strike the daggers together,
causing an explosion.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the number of hits.</COL>

column1:
シーカーロープを放って敵を捕らえ、反動を利用して
激しく斬りこみながら距離を詰める
ボタン追加入力で追撃を繰り出す。空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Throw the Seeker Rope to snag an enemy, using
the recoil to propel yourself towards them, and deliver deadly
slashes all along the way.
Additional button presses will chain the chase.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the number of hits.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
<COL ff7878>獣／有翼／侵食系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage to Beast/Winged/Infected enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
空中使用回数が増加（１→２）
吹き飛ばし力がやや増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase the number of possible executions in air (1→2).

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
気絶攻力が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.     
Increase knockout power.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
空中で使用可能になる
チャンス攻力が増加
疲労攻力が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Possible to activate in the air.    
Increase chance attack.
Increase fatigue power.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
空中発動時１度だけモーションが変化しダメージが追加
攻撃スキルを敵に接触させる／着地／しがみつきにより
カスタムスキルＥＸ追加効果を空中で再度発動可能
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Change motion only once when activate in the air and add damage.
This EX effect can be activated again in the air if you attack/climb/land.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
発動時と跳び上がり時に敵の攻撃をすり抜ける
空中発動時に短剣による攻撃が追加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Add invulnerability time when activated and jumping.
Add dagger attack when in the air.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
モーションが変化し、短剣による攻撃回数が増加
爆発の攻撃ヒット数が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Change motion, increase number of dagger attacks.
Increase number of explosion hits.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
斬り上げと爆発の攻撃範囲が拡張
爆発に炎防低下の状態異常が付与され
延焼の状態異常蓄積値も増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase range of dagger slash and explosion.
Add Fire Resist Down accumulation to explosion hits.
Increase Burn accumulation.

column1:
複数の矢を連続で放ち
敵を大きくのけぞらせる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で矢の発射数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Fire multiple arrows in quick succession.
Staggers large enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>

column1:
複数の矢を同時に扇状に放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で矢の発射数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Fires three arrows in a wedge pattern.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>

column1:
敵のガードを崩す爆音火薬を巻いた矢を放つ
爆音に巻き込むことで周囲の敵をも怯ませる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Fires an arrow that produces a deafening
blare on impact, breaking enemy guard.
Will also launch nearby enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases blow power.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
渾身の力で弓を引き、高威力の矢を放つ
溜め満了の瞬間に矢を放つと威力が
大幅に上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め段階拡張（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Draws the bow with all the user's might,
then looses a shot straight ahead.
Power greatly increases if released as
maximum charge is reached.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases total charge stages (1→2).</COL>

column1:
矢筒内のすべての矢を直上に放ち、
敵の頭上に降らせる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Sends a wall of arrows skyward to
rain down on a broad area.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
貫通力のある矢を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で貫通時のヒット間隔が短縮し
連続ヒットしやすくなる</COL>
column2:
Fires a shot capable of piercing multiple targets.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Shortens the interval between hits,
increasing the likelihood of hitting more times.</COL>

column1:
着弾時に回転し多段攻撃を加える矢を放つ
特に状態異常矢の使用時に効果的
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Looses a spinning arrow that delivers a
barrage of hits to an area.
Especially effective with status arrows.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
装填中のすべての矢に気絶効果のある火薬を
巻きつけ強化する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Applies an explosive stun effect to all
arrows loaded. Increases damage inflicted.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
火薬を巻きつけた複数の矢を、
渾身の力で空に放ち、敵の頭上に降らせる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で矢の発射数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Coat multiple arrows in gunpowder and send them
skyward to rain down on a broad area.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>

column1:
ボタンの連打で射撃回数が増加する
また、射撃回数が増えるにつれ
敵を怯ませやすくなる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃速度上昇</COL>
column2:
Continously shoot multiple arrows as you press
the button. As you shoot more arrows, it becomes
easier to stagger enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases attack speed.</COL>

column1:
素早く後方に移動する
敵との間合いを素早く離す
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費減少／発動中の耐久力上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／すり抜け時間延長</COL>
column2:
Quickly dodges backwards, creating distance
between you and your enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina cost.
Increases Endurance during usage.
LV.6: Motion changes. Increases invulnerability time.</COL>

column1:
絶大な威力の矢を放つ。溜め満了の瞬間に放つと
威力が大幅に上昇し、残り体力が低い敵ほど
効果が高い
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め時間短縮</COL>
column2:
Draw the bow back with all your might and loose an arrow
of extraordinary power. Further increase damage if fired
just as the charge is completed. The lower the enemy's
health, the higher the damage of this skill.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Decreases charge time.</COL>

column1:
連鎖的に爆発する火薬を巻きつけた矢を
上空に放つ
射撃時にボタン長押しで起爆高度が上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で爆発回数増加</COL>
column2:
Loose an arrow wrapped with explosive powder into
the sky. Detonation altitude rises the longer the button is
held while firing.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the number of explosions.</COL>

column1:
敵に密着し、複数の矢を番えて渾身の力で放つ
しがみつき状態からでも可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め段階上昇（２→３）
ボタン入力回数減少</COL>
column2:
Tightly bind together all the arrows in the quiver, and
unleash them with your entire body's might.
Can be activated while climbing an enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum charge (2→3) and reduces number of
button presses needed to advance to the next level of charge.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
発射数が増加（５→６）
連なり射ち 剛に付与した紅蓮爆矢の攻撃威力が上昇
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase the number of arrows shot (5→6).
Further increase the damage and blow power when
using in conjuction with Crimson Arrow.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
構え中の移動速度が上昇
最適距離の範囲が拡張
射程距離が延長
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase moving speed during bow stance.
Extend the optimal shooting range.
Extend the shooting range.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
状態異常値が増加
<COL ff7878>獣／有翼／侵食系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Increase debilitation rate.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage to Beast/Winged/Infected enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
チャンス攻力と疲労攻力が増加
気絶攻力が増加
<COL ff7878>戦甲を攻撃時、ダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase chance attack and exhaust power.
Increase knockout power.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage against War-Ready enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
溜め段階２の攻撃ヒット数が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase number of hits on second charge.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
構え中の移動速度が上昇
最適距離の範囲が拡張
射程距離が延長
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase moving speed during bow stance.
Extend the optimal shooting range.
Extend the shooting range.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
溜め時間短縮
起爆時の爆発ダメージ量が増加
溜め２段階で、中央の爆発の攻撃ヒット数が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Reduce charge time.
Increase explosion damage.
Increase number of hits at the center on second charge.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
溜め時間短縮
爆薬矢に継続ダメージを付与
攻撃により起爆しなくなり
時間による起爆時の威力が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Reduce charge time.
Arrows deal continuous damage.
Arrows cannot be detonated by attack.

column1:
急速に体力を回復させる魔法エリアを発現させる
（最大回復量は治癒上限値）（対不死には攻撃）
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に設置持続時間が延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Creates a magick area that rapidly regenerates health.
(Maximum healing limited to grey health)
(Inflicts damage to undead)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
一部の状態異常を瞬時に治療する魔法エリアを
発現させる（対不死には攻撃）
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に設置持続時間が延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Creates a magick area that instantly
cures debilitations.
(Inflicts damage to undead)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、杖を振って追尾性能を持つ
聖属性の魔法球を複数放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で魔法球増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
After charging, launch tracking projectiles.
Fires magick spheres of Holy attribute.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of magick spheres (3→5).</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、広範囲に向けて
聖属性の強い光を放射する魔球を展開する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
After charging, fire a magick sphere that emits
an intense light of the Holy attribute in a wide area.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に物理攻撃力と魔法攻撃力を
一時的に強化する魔法エリアを展開する
フィールドシフトに対応
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に離脱後の効果持続時間延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Emits an aura of Attack and Magick power.
Applies a temporary increase to nearby allies.
Can be used with Field Shift.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration after leaving the aura.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に物理防御力と魔法防御力を
一時的に強化する魔法エリアを展開する
フィールドシフトに対応
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に離脱後の効果持続時間延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Emits an aura of Attack and Magick defense.
Applies a temporary increase to nearby allies.
Can be used with Field Shift.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration after leaving the aura.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に高速に旋回する魔球を生成
受けた攻撃を魔球の数だけ無効化する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に持続時間延長
LV.６で魔球数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Generates magick spheres that revolve
around oneself. The spheres will each
nullify one attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases number of magick spheres (3→5).</COL>

column1:
精神を集中し、自身を中心に味方の技発動時間を
大幅に短縮する祈りを捧げる
ゲージが表示される全ての溜め行動、詠唱が対象
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に展開中のスタミナ消費減少
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Focus a prayer on nearby allies, hastening the
charging of all their skills that display a charge gauge.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases stamina consumption of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the range of effect.</COL>

column1:
急速にスタミナを回復させる魔法エリアを
発現させる（対不死には攻撃）
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に設置持続時間が延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Creates a magick area that rapidly regenerates Stamina.
(Inflicts damage to undead)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に聖属性の巨大な魔法エリアを展開し
侵入してきた敵に攻撃を与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Creates a wide magick area of the Holy attribute
centered on yourself, dealing damage to enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
自身の体に魔力を溜め込み、体力が尽きると同時に
大爆発を起こし、周囲の敵に大ダメージを与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に発動中のスタミナ消費減少
LV.６で攻撃威力の上昇／攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Charge magick within your body. When your health is
exhausted, create a wide explosion dealing
large damage to enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption.
LV.6: Increases the damage and range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に、耐久力を
一時的に強化する魔法エリアを展開する
フィールドシフトに対応
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に離脱後の効果持続時間延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Emits an aura of Endurance.
Applies a temporary increase to nearby allies.
Can be used with Field Shift.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration after leaving the aura.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に、生命治癒力を
一時的に上昇させる魔法エリアを展開する
フィールドシフトに対応
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に離脱後の効果持続時間延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Release a magickal aura around yourself that increases
healing power for nearby allies.
Can be used with Field Shift.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends duration of effect after Field Shifting.
LV.6: Increases the range of effect.</COL>

column1:
自身がブラストビットで放った魔法球と
同数の魔法球を放つ砲台を一定時間生成する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔法砲台の出現時間延長
LV.６で魔法球の威力上昇／魔法砲台増加（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Call forth a magickal orb that acts as a turret and when hit
by Blast Bit, will generate additional Blast Bits from itself.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the magickal orb.
LV.6: Increases the damage of the magickal orb, and the amount
that are placed (1→2).</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
魔法エリア内にいる味方の
治癒上限値を徐々に回復する
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Gradually recover the healable limit of allies within the area.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
敵にダメージを与えた時、体力が回復する効果を付与
離脱後の効果時間大幅延長
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Recover health when attacking enemies.
Duration of effect after Field Shift is greatly increased.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
魔法球増加（５→７）
ダメージ量と吹き飛ばし力が増加
チャンス攻力と疲労攻力が増加
<COL ff7878>骸骨／腐死／呪詛／霊体系の敵へのダメージ量増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase the number of magick spheres (5→7).
Increase damage and blow force.
Increase chance attack and exhaust attack.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage against Skeleton/Undead/Cursed/Spirit enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
魔法球の発現時間が延長
体力回復とシークレットコア発現が
可能な魔法球を発射
<COL ff7878>戦甲を攻撃時、ダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Extend duration of magick spheres.
Magick spheres can recover health and reveal secret core.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage against War-Ready enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
魔法エリアに入ると一定時間
キュアスポットの効果が付与される
同時に展開できる魔法エリア数が増加（１→２）
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
When enter the magick area, the curing effect
lingers for an amount of time.
Increase the number of magick spots you can deploy (1→2).

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
石化／黄金化／侵食を死亡確定前であれば治療可能になる
ステータスダウン系の状態異常を治療可能になる
詠唱時間を短縮
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Can cure Petrification/Gilded/Infected before death occurs.
Can cure Status Reduction debilitations.
Reduce cast time.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
フィールドシフト時、
１度だけ攻撃を無効化する魔球を付与
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
When Field Shifting, grant each ally one magick sphere that
nullifies one attack.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
風圧と地震を無効にする
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Nullify Wind Pressure and Tremor.

column1:
大盾に一定時間、敵の攻撃を防いだ瞬間に
衝撃波を放つ効果を付与する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間延長
LV.６で攻撃威力の上昇</COL>
column2:
For a period of time, when an attack is blocked,
a shockwave will be emitted.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases damage.</COL>

column1:
大盾に広範囲を防御できる魔法の壁を付加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間延長
LV.６で防御範囲が全方位化</COL>
column2:
Create walls of magick that increase the range
of your shield's ability to block.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Makes the effect protect all of your sides.</COL>

column1:
ロッドの放射光を敵に照らしつづけることで
敵に遅延の状態異常値を蓄積させる
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に遅延の異常値上昇
LV.６で照射範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Channel a light from your rod towards the enemy.
Slowly accumulates the Torpor debilitation over time.
With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of Torpor accumulation.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
ロッドの放射光を敵に照らしつづけることで
敵に睡眠の状態異常値を蓄積させる
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に睡眠の異常値上昇
LV.６で照射範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Channel a light from your rod towards the enemy.
Slowly accumulates the Sleep debilitation over time.
With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of Sleep accumulation.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
大盾を構え前方に突進し、進行線上の敵を吹き飛ばす
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で移動距離上昇／ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Rush forward with your greatshield, blowing away enemies.
With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases moving distance and number of hits.</COL>

column1:
地を揺らし、広範囲の敵をよろめかせる
大型の敵や一部の強敵には無効
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して詠唱時間短縮
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に詠唱時間短縮
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Shake the earth, staggering enemies in a
wide range. Staggers large enemies and
some formidable foes.
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して詠唱時間短縮
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Shortens casting time.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
属性ダメージと異常値の軽減効果を味方に付与する
（ロッドに付与した炎・氷・雷・聖・闇のいずれか）
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して時間大幅延長
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に持続時間延長／軽減値上昇
LV.６で効果範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Decreases attribute damage taken and debilitation build-up
for nearby allies (determined by element granted to rod).
With more than 1 Force Gauge, the duration will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration and power of the effect.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔法のアンカーを射出し、敵を一定時間拘束する
大型の敵や一部の強敵には、物攻低下・魔攻低下・
物防低下・魔防低下の状態異常値を蓄積させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に拘束中スタミナ消費減少／状態異常値上昇
LV.６で射程距離延長</COL>
column2:
Use magick to create an anchor, binding the enemy.
Inflicts ATK Down, MATK Down, and slowly builds
DEF Down, MDEF Down to large and some formidable enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decrease Stamina cost. Increase Debilitation rate.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
法力で守護された空間を発現し、
空間内にいる味方へのダメージを無効化する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に詠唱時間短縮
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Guard an area around you,
nullifying damage for all allies nearby.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Shortens casting time.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
属性防御の低下異常値を敵に蓄積させる放射光を放つ
（ロッドに付与した炎・氷・雷・聖・闇のいずれか）

<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に選択中属性の異常値上昇
LV.６で照射範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Channel a light from your rod towards the enemy.
Slowly accumulates a debilitation that decreases attribute
defense of enemies (determined by element granted to rod).
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of debilitation accumulation.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
大盾で敵の攻撃を弾き返し、敵に気絶の
状態異常値を蓄積させる衝撃を与える
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で受付時間延長</COL>
column2:
Deflect enemy attacks with your greatshield, stunning them.
The impact will accumulate debilitations on enemies.
With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the duration of the counter stance.</COL>

column1:
魔法のアンカーを射出し、捕らえた敵から攻力を
吸収することでフォースゲージを溜める
ヒット中、<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で任意方向へ移動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にヒット中のスタミナ消費減少
LV.６で射程距離延長</COL>
column2:
Fire a magickal anchor towards a foe, and gradually
fill the force gauge and aggression meter if it hits.
While the anchor is active, you can move in any direction
with <PADM>the left stick.<KEYM>the movement keys.</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases stamina consumption for each additional
hit while the anchor is active.
LV.6: Increases range of the skill.</COL>

column1:
周囲の敵を巻きこみながら大盾を振り払う
敵の攻撃を防ぎながら発動で威力が上昇

<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で盾ガード値上昇／ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Shake the Greatshield about while running around enemies,
preventing their attacks and increasing aggression.
When the Force Gauge has one or more charges, they will be
automatically consumed to increase the skill's performance.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases Guard Power and number of hits.</COL>

column1:
ロッドの放射光を敵に照らしつづけることで
敵に石化の状態異常値を蓄積させる
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に石化の異常値上昇
LV.６で照射範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Keep the rod focused on an enemy, and radiate a light that

When the Force Gauge has one or more charges, they will be
automatically consumed to increase the skill's performance.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Petrified status accumulation.
LV.6: Increases the range of the light.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
岩石を吹き飛ばし、ダメージを与える
<COL ff7878>戦甲を攻撃時、ダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Blow off the rocks from earth and deal damage to enemies.
Increase damage agaisnt War-ready enemies.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
周囲の敵の注目を素早く集める
エンチャントが付与されている際は
エンチャント属性の状態異常を発生させることも可能
column2:

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
詠唱速度が上昇

column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase casting speed.
Increase damage.
Possible to block guard-break attacks.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
発動中は攻力吸収量が増加
敵を引き付けて攻撃を防御するとスタミナが回復
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase Force Gauge gained by blocking.
Restore stamina when blocking attacks

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量と気絶攻力が増加
フォースゲージ消費時に威力が上昇／ヒット数増加

column2:

Increase damage and knockout power.

<COL ff7878> Further increase damage against Construct/Demon/War-Ready type enemies.</COL>

column1:

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
詠唱時間短縮
展開中に魔法の壁を解放して聖属性の攻撃が可能
敵の攻撃を防ぐと魔法の壁のエネルギーが蓄積し

column2:

Reduce charge time.

increasing damage.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
展開中、物理防御力／魔法防御力／耐久力が増加
column2:

Increase Physical/Magick defense and Endurance.

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、
広範囲に向けてブレス状の炎を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で動作終了間際に追加入力することで
往復攻撃可能</COL>
column2:
After charging magick,
release a breath-like flame in front of you.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Press the button right before the end
to repeat the spell.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、
高い炎の壁を作り出す
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇

column2:
After charging magick,
generate a towering wall of flame.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、

column2:
After charging magick, call meteors down from

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、
敵の足元から巨大な氷の塊を出現させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇

column2:
After charging magick,
generate a giant spire of ice at the enemy's feet.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Adds an additional attack at the start

column1:
自身を中心に、一定範囲をカバーする
雷属性の魔法を放つ

column2:
Emit lightning in a range outwards from you.

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、大杖を振りかざして

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、闇の霧を発生させる

column2:
After charging magick, generate a dark fog.
The fog will cling to enemies, dealing damage over time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases duration of the effect.

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、地を揺らし岩塊を隆起させ、

LV.6: Increases number of rocks (1→2).</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、敵の頭上に落雷を発生させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇

column2:
After charging magick, smite the enemy

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of lightning strikes (3→5).</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、氷の槍を発現させ前方に放つ
氷・射属性によるダメージを与える

column2:
After charging magick, conjure a twisting spike

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、上空に濃い闇の霧を発生させる

<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, conjure a dense
dark fog overhead that deals continous
damage to enemies within.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めて凝縮し、無属性の魔球を発現させる
周囲に魔力を解放し大ダメージを与える
爆発範囲は調節可能で、狭いほど高威力
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で爆発範囲の限界幅が拡張</COL>

After charging magick, conjure a non-elemental magick orb.
The magickal power stored within the orb is released over

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Expands the range of the explosion.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、氷の矢を放つ氷塊を発現させ、

column2:
After charging magick, conjure a giant snowflake

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.

column1:
魔力を溜めて雷を引き寄せる魔法杭を発現させ、
