<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費量の減少
LV.６で攻撃威力上昇／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Conjure a magickal stake that gathers magickal power from
your staff, and calls down lightning when charged.    
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases stamina cost of skill.
LV.6: Increases damage of the skill and number of hits.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
闇の霧の中心部分のダメージ量が増加
<COL ff7878>亜人／鬼人／巨人の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage to enemies at the center of the mist.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage to Giant/Ogre/Demihuman enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
毒／睡眠の状態異常を付与
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Accumulate poison/sleep status effects.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
攻撃ヒット数が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Increase number of hits

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
空中詠唱可能
のけぞり、吹き飛び中でも発動可能
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Possible to cast in the air or 
when being knocked back.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
中央に巨大な爆炎が追加で発生
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Create a huge explosion at the center.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
攻撃範囲の高度が拡張
延焼エリアに吹き飛ばし力が追加され
展開時間が延長される
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase the altitude range of the attack.
Add blow power to the lingering hits.
Increase duration of the skill.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
攻撃ヒット数が増加
凍結の状態異常蓄積値が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase number of hits.
Increase Freeze accumulation.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
氷の塊消滅後、氷粒の渦を展開
氷防低下の状態異常を付与
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Leave an icy vortex after the ice pillar disappears.
Add Ice Resist Down accumulation.

column1:
大剣を突き刺し、勢いよく斬り上げる
敵を高く打ち上げることが可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Stabs foes then fiercely slashes upward.
Can send foes flying high into the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Motion changes. Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
前方に踏み込みながら剣の柄を打ち込む
敵を怯ませやすく、怒り状態の敵のスタミナも
減らしやすい
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でスタミナ消費減少／攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Lunges in while driving the hilt of the blade into
the target. Though limited in range it easily stuns
foes and reduces the Stamina of enraged enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Reduces Stamina cost. Increases range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
大剣の切っ先を前方に構え、
敵を押しこみながら突進する
<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で任意方向へ移動できる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で移動距離が延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Charges forward with the blade extended,
knocking down any caught in its path.
Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to control the direction.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases movement distance. Increases
number of hits.</COL>

column1:
後方へ避けつつ攻撃を繰り出す
とっさの回避手段としても有効
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／追加入力で追加攻撃
敵の攻撃を直前回避時、追加攻撃の威力上昇</COL>
column2:
Steps backward in a swift evasive maneuver
while delivering a slashing blow.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Motion changes with an additional attack.
Adds an additional input.</COL>

column1:
素早く大剣を回転させ、
自身の全周囲になぎ払い攻撃を繰り出す
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Spins the blade in a swift circle,
slashing at foes all around the user.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
力を溜め、刀身で敵を叩きつける
敵を気絶させやすい
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め段階拡張（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Build up strength before striking enemies with the side
of your blade. Has high stunning power. Release the attack
as the charge finishes to increase power significantly.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases total charge stages (1→2).</COL>

column1:
大剣を構えて待機、敵の攻撃を弾き返した後、
連続動作で反撃する
敵の攻撃を弾き返したときのみ、連続行動を行う
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／受付時間延長</COL>
column2:
Hold the blade in wait. Upon deflecting an
enemy's attack, the user will unleash a series of blows.
Only a successful counter will perform multiple blows.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits. Increases counter duration.</COL>

column1:
上空に対して鋭い突きを繰り出す
空中の敵などに有効
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Thrust your blade with great force into the air.
Especially effective against aerial enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.
Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
力を十分に溜めた後、渾身の一撃を繰り出す
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で剣に風圧が追加／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
After channeling enough energy, release
a devastating slash with your body's entire might.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Adds wind pressure to the blade and increases number
of hits.</COL>

column1:
大剣を左右交互に振り下ろし、連続して敵を斬り刻む
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で最大攻撃回数増加（７→１１）</COL>
column2:
Swing your blade in fierce downward motions left and right,
repeatedly cutting into foes in succession. Continuously
pressing the skill button increases the number of attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the maximum number of attacks (7→11).</COL>

column1:
一歩踏み込み、敵の攻撃を受けとめる。様々な動作
から発動することができる（連続では行えない）
攻撃を受けとめるとリベンジゲージが大きく増加
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にリベンジゲージ蓄積値上昇
LV.６でのけぞり、吹き飛び中でも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Step inward to receive an enemy's attack.
Can be used out of many different actions. Upon successfully 
receiving an attack, the revenge gauge will fill greatly.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases revenge gauge accumulation.
LV.6: Can be used even during stagger and knockback.</COL>

column1:
高く跳躍し、一点集中で力強く大剣を突き立てる
攻撃範囲は狭いが威力は絶大
落下距離により威力が上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Jump high upward, viciously thrusting the blade at
a concentrated point with great force. The attack's
range is very narrow, but it carries tremendous power.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
しがみついた状態から大剣で揺さぶりながら抉る
ボタンの連打で揺さぶり回数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で一定回数揺さぶると攻撃速度が上昇し
引き抜き時の攻撃ヒット数が増加する</COL>
column2:
While climbing an enemy, thrust the blade
deep into them and vigorously shake it around.
The number of shakes increases with repeated button presses.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum number of shakes.</COL>

column1:
渾身の力で大剣を地面に突き刺し、大地を揺るがす
地上ではボタンの長押し、空中では発動時の落下距離
により威力が上昇。倒れた状態の敵に対し真価を発揮
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め段階上昇（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Slam the blade into the ground with the entire
body's might and shake the earth. Performing the skill
from high altitudes while in the air, or holding the
assigned button on the ground increases the damage of the skill.
Especially effective against downed enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum charge amount (1→2)</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
リベンジゲージ最大時に威力が上昇／ヒット数増加
<COL ff7878>亜人／鬼人／巨人系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Further increase damage when revenge gauge is full.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage to Demihuman/Ogre/Giant enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
攻撃を受ける瞬間に発動すると
ダメージ量が増加すると同時に
攻撃を敵に接触させる度にリベンジゲージが増加
スタミナが続くか中断しない限り、突進を継続できる
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
If this skill is used before being hit, damage increases and
revenge gauge increases as you hit enemies.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
気絶攻力が増加
攻撃回数が増加（１→２）
２回目の攻撃はボタン長押しで溜め可能
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Increase knockout power.
Increase the number of hits (1→2).
The second hit can be activated by pressing
and holding the assigned button.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
チャンス攻力がやや増加
疲労攻力がやや増加
<COL ff7878>戦甲を攻撃時、ダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Slightly increase chance attack.
Slightly increase exhaust power.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage against War-Ready enemies</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
リベンジゲージ最大時に威力が上昇
敵の攻撃を直前回避すると追加攻撃のすり抜け時間が延長
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Further increase damage when revenge gauge is full.
Increase invulnerability duration if you avoid the enemy at the
closest possible moment.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
敵の攻撃を直前回避すると
追加攻撃のダメージ量が増加すると同時に
攻撃を敵に接触させる度にリベンジゲージが増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage of the additional hits after evasion
if you avoid the enemy at the closest possible moment.
Increase revenge gauge as you hit enemies.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
モーションが変化し、攻撃ヒット数が増加
のけぞり中にも発動可能
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Change motions, increase the number of hits.
Can be used when staggered.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
吹き飛ばし力が増加
前方への攻撃範囲が大幅に拡張
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase blow power.
Extend the range of the attack forward.

column1:
体力回復に加え、物理攻撃力と魔法攻撃力の
強化効果のある魔矢を放つ（対不死には攻撃）
味方に接触させれば魔法球が吸着する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復力上昇／展開エリア拡張
LV.６でターゲット数増加（３→７）</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of health
restoration at the impact point (inflicts damage to undead).
The field will attach to an ally if the arrow makes contact.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases healing power. Increases size of the effect.
LV.6: Increases number of targets (2→4).</COL>

column1:
一部の状態異常回復に加え、物理防御力と魔法防御力の
強化効果のある魔矢を放つ（対不死には攻撃）
味方に接触させれば魔法球が吸着する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費減少
LV.６でターゲット数増加（３→７）</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of debilitation
recovery at the impact point (inflicts damage to undead).
The field will attach to an ally if the arrow makes contact.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Reduces Stamina cost.
LV.6: Increases number of targets (2→3).</COL>

column1:
起爆性のある魔矢を放つ
敵に刺さった魔矢への攻撃には爆発がともなう
爆発に接触した周囲の敵は中心地に吹き飛ぶ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で爆発範囲が拡張</COL>
column2:
Loose a magickal arrow that attaches to enemies.
Upon attacking the magickal arrow, it will trigger an explosion.
Enemies in contact with the explosion will be knocked away.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the explosions.</COL>

column1:
氷属性の複数の魔矢を一点に集中して放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で魔矢の本数増加（４→６）</COL>
column2:
Fire multiple magickal arrows with
the Ice attribute at a single point.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases magickal arrows fired (4→6).</COL>

column1:
壁に反射し、敵を追従する雷属性の魔矢を放つ
反射させる度に威力が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で反射回数が増加</COL>
column2:
Loose a magickal arrow that increases in
power as it ricochets towards its target.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the number of ricochets.</COL>

column1:
聖属性の魔矢を放ち、着弾場所に魔法球を
展開する。敵に接触させた場合魔法球が付着し
継続して体力を奪う
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で魔法球継続時間が延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows of the Holy attribute. The arrows
will emit a magickal sphere upon impact. Enemies in
contact with the sphere will continously take damage.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases duration of spheres. Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
敵の物理攻撃力と魔法攻撃力を
一定時間低下させる魔矢を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に低下力の強化
LV.６でターゲット数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows that decrease the
Physical and Magickal attack power of
enemies for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of debilitation accumulation.
LV.6: Increases number of targets (3→5).</COL>

column1:
敵の物理防御力と魔法防御力を
一定時間低下させる魔矢を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に低下力の強化
LV.６でターゲット数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows that decrease the
Physical and Magickal defense of
enemies for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of debilitation accumulation.
LV.6: Increases number of targets (3→5).</COL>

column1:
スタミナ回復効果のある魔矢を放つ（対不死には攻撃）
味方に接触させれば魔法球が吸着する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔法球継続時間の延長／展開エリア拡張
LV.６で魔力増加速度の上昇／ターゲット数増加（３→７）</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of Stamina
restoration at the impact point (inflicts damage to undead).
The field will attach to an ally if the arrow makes contact.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration. Increases size of the effect.
LV.6: Increases casting speed.</COL>

column1:
敵の耐久力を一定時間低下させる魔矢を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に低下力の強化
LV.６で魔力増加速度の上昇／
ターゲット数増加（５→７）</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows that decrease the
Endurance of enemies for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of debilitation accumulation.
LV.6: Increases casting speed.
Increases number of targets (5→7).</COL>

column1:
怒り中の敵のシークレットコアにのみ有効な魔矢
攻撃を加えることで敵スタミナを大幅に低下させる
魔法球を展開する。コアは構え中に発見可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に低下力の強化
LV.６で魔法球継続時間が延長</COL>
column2:
Loose a magickal arrow that attaches to revealed
weakpoints of enemies and forms a sphere. Greatly
decreases the Stamina of enemies when attacked.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the stamina reduction.
LV.6: Increases the duration of the sphere.</COL>

column1:
魔力を十分に溜めた後、特大威力の聖属性魔矢を放つ
<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で軌道操作可能。威力はスタミナ依存
なお当たった部位は暫く自動的に魔矢の標的になる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力／魔力増加速度の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
After gathering sufficient magickal power, let loose
an extraordinarily powerful Holy arrow.
The arrow can be controlled mid-flight with the <PADM>Left Stick<KEYM>Movement Keys</KEYM>.
The power of the skill depends on the stamina available.
The hit spot will automatically be targeted by the magickal
arrows for a while.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage and cast speed of the skill.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
癒しの力を込めた魔矢を放ち、上空で起爆させる
矢は起爆時に強い光を放ち、照らされた味方の
体力を一定量回復する（対不死には攻撃）
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復量上昇
LV.６で起爆時の閃光効果強化</COL>
column2:
Let loose a holy magickal arrow imbued with the power to heal
into the sky and detonate it. The arrow emits a strong flash at
the time of detonation, recovering a portion of health for allies.
(Damages Undead)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases health recovery amount.
LV.6: Increases the power of the flash at detonation.</COL>

column1:
魔矢を放ち、接触した敵を引き裂く触手を発生させる
触手は攻撃対象を自ら追尾し、攻撃が連鎖する
連鎖回数は敵の大きさで変動。侵食核の破壊に有効
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で連鎖回数増加</COL>
column2:
Let loose a magickal arrow that tears apart the enemy it contacts
with tentacles. The tentacles will seek out additional enemies or
continue to attack current target depending on its size. 
Effective for destroying Infected Sprouts.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Increases the target chain amount.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
魔矢が刺さった敵の体力を継続して奪う
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Continuously cause damage at the point the arrow landed.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
魔矢が刺さった敵へ攻撃した際の
状態異常値を増加させる
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase status effect accumulation when attacking enemies hit by
this skill.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージが追加
吹き飛ばし力が増加
魔矢の速度が上昇
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Add damage to the skill.
Increase blow force.
Increase arrow's speed.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージが追加
封印の状態異常を付与／気絶攻力が増加
魔矢の速度が上昇
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Add damage to the skill.
Add Skill Stiffling status abnormality
and knockout power.
Increase arrow's speed.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
HP回復量アップ
<COL ff7878>骸骨／腐死／呪詛／霊体系の敵へ
与えるダメージ量と攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase the amount of health recovered.
<COL ff7878>Increase damage and number of hits against
Skeleton/Undead/Cursed/Spirit type enemies</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
治癒上限値を回復する
シークレットコア露出時間／触芽封印時間／
戦甲の修復停止時間が延長
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Recover healable limit of affected allies.
Increase duration of Secret Core reveal, Infected seal and
War-Ready Armor reveal.

column1:
【EX追加効果】
闇属性のダメージが追加
溜め時間短縮
ターゲット数増加（５→７）
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Add Dark-attribute damage.
Reduce charge time.
Increase the number of target locks (5→7).

column1:
【EX追加効果】
最適距離の範囲が拡張
魔道弓に付与されている属性の
防御力を低下させる状態異常を付与
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Extend the optimal range.
Add Elemental Resist Down accumulation that matches your
weapon's element.

column1:
掌を地面に添え、振り上げると同時に
地を這う錬成物質の波を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成値の上昇
LV.６で錬成物質の本数増加（３→５）／
敵を転倒させる効果追加</COL>
column2:
Place your palm on the ground and upon raising it,
create waves of alchemical substances that spike
up along the ground.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases amount of stakes
planted upon contact.
LV.6: Increases number of waves (3→5) and adds the
ability to juggle enemies.</COL>

column1:
拳を地面に突き立て、自身を囲むように
柱状の錬成物質を生成する。高所から行うことで
威力が上昇する。空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成値の上昇
LV.６で錬成物質の生成回数増加（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Slam your fist into the ground and surround yourself
with pillars of alchemical metal. When performed
from high altitudes, the power of the attack rises.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases amount of stakes
planted upon contact.
LV.6: Increases the times the pillars raise (1→2).</COL>

column1:
素早く敵との間合いを詰め、錬成杭を打ち込む
杭を叩くと錬成値が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に杭の継続時間が延長
LV.６で移動距離が延長／始動後に範囲攻撃追加
杭を叩いた時の錬成値が上昇</COL>
column2:
Drive alchemical piles into enemies, and quickly draw
their aggression. If a pile is struck, the amount of
stakes on it will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the skill.
LV.6: Increases chase range of skill, and amount of
alchemical stakes gained upon striking the pile.</COL>

column1:
風を纏った錬成物質を生成し配置する
後退後に風の錬成球を叩くと、風圧が発生する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成球の継続時間が延長
LV.６で叩いた時に発生する風圧範囲が拡張</COL>
column2:
Create a ball of wind-wrapped alchemical substances.
Wind pressure is generated when striking the ball
after placement.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the skill.
LV.6: Increases range of wind pressure generated
when struck.</COL>

column1:
炎、氷、雷の主要３属性を纏った
錬成式を地面から生成し空中に配置する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成式の継続時間が延長
LV.６で聖・闇の２属性追加</COL>
column2:
Create an elemental orb that bestows one of the
three main attributes of fire, ice, or lightning,
from the ground and place it in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the skill.
LV.6: Unlocks the final two elements, Holy and Darkness.</COL>

column1:
乗った者を高所へ跳ね上げる効果を持つ
錬成式を地面に配置する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成式の継続時間が延長
LV.６で空中にも設置可能になり、
空中に配置された場合は横方向に跳躍可能</COL>
column2:
Place an alchemical trampoline on the ground
that launches those who jump on it to high altitudes.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the skill.
LV.6: Allows placement in the air. When placed
mid-air, you can be launched horizontally.</COL>

column1:
錬成物質で罠を生成する。この罠に敵が
近付くと自動的に棘が放出され、対象を貫く
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成罠の起動回数増加
LV.６で棘の本数が増加（１→３）</COL>
column2:
Generate a trap from an alchemical substance.
When enemies approach the trap, pillars spike out
from it and penetrate them.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases number of trap activations.
LV.6: Increases the number of pillar spikes (1→3).</COL>

column1:
自身の体を金で覆い、敵の攻撃を遮断する
さらに攻撃した敵に対し黄金化の異常値を与える
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に黄金化の異常値上昇
LV.６でダウン、拘束中を除きいつでも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Coat yourself in gold and deflect enemy attacks. Enemies
that attack will build up the "Gilded" status abnormality.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases rate of Gilding build-up.
LV.6: Can activate the skill at anytime except when grabbed.</COL>

column1:
敵を直接攻撃し、攻撃対象に付着している錬成物質を
解放して大爆発を起こす。しがみつき状態から発動可
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でヒット数増加／爆発に周囲の敵を巻き込む</COL>
column2:
Directly strike the enemy and detonate alchemical stake on
target, creating a large explosion. Can be used when climbing.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Increases number of hits and the surrounding
enemies are affected by the explosion.</COL>

column1:
垂直に跳び上がり、空中に錬成物質で生成した罠を
配置する。その後、後方に素早く身を引く
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に罠の攻撃回数上昇
LV.６で空中でも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Jump up and form a trap from an alchemical substance
in the air. When deployed, quickly launch backwards.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases number of trap activations.
LV.6: Allows activation while mid-air.</COL>

column1:
放射状に錬成物質の粒を発射する
近距離で複数ヒットすると敵を弾き飛ばす
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃性能上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大／ヒット数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Shoot alchemical substances radially toward you.
If you are close to the enemies, all substances will hit.
Can be activated in mid-air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases range and the number of substances (3→5).</COL>

column1:
味方へのダメージを無効化し、敵へエリクシルの
状態異常を付与する支援エリアを生成する
タイミングよくボタンを押すと展開時間が延長する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値上昇
LV.６で最大入力回数が増加し、展開時間が延長</COL>
column2:
Generate an area that nullifies damage for all allies inside.
Enemies within the area are affected by your chosen Elixir.
The duration is greatly increased with correct timing.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases debilitation rate.
LV.6: Number of inputs increased, extending the duration.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
打ち込まれた錬成杭の錬成値が徐々に増加する
しがみついた状態で発動可能
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
The stake struck by this skill slowly builds up automatically.
Can be used when climbing.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
錬成杭を打ち込んだ敵へ放った
エリクシル／アルケム・バーストの
状態異常値が上昇
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase status effect accumulation when detonating the
stake struck by this skill using Elixir/Alchemical Burst.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
黄金化の状態異常を付与
<COL ff7878>人間／竜族／錬金系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Add Gilded status abnormality.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage against
Human/Dragonkin/Alchemized enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
発動中は物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加しつつ
攻撃を受けても体勢を崩されにくくなる
敵に与える錬成値と吹き飛ばし力が増加
のけぞり、吹き飛び中でも発動可能
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase physical and magick defense during execution.
Increase endurance during execution.
Increase the amount of alchemical substance and blow force.
Possible to use when being knocked back.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
錬成物質が強化されダメージ量と錬成値が増加
強化される錬成物質の数は一定確率で変化するが
カウンテラ・アウルム発動時は全ての錬成物質が強化される
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
May employ strengthened alchemical substances that deal
more damage and has faster alchemical buildup.
Normal alchemical substance has a chance to be strengthened.
If used in conjunction with Counterra Aurum, all substances
are strengthened.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
錬成物質の生成数と生成速度が増加し
攻撃距離が延長される
物防低下／魔防低下の状態異常を付与
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase the number of alchemical waves created and
generation speed.
Increase attack distance.
Inflict Physic/Magick Defense Down effects.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
エンチャントの効果を受けると
自身のみエンチャント属性の状態異常蓄積値が
大幅に増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
When you receive the enchant from this skill, elemental
debilitation is greatly increased only on yourself.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
設置時のみ広範囲にエンチャント効果を付与
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Grant enchantment to surrounding allies when you place the
orb.

column1:
斬り上げながら敵を打ち上げる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でボタンの追加入力により派生斬りが発動</COL>
column2:
Launch enemies upward with a slash.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Invert direction of slash with an additional
button press.</COL>

column1:
槍を振り払い、周囲を巻き込みながら攻撃する
空中発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でのけぞり、吹き飛び中でも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Swing the lance around, and attack
the surrounding area. Can be used in mid-air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Can be used while taking damage, and even while
being knocked off an enemy.</COL>

column1:
前方に連続して攻撃を繰り出す
攻撃回数によって最後の一撃の威力が変化する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で最大攻撃回数増加</COL>
column2:
Spin the lance all-around, continuously slashing
forward. The last blow's power changes according to the number of 
attacks made.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum number of attacks.</COL>

column1:
力を溜めて離れた敵を攻撃する
初段がヒットすることで連続ヒットする追撃が発生
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め段階拡張（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Gather energy and thrust forward,
releasing a blast of energy. The first strike always
chases an enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6:Increases number of hits (1→2).</COL>

column1:
攻撃すると衝撃波が発生する霊球を発現する
霊球は攻撃を受けることで霊力が溜まり
起爆することも可能／起爆は空中発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で霊力最大の起爆ヒット数増加／溜まる霊力増加</COL>
column2:
Form a spirit orb that generates shockwaves when attacked.
The orb gathers spiritual energy when attacked. It can also
be detonated both on the ground and mid-air manually.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum hits of the detonation and amount of
spirit energy gained.</COL>

column1:
敵の攻撃を防ぐバリアを発現する。展開中に敵を攻撃すると
バリアに霊力が溜まり、セットボタンで霊力を使って攻撃可能
しがみつき状態から攻撃発動可
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇／バリア展開時間延長
LV.６でバリアの耐久値増加（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Form a barrier around yourself to prevent enemy attacks.
When attacking enemies while the barrier is active, spiritual
energy gathers in the barrier. You can unleash the energy
by pressing the assigned button.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill and duration.
LV.6: Increase maximum barrier durability (1→2).</COL>

column1:
体力回復と防御力上昇効果の霊力エリアを展開する
エリアに接触した味方へ一定時間効果を付与
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間延長
LV.６で展開エリアの設置時間延長</COL>
column2:
Form a pool of spiritual energy that
recovers health and grants allies whom walk into it
a Defense boost for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of effect.
LV.6: Increases duration of pool.</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に体力回復と状態異常回復の霊球を展開
溜め時間に応じて範囲が拡大し
最大範囲になることで性能が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に展開時間延長
LV.６で展開エリアの最大サイズが拡張</COL>
column2:
Form spiritual spheres around yourself that recovers health
and status abnormalities. The range grows dependingon the
charge time. The effectiveness rises upon a full charge.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of skill.
LV.6: Increases the area of effect of the skill.</COL>

column1:
強力な攻撃を広範囲に繰り出す
初段を敵に接触させれば連撃に移行する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
A high power skill that covers a wide area.
If the first hit is successfully landed, it will become
a full on combo attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the number of hits in the attack, and
changes the motion of the skill.</COL>

column1:
クレストを含むエンチャント攻撃力と吹き飛ばし力を
増加する霊力エリアを展開。攻撃を受け流し発動すると
展開サイズを拡張しつつ自身の強化性能を更に上昇させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間延長
LV.６でエンチャント強化と吹き飛ばし力強化の性能上昇</COL>
column2:
Expand a spiritual area that increases damage and blow force
of enchantment of nearby allies including enchantment from
crests. If used as a counter, the effect is greatly increased
and the deployment size is expanded.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of effect.
LV.6: Increases the effectiveness of the buff.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
ダメージ量が増加
<COL ff7878>造魔／魔族／戦甲系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加</COL>
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage to Construct/Demon/War-Ready enemies.</COL>

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
派生斬りを初段経由せずに空中で発動可能
スピリットゲージ蓄積量が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Possible to activate in the air without
executing the first hit.
Increase Spirit Gauge accumulation.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
防御力の上昇量が増加
ヒールブースト時の攻撃力の上昇量が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase defense buff value.
Increase attack buff value during Heal Boost.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
攻撃を敵に接触させると
スタミナが回復する効果を付与
霊球の展開時間と効果時間が延長
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Recover stamina when attacking enemies.
Extend the duration of the pool.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
溜め満了の瞬間に攻撃を放つと威力が上昇する
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage if you release the attack
just as the charge is completed.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
攻撃が最初にヒットした敵に
エイド／エイド・モールを吸着させる
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Attach an Aid/Aid More sphere at the impact point.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
治癒上限値を徐々に回復する
ヒールブースト時の攻撃力の上昇量が増加
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Gradually recover the healable limit of allies.
Further increase attack power during Heal Boost.

column1:
【ＥＸ追加効果】
耐久力を強化する効果を付与
column2:
EX Additional Effects:
Increase Endurance for allies inside.

column1:
聖属性の魔力を付与した剣で、周囲を薙ぎ払う
魔印が最大に成長している時、性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.6で空中でも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Imbue your sword with Holy attribute and
attack surrounding enemies.
Damage increases when the Magick Glyph grows.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases damage of skill.
LV.6 Can be activated in the air.</COL>

column1:
自身の前方に魔力の盾を一定時間展開する
純魔法発動時は展開時間が減少しない
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に展開時間延長
LV.6で敵の攻撃に合わせて発動した際、展開時間延長</COL>
column2:
Create a magickal barrier in front of you for a certain amount of
time. Barrier duration does not decrease when using pure magick.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the barrier.
LV.6 When invoked just before an enemy's attack connects,
duration is further increased.</COL>

column1:
魔力を収束させ、聖・打属性の魔力の渦を発生させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
Lv.6で攻撃ヒット回数が増加</COL>
column2:
Create a vortex that deals Holy and Impact damage.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases damage of skill
LV.6 Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
闇属性の魔力を付与した剣で
逆手に敵を突き、直後に引き抜く
魔印が最大に成長している時、性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.6でしがみつき中でも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Thrusts the blade imbued with dark magick into
the target's body before pulling it out.
Damage is increased when the Magick Glyph grows.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases damage of skill.
LV.6 Can be used when climbing.</COL>

column1:
幻影を作り出し、前方へ瞬間移動する魔法
移動中に接触した敵に対して、魔力の斬撃を浴びせる
空中での連続発動は2回まで可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に再発動禁止時間が短縮
LV.6で攻撃アクション中であればいつでも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Create a phantom and teleport forward.
If user comes into contact with enemy
while teleporting, deal magick damage.
Can use twice while mid air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Reduce cooldown between activation.
LV.6 Can be used at any time during attack.</COL>

column1:
魔力の刃を敵に撃ち込み
闇・斬属性による継続ダメージを与える
ボタンの追加入力で攻撃ヒット数が増加
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
Lv.6で追加入力時の攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Bombard an enemy with Magick Blade, dealing continuous
Dark and Slash damage to enemy.
Number of hits increases with consecutive button presses.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases damage of skill.
LV.6 Increases number of hits with consecutive button presses.</COL>

column1:
刃に魔力を帯び、ノーマルスキルの剣技に残像を追加する
ボタン再入力で、残像の攻撃回数に応じて強化された
魔力吸収特化の一撃を放つ。発動中は魔力を消費し続ける
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に発動中の魔力消費量が減少
LV.6で再入力時の攻撃回数による強化段階が増加（１→２）
column2:
Imbue magickal power on your sword, adding afterimage to the
core sword skills. Press the assigned button again to release
an attack that absorbs an amount of magick based on the number
of afterimage attacks. Slowly drain magick during activation.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Reduces magick drain during activation.
LV.6 Increases maximum number of charges from attacks (1→2).</COL>

column1:
その場で剣を構え、振り下ろすと同時に
前方に複数の魔力の刃を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.6で攻撃ヒット回数が増加</COL>
column2:
Ready your sword and slice downwards, releases several
magick blades towards enemies infont of you.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases damage of skill.
LV.6 Increases number of hit.</COL>

column1: センチュリオンスパイク
シールドバッシュ 剛
シールドバッシュ 技
セイクリッドシャイン
ディフェンスライザー
ソウルエクスプロージョン
ブラストアディション
ソラースライザー 剛
ソラースライザー 技
セラフィムフラップ 剛
セラフィムフラップ 技
キュアスポット 技
キュアスポット 剛
ディフェンスライザー 剛
ディフェンスライザー 技
プロテクションスイング
アースシェイク 剛
アースシェイク 技
フォースシールド 剛
フォースシールド 技
ランパートレイド 剛
ランパートレイド 技
セントウォール 剛
セントウォール 技
プロミネントスフィア
ライトニングステイク
ダークネスミスト 剛
ダークネスミスト 技
サンダーケージ 剛
サンダーケージ 技
フレイムウォール 剛
フレイムウォール 技
フロストスパイク 剛
フロストスパイク 技
パイル・バインダ 剛
パイル・バインダ 技
アルマ・ピラー 剛
アルマ・ピラー 技
アルマ・ウェイブ 剛
アルマ・ウェイブ 技
レクス・エレメンタ 剛
レクス・エレメンタ 技
シュクリス・ブラスト
シュクリス・ガーダー
エードラム・カウンター
アラム・ファング 剛
アラム・ファング 技
ウォール・グラスタ 剛
ウォール・グラスタ 技
コル・スパイク 剛
コル・スパイク 技
キュア・グラスタ 剛
キュア・グラスタ 技
エクリプス・ブライト

グリッテン砦――白竜神殿への魔物侵入をとどめる
最重要拠点のひとつである
北部からのオーク軍侵攻を阻むため、覚者レオ統率と
ヴァネッサ副隊長が率いる最前線部隊への参加人員が
今回も徴募される
連係戦術で悪鬼どもを葬り、レスタニアの平穏を護れ
column2: Fort Gritten is one of the most critical strongholds, aimed at preventing the intrusion of monsters into the White Dragon Temple. In order to repel the Orc forces invading from the north, Arisen Leo leads the way, and Deputy Commander Vanessa leads the frontline unit. Once again, personnel have been recruited to join these forces. Through coordinated tactics, let's bury those fiends and protect the peace of Lestania.

column1:
白竜神殿・中央広場のアランより
攻防戦の詳細について確認せよ
column2: From Alan of The White Dragon Temple, Central Square, please confirm the details of attack and defense battle.

column1:
グリッテン砦にオーク軍の接近が確認された
覚者諸君は防衛戦に備え、神殿大門前に集まれ
護りの力、いざ結束の時！
column2:
Fort Gritten has confirmed the approach of the Orc army.
All Arisen comrades, gather in front of the temple gate, preparing for the defense.
It's time to unite our protective strength!

column1: 本作戦進行中　戦況：接戦
column2: The mission is underway. Battle status: Close combat.

column1:
オーク軍との大規模戦闘が始まっている
まだ脅威は少なく、新兵でも充分活躍できるが
油断は禁物だ
column2:
The large-scale combat with the Orc army has begun.
There is still little threat, and even new recruits can contribute adequately.
Letting your guard down is forbidden.

column1:
オーク軍と刃を交える大規模戦闘が始まっている
敵軍は数こそいるが斥候クラスがほとんどで
深刻な脅威とはならないと目される
新兵にも活躍の機会は充分にあるはずだ
とはいえ連係戦闘を意識しなければ思わぬ怪我をする
心して挑むがいい
column2: A large-scale battle has begun between the Orc army and our forces. Although the enemy outnumbers us, most of them are scouts, so they are not considered a serious threat. There should be plenty of opportunities for new recruits to shine. However, it is important to be aware of coordinated combat to avoid unexpected injuries. Approach with caution.

column1: 本作戦進行中　戦況：接戦
column2: The mission is underway. Battle status: Close combat.

column1:
難易度が増した大規模戦闘に挑め
日々の経験を生かせば、強敵も畏れることはない
仲間との連携に注力せよ
column2:
Take on the challenge of large-scale battles with increased difficulty.
With daily experience, even the strongest enemies are not to be feared.
Focus on cooperation with your friends.

column1:
多少難易度が上がり手ごたえの増した大規模戦闘だ
敵兵にも強い個体が増えてきている
だが日ごろの経験を生かして望めば怖くないはず
基本を忘れず周囲に気を配れ
仲間の動きを見極めてこその連係だ
column2: The difficulty level has increased and it has become a large-scale combat with a greater sense of accomplishment. The number of strong enemy soldiers has also increased. However, if we apply our daily experience, it shouldn't be scary. Remember the basics and pay attention to your surroundings. It's all about coordination, discerning your comrades' movements.

column1: 本作戦進行中　戦況：苦戦
column2: The mission is underway. Battle status: Struggling.

column1:
新兵には厳しい大規模戦闘となる
狂暴かつ狡猾な敵に個人技だけでは
太刀打ちできない弱点をついて連係せよ
column2:
It will be a tough and large-scale battle for new recruits.
In order to overcome the fierce and cunning enemies that cannot be dealt with by individual skills alone,
exploit their weaknesses and coordinate attacks.

column1:
新兵には荷の重い大規模戦闘となる
敵は狂暴性を増しながらも隙のない動きを見せてくる
勘やセンスに頼った個人技を振りまわすだけでは
勝機は薄いだろう
連係をつなぎ敵の弱点を見逃すな
column2:
For new recruits, it will be a heavy burden of large-scale combat.
The enemy will come at us with increasing ferocity, but showing no openings in their movements.
Relying solely on intuition and individual skills will provide little chance of victory.
Do not overlook the enemy's weak points, but connect your attacks strategically.

column1: 本作戦進行中　戦況：苦戦
column2: The mission is underway. Battle status: Struggling.

column1:
主力部隊との大規模戦闘だ
好戦的な尖兵の投入により、難易度は増している
一瞬の気の緩みが致命傷になると心得よ
column2: This is a large-scale combat with the main force. The difficulty has increased due to the aggressive deployment of elite troops. Keep in mind that a momentary lapse of concentration can be fatal.

column1:
敵の主力部隊が進出してくる本格大規模戦闘だ
好戦的で戦技に長けた尖兵が前線に投入され
確実に致命傷を負わせにかかってきている
すばやく的確な決断が必須となるだろう
一瞬たりとも気を抜くな
column2: This is a full-scale large-scale battle with the enemy's main force advancing. Aggressive and skilled vanguards have been deployed to the front lines and are coming to inflict fatal blows reliably. Quick and accurate decision-making will be essential. Do not let your guard down for even a moment.

column1: 本作戦進行中　戦況：激戦
column2: The mission is underway. Battle status: Fierce battle.

column1:
熟練者でも致命傷を負う可能性のある
難度の高い大規模戦闘となる
歴戦をくぐった強敵を前に無傷では済まされない
column2:
Even the most seasoned of us can be mortally wounded.
It's a difficult, large-scale battle.
You can't go unscathed in the face of a powerful enemy who has fought many battles in his career.

column1:
熟練者でないと攻略が難しい高難度大規模戦闘だ
過去に何人もの覚者をほふった、いわくつきの
戦士らが集結するとみられる
戦闘経験の浅い者など数分と生き残れまい
もはや誰しも無傷では済まされないと覚悟しろ
column2: This is a high-difficulty large-scale battle that is difficult to conquer without being an expert. It is said that renowned warriors who have slaughtered numerous Arisen in the past will gather. Those with little combat experience will not survive even for a few minutes. Prepare yourself, as no one will come out unscathed anymore.

column1: 本作戦進行中　戦況：激戦
column2: The mission is underway. Battle status: Fierce battle.

column1:
熟達戦士による総力戦となるのは必至の
苛烈な大規模戦闘だ
判断ミスは仲間の全滅につながると心せよ
column2: It is inevitable that the intense, large-scale battle will turn into a all-out war led by skilled soldiers. Always keep in mind that a judgment error can lead to the complete annihilation of your comrades.

column1:
熟達した戦士が総力を結集する大規模戦闘になる
圧倒的な狂暴さとタフさ、高度な戦術を持った敵が
大挙して襲ってくるだろう
戦闘巧者とてあっけなくやられる場合がある
ひとつの判断ミスが仲間の全滅につながると思え
column2: It will be a large-scale battle where seasoned soldiers gather their full strength. The enemy possesses overwhelming ferocity, toughness, and advanced tactics. They will come in great numbers to attack. Even skilled warriors can be easily defeated. One miscalculation can lead to the complete annihilation of our allies.

column1: 本作戦進行中　戦況：決死戦
column2: The mission is underway. Battle status: Life-and-death struggle.

column1:
悪夢の大群が押し寄せる大規模戦闘だ
己の腕と奇跡、白竜の加護を信じるしかない
さあ覚者の矜持を見せよ！
column2:
A massive battle where hordes of nightmares surge forward.
We have no choice but to believe in our own skills, miracles, and the protection of the White Dragon.
Now, let us show the pride of the Arisen!

column1:
全員が生きて帰れるかどうかわからない
決死の大規模戦闘がついに始まってしまった
地獄の扉が開き、悪夢がなだれ込んでくる
確実な勝機などどこにもない
己の腕を信じ、仲間を信じ、奇跡を信じるほかはない
白竜の加護を胸に、覚者の矜持を見せろ！
column2:
I don't know if everyone will return alive.
The desperate large-scale battle has finally begun.
The gates of hell open and nightmares come pouring in.
There is no certain chance of victory anywhere.
Believe in your own abilities, believe in your comrades, and believe in miracles.
With the White Dragon's protection in your heart, show the dignity of the Arisen!

column1:
防衛戦ごくろうだった！
諸君らの活躍により敵軍は退却、沈静化した
現在戦果報酬を確認中だ、しばし待つがいい
column2:
The defense battle was a tough one!
Thanks to everyone's efforts, the enemy forces have retreated and the situation has calmed down.
We are currently in the process of confirming the battle results and rewards. Please wait for a moment.

column1:
誰が名付けたかその名も《竜の巣》――
そこには凶悪なドラゴンや魔物の大群が
巣食うようになっている
さあ死を畏れぬ猛者たちよ、洋撃船の準備ができたら
大船長ゼルキンとともにやつらの寝床に乗り込め！
極上の冒険が待ってるぞ！
column2:
Whoever named it, its name is "Dragon's Nest" - 
A horde of vicious dragons and enemies have made it their lair. 
Now, brave warriors who fear not death, 
Once the steam-powered ship is ready, 
Board their sleeping place with Captain Zerkin! 
An extraordinary adventure awaits!

column1:
白竜神殿・港洞のゼルキンより
作戦詳細について説明を受けよ
column2: From Zerkin of The White Dragon Temple in Cave Harbor, please receive an explanation regarding the details of the operation.

column1:
大船長ゼルキンの洋撃船が、
≪魔物のるつぼ≫へ進路を向け着々と出港準備中！
狙うは爆炎の大竜、エルダードラゴン！！
column2:
Captain Zerkin's western warship is steadily preparing to set sail towards the "Crucible of Demons"!
Their target: the mighty Elder Dragon of fire and brimstone!

column1:
命知らずども！白竜神殿港洞に集まれ！
爆炎の大竜、エルダードラゴンを仕留めるため
≪魔物のるつぼ≫へ飛び込め！
column2: Attention, Daredevils! Gather at the Cave Harbor of the White Dragon Temple! We must defeat the Elder Dragon of Flames. Dive into the Crucible of Demons!

column1:
洋撃船の仕上がりは万端！
≪魔物のるつぼ≫への侵攻作戦は意気揚々と展開中だ！
爆炎の大竜、エルダードラゴンを仕留められるかは
おまえたちの腕と運しだい！
値千金、一攫千金の戦いに持てる戦技の全てをぶつけよ！
column2:
The finishing touches on the Western assault ship are perfect!
The invasion operation of the "Crucible of Demons" is progressing with high spirits!
Whether we can bring down the mighty Elder Dragon, a raging inferno, depends on your skills and luck!
Unleash all the battle techniques that can lead to a fortune, invaluable in this battle!

column1: 本作戦進行中　特報：敵勢力減退中！
column2: Mission in Progress Special Report：Enemy forces weakening!

column1:
洋撃船による侵攻作戦は順調に展開中だ
幸運なことに敵の大将は弱り目らしいぞ
戦果をあげろ！
column2: The invasion operation by the ocean assault ships is progressing smoothly. Fortunately, it appears the enemy leader is weakened. Achieve great results!

column1:
洋撃船の仕上がりは万端
魔物の巣への侵攻作戦は意気揚々と展開中だ
命知らずどもに朗報をやろう
今回は敵の大将どもの弱り目につけこめそうだ
こんなチャンスはめったにないぞ
一気にたたみかけて根こそぎかっさらえ！
column2:
The finishing of the attack ship is perfect.
The invasion operation to the enemy's nest is unfolding with great enthusiasm.
Let's give some good news to the daredevils;
This time, we can take advantage of the weakness of the enemy's generals.
Such opportunities are rare.
Quickly overwhelm them and take everything!

column1:
覚者の活躍で戦果は上々、船長も大満足だったぜ
壊れた船の修繕がてら報酬配分を計算中だ
もうしばらく待ってくれ
column2:
The performance of the Arisen has been excellent, and the captain is very satisfied.
They are calculating the distribution of rewards while repairing the broken ship.
Please wait a little longer.

column1:
レスタニアの地に災いを為す存在、魔物たち――
やつらの勢力が強まる背景には、何があるのか？
《古の祭祀場》に襲い来る、異界を渡るとされる
強敵の存在がその疑問への答えになるかも知れない
白竜の子らよ、畏れを忘れず脅威に立ち向かえ
やつらの進撃をこれ以上許してはならない
column2: In the land of Lestania, exist the creatures that bring calamity — the enemies, the monsters. What lies behind their growing power? The answer may lie in the formidable presence that crosses over from the "Ancient Place of Rituals," said to connect to a different realm. Sons and daughters of the White Dragon, confront the threat without forgetting to fear it. We cannot allow the further advance of these creatures.

column1:
白竜神殿・騎士団詰所のローガンと話し
強敵への備えについて把握せよ
column2: Talk to Logan of the White Dragon Temple Knights' Quarters about preparations for a formidable enemy.

column1:
古の祭祀場にて闇の者たちの波動を感知している
騎士団はこれに対処すべく覚者らの協力を求める
column2: At the ancient place of rituals, the knights have detected waves of darkness from the dark beings. The knights seek the assistance of the Arisen to deal with this.

column1:
古の祭祀場で魔物出現に対処中である
強力な敵個体も検知した、騎士団は
総力を尽くしているが覚者の協力が必須だ
column2: In the ancient place of rituals, we are currently dealing with the appearance of enemies. The knight order has detected powerful enemy individuals, and they are making every effort to handle the situation, but the cooperation of the Arisen is essential.

column1:
古の祭祀場にて魔物出現への対処を開始している
騎士団討伐隊も死力を尽くしてこれに当たっているが
強力な魔物らを制するには覚者の協力が不可欠だ
また深部からは強力な個体のものと思われる波動が
検知されている
今は少しでも多くの応援が欲しい
column2: At the ancient place of rituals, measures to deal with the appearance of monsters have begun. The knight squad is also doing their best to face this, but the cooperation of the Arisen is essential to overcome powerful monsters. Furthermore, powerful waves, presumed to be from individual creatures in the depths, have been detected. We need as much support as possible right now.

column1: 本作戦進行中　特報：敵勢力減退中！
column2: Mission in Progress Special Report：Enemy forces weakening!

column1:
古の祭祀場で魔物出現に対処中である
検知した強力な敵個体は弱体の傾向があるようだ
攻勢に出るため応援を求む
column2:
We are currently dealing with the appearance of enemies in the ancient place of rituals.
The powerful enemy individuals that were detected seem to have a tendency towards weakness.
We request reinforcements in order to launch an offensive.

column1:
古の祭祀場にて魔物出現への対処を開始している
騎士団討伐隊も死力を尽くしてこれに当たっているが
強力な魔物らを制するには覚者の協力が不可欠だ
なお深部で感知されている強力な個体の波動に
一部乱れのようなものが認められたらしい
もし攻勢をかける好機ならば、より応援が必要だ
column2: Efforts have begun to deal with the appearance of monsters at the ancient ritual site. The Order of Knights' extermination team is also doing its utmost in this regard, but the cooperation of the Arisen is essential to control these powerful monsters. Additionally, it seems that there has been some disturbance detected in the waves from the powerful individual sensed in the depths. If there's an opportune moment to launch an offensive, even more support will be required.

column1:
祭祀場での事態は収束した
覚者の協力に感謝する、戦況報告がまとまったら
戦果報酬を配分しよう、しばらく待機してくれ
column2: The situation at the ritual site has been brought under control. We are grateful for the assistance of the Arisen. Once the battle report is compiled, we will distribute the spoils of war. Please wait patiently for a while.

column1:
黄金竜の脅威が目前に迫っている
その真意はいまだ不明だが、奴の接近を放置すれば
レスタニアの地は災いに沈むだろう
いまこそ神殿に集いし覚者たちの総力を束ねるときだ
その一撃が、その執念が、黄金竜を確実に追い詰める
白竜の座すこの世界をともに護るのだ
column2: The threat of the Golden Dragon is imminent. Although its true intentions are still unknown, if we ignore its approach, the land of Lestania will be doomed. Now is the time for the Arisen to gather at the temple and unite their collective strength. With a single strike and unwavering determination, we will surely corner and overcome the Golden Dragon. Together, we shall protect this world, the seat of the White Dragon.

column1:
白竜神殿・謎の礎近くにいるハンコックより
決戦への参加について情報を集めろ
column2: From Hancock, who is near the Mysterious Keystone close to The White Dragon Temple, gather information about participating in the decisive battle.

column1:
黄金竜はこれまでの敵とは比べ物にならない
強さだ、勇気ある覚者も充分な準備を整えて
決戦に臨んでくれ
column2: The Golden Dragon is incomparable to previous enemies in terms of strength, so please, courageous Arisen, make thorough preparations and face the decisive battle.

column1:
黄金竜との決戦が展開中だ、こちらは数で
優位にあるが、奴の勢いは衰えを知らない
さらなる覚者の応援を請う
column2: The battle with the Golden Dragon is currently underway. We have the numerical advantage, but its momentum shows no sign of weakening. We request further support from the Arisen.

column1:
決戦の地では激しい戦いが展開されている
黄金竜の勢いは衰えを知らず、数で有利な我々も
一瞬たりとも気を抜けない状況だ
白竜との因縁深きやつの接近をこれ以上許せば
レスタニアの地が危ない
勇士よ集え、さらなる覚者の応援を請う
column2: A fierce battle is unfolding at the battlefield. The momentum of the Golden Dragon shows no signs of waning, and despite our numerical advantage, we can't afford to let our guard down for even a moment. If we allow that one, deeply fated with the White Dragon to approach any further, the land of Lestania will be in danger. Warriors, come together, and we request further support from the Arisen.

column1: 本作戦進行中　特報：敵勢力減退中！
column2: Mission in Progress Special Report：Enemy forces weakening!

column1:
黄金竜との決戦が展開中だ
激戦だが奴の動きにスキが認められるようだ
この好機に一気に攻め込みたい、支援を請う
column2:
The battle with the Golden Dragon is currently underway.
It's a fierce fight, but it seems there are openings in his movements.
I want to take advantage of this opportunity and launch a sudden attack. I request your support.

column1:
決戦の地では激しい戦いが展開されている
変わらず黄金竜の勢いはすさまじいが、奴の動きに
不自然なものを感じるとの報告もある
これは、奴が力尽きる寸前だという兆候かも知れない
過信は禁物だが、この機を逃さず注意深く攻めたい
覚者たちの支援を改めて強く求める
column2:
On the battlefield where the decisive battle is taking place, the formidable force of the Golden Dragon remains unchanged, but there are reports of unnatural movements from it.
This may be a sign that it is nearing exhaustion.
While we should not be overconfident, we should carefully attack without missing this opportunity.
Once again, we strongly request the support of the Arisen in our endeavors.

column1:
黄金竜の撃退に成功した
覚者の連携力と勇気がこの成果に繋がったのだ
戦果は追って報告する、白竜に感謝し待つがいい
column2:
The Golden Dragon has been successfully repelled.
The cooperation and bravery of the Arisen led to this achievement.
The results of the battle will be reported later, we thank the White Dragon and await its return.

column1:
アーク目撃の影響を受けてか、レスタニアにて
これまでにない異質な気配が感じられるようになった
騎士団は異質な気配を警戒している
しばらくの間、特別迎撃態勢をとることにした
覚者諸君においては、各自充分な備えをもって
これに対処してほしい
column2: Perhaps as a result of witnessing the Ark, a distinct presence has begun to be felt in Lestania. The knights are on alert for this unusual presence and have decided to assume a special defensive position for a while. For the Arisen, it is requested that each individual be adequately prepared to handle this situation.

column1:
白竜神殿・商店区付近のコーネリアを訪ね
異形な魔物の気配について尋ねよ
column2: Visit Cornelia in the vicinity of the White Dragon Temple and the Shopping District and inquire about the presence of abnormal creatures.

column1:
謎の敵の出現の兆しがある、今より迎撃態勢を
告知する、協力を申し出た覚者は最優先で
対処に応じてくれ、騎士団も協力を惜しまない
column2: There are signs of the mysterious enemy's appearance, so we are announcing the need to prepare for interception. The Arisen who offered their cooperation will be given top priority and responded to accordingly. The Knight Order also willingly offers their assistance.

column1:
レスタニアで謎の敵が目撃されている
覚者は異質な魔物に対して
十分な警戒と備えを持って対処せよ
column2:
In Lestania, an unknown enemy has been sighted.
The Arisen should be prepared and vigilant in dealing with these unfamiliar creatures.

column1:
レスタニアで謎の敵影が目撃され
襲撃報告も入ってきている
各自、最悪の状況を想定して行動せよ
白竜は言う「覚者とは抜き身の刃、研がねば腐る」
いまこそその力、研ぎ澄ますのだ
column2: A mysterious enemy presence has been spotted in Lestania, and there have been reports of attacks. Everyone, prepare for the worst-case scenario and act accordingly. The White Dragon says, "The Arisen is a blade unsheathed, it will perish if not honed." Now is the time to sharpen that power.

column1:
レスタニアで謎の敵が目撃されている
強敵ではあるが、手負いの状態との報告もある
チャンスを逃さず対処せよ
column2: Translation: A mysterious enemy has been sighted in Lestania. While formidable, there are also reports of it being in a wounded state. Don't miss the opportunity and deal with it.

column1:
レスタニア全土で謎の敵影が目撃され
襲撃報告も入ってきている
なお一部の遭遇者によれば、敵の動きに怯みのような
違和感を感じたとある
これは千載一遇のチャンスかも知れない
相手が弱っているなら、容赦なく対処し排除せよ
column2: Mysterious enemy shadows have been witnessed throughout the entire land of Lestania, and reports of attacks are coming in. According to some of the witnesses, they felt a sense of unease in the enemy's movements. This could be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. If the opponent is weakened, deal with them mercilessly and eliminate them.

column1: 迎撃態勢解除　戦況分析中
column2: Interception posture canceled. Analyzing war situation.

column1:
事態は一定の収束をみた、迎撃態勢は解除する
覚者の協力については報酬を用意している
集計結果を待ってほしい
column2: The situation has reached a certain resolution, and the interception preparations will be lifted. We have prepared rewards for the assistance of the Arisen. Please wait for the aggregation results.

column1:
《ボルド大坑道》に腐死竜の召喚を目論む
魔物の軍勢が集まってきている――
どうやらすでに召喚の儀を終えてしまった後のようだ
脅威はそればかりではなく、腐死竜の召喚をした
魔物たちは更なる軍勢の拡大を狙っているらしい
各召喚士群を全滅させ、最奥に潜む腐死竜へ挑め
column2:
Planning to summon the Rotting Dragon in the Volden Large Tunnels,
a horde of enemies has gathered—
It seems they have already completed the summoning ritual.
But the threat doesn't stop there; they've already succeeded in summoning the Rotting Dragon.
The enemies seem to be aiming to expand their forces even further.
Wipe out all groups of summoners and challenge the Rotting Dragon lurking at the deepest part.

column1:
白竜神殿・騎士団詰所のデュークと話し
ゲルト団長からの通達について確認せよ
column2: Talk to Duke at the White Dragon Temple Knight's Quarters and confirm the message from Captain Gerd.

column1:
ボルド大坑道にて召喚士の名を持つワイトの軍勢が
魔物を呼び寄せている
魔壁を打ち破り、封印された最奥の地へ急げ
column2: In the Volden Large Tunnels, an army of Wights bearing the title of Summoner is summoning enemies. Break through the magic barrier and hasten to the deepest sealed grounds.

column1:
ボルド大坑道にて召喚士の名を持つワイトの軍勢が
魔物を呼び寄せている
白衛騎士団が部隊を投じて調査にあたっていたが
早期の対処が必須とゲルト団長が判断
覚者への協力要請が伝えられた
召喚士群を至急全滅させ、封印せし魔壁内部へ急げ
column2: In the Volden Large Tunnels, an army of Wights with the title of summoner is summoning enemies. The White Knight Order has deployed a unit to investigate the situation. Captain Gerd has deemed early intervention essential, and a request for assistance has been delivered to the Arisen. Hurry and eliminate the group of summoners, and make your way inside the sealed magical wall.

column1:
アルタード・ズールによる魔赤島襲撃が
突如始まってしまった――
ズールを守らんとする魔物の存在も確認されている
不死身の存在を排除する手段はあるのだろうか？
幾度となく復活してくる強敵を、完全に滅ぼす
その時まで戦いは終わらない、平穏は訪れない
column2:
A sudden attack by Altered Zuhl on Bloodbane Isle has begun.
The presence of enemies trying to protect Zuhl has also been confirmed.
Is there a way to eliminate this invincible existence?
The battle will not end until the formidable enemy, who keeps resurrecting countless times, is completely annihilated.
Peace will not come until that time.

column1:
白竜神殿・港洞のトラバースより
魔赤島で起きた問題について確認せよ
column2: From Travers of the White Dragon Temple's Cave Harbor, please verify the issue that occurred on Bloodbane Isle.

column1:
アルタード・ズールとの戦いは続いている
入念な準備と効果的な戦略を用意して
対抗せよ
column2:
The battle against the Altered Zuhl continues.
Prepare thoroughly and devise effective strategies.
Take on the challenge.

column1:
アルタード・ズールの軍勢が、突如魔赤島への
襲撃を開始した
ズールの生命はやはり不死身なのだろうか
幾度となく復活を遂げる魔物への対処法はあるのか
今回こそは、ヤツを完全に仕留めるべく
考え得る最良の準備と戦略を用いて対抗せよ
column2: The Altered Zuhl's army suddenly began their raid on Bloodbane Isle. Is Zuhl truly immortal? Is there a way to deal with the monsters that have repeatedly come back to life? This time, prepare and strategize with the best possible plan to completely take it down.
The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple

column1:
おぞましい数の侵食魔が《シェドレアン大神殿》に
跋扈しはじめた――魔物は神殿全域を蝕んでいるため
討伐隊メンバーを２手に分けて一気に殲滅する作戦を
遂行中とのことだ
侵食が極度に進行した魔物も確認されているようで
侵食魔への対策は怠らぬよう厳命が下っている
column2: A horde of abominable, corrupted creatures has begun to run rampant in the Shadolean Great Temple. The members of the extermination squad have divided into two groups, carrying out a coordinated assault to annihilate them all at once. It has been reported that some of the creatures have been severely corrupted. Urgent orders have been given to ensure that countermeasures against the corruption are not neglected.

column1:
ダナ・セントラムのデリーンより
シェドレアン大神殿での問題を確認せよ
column2:
From Deleen of Dana Centrum,
Please verify the issue at the Shadolean Great Temple.

column1:
フィンダム大陸にて、侵食魔の動きが
活発になっているとの情報が届いている
ファーラナ平原にあるダナ村にて詳細を調べよ
column2: We have received information that the movement of the corrupted has become active in the continent of Phindym. Investigate the details in the village of Dana in the Farana Plains.

column1:
シェドレアン大神殿全域に侵食魔が出現した
アデルドナハと共する戦士が、急ぎ対応に向かったが
おびただしい数の侵食魔を前に救援要請が届いている
シェドレアン大神殿へ進攻し、侵食魔の拡がりを
最小限に食い止めよ
column2: The infected demons have appeared in the entire area of the Shadolean Great Temple. The soldiers who accompany Adair Donnchadh hurriedly headed to respond, but a request for reinforcement has been received in front of an enormous number of infected demons. Proceed to the Shadolean Great Temple and stop the spread of the infection as much as possible.

column1:
フィンダムの未来を賭けた精霊竜との戦いは
芯なる樹の樹内で起きた出来事のひとつとして
この聖なる不思議な場所に記憶された
その記憶を求める一部の覚者にとって
それは過去を越える壮絶な試練となって
相対することになるだろう
column2: The battle with the Spirit Dragon for future of Phindym, was one of the events that took place inside Core Tree. The memory of this event was stored in this holy and mysterious place. For some Arisen who seek this memory, it will become a tremendous trial that surpasses the past, as they come face to face with it.

column1:
ダナ・セントラムのリアガンより
芯なる樹が記憶する戦いについて確認せよ
column2: From Riagan of Dana Centrum, confirm what the core tree remembers of the battle.

column1:
ダナ・セントラムのリアガンより
芯なる樹が記憶する戦いについて
詳細を調べよ
column2: From Riagan of Dana Centrum, confirm what the core tree remembers of the battle.

column1:
フィンダムの未来を賭けた精霊竜との戦いは
芯なる樹の樹内で起きた出来事のひとつとして
この聖なる不思議な場所に記憶されている
再びその戦いの中に身を投じ、覚者として
壮絶な試練を乗り越えよ
column2: The battle with the Spirit Dragon, which determined the future of Phindym, is one of the events that took place within the Core Tree. This holy and mysterious place holds the memory of that battle. Once again, immerse yourself in that battle as an Arisen. Overcome the fierce trials that await you.

column1:
ジフール砦を悪しき竜軍が征服したようだ
砦へ入るための跳ね橋は吊り上げられ
内部へ進入することも難しい――召喚士による魔物の
召喚が絶えず行われており敵軍の征圧を阻害してくる
召喚士への道は塞がれているが、砦内に点在する
呪符への対処が砦攻略の鍵となるだろう
column2: It seems that the evil dragon army has conquered Jifule Fortress. The drawbridge for entering the fortress is raised, making it difficult to proceed inside. Summoners continuously summon monsters, hindering the enemy's suppression. While the path to the summoners is blocked, dealing with the runes scattered throughout the fortress is likely the key to capturing it.

column1:
ミッションに参加する場合は
展望城にいるウォルトより
詳細を確認せよ
column2: To join the mission, go to Walt at the Lookout Castle for more information.

column1:
ジフール砦を悪しき竜軍が征服したようだ
砦へ入るための跳ね橋は吊り上げられ内部へ
進入することも難しい――更に、召喚士による
魔物の召喚が絶えず行われ骸の巣窟と化している
召喚士は砦中に呪符を仕掛けており、砦を攻め
落とすにはこれら罠への正確な対処が不可欠だ
column2: It seems that the evil dragon army has conquered Jifule Fortress. The drawbridge for entering the fortress is raised, making it difficult to proceed inside. Furthermore, summoners constantly summon enemies, turning it into a nest of corpses. The summoners have set amulets throughout the fortress, and dealing with these traps accurately is essential to capturing the fortress.

column1:
ジフール砦を悪しき竜軍が征服したようだ
砦へ入るための跳ね橋は吊り上げられ内部へ
進入することも難しい――更に、召喚士による
魔物の召喚が絶えず行われ骸の巣窟と化している
召喚士は砦中に呪符を仕掛けており、砦を攻め
落とすにはこれら罠への正確な対処が不可欠だ
column2: It seems that the evil dragon army has conquered Jifule Fortress. The drawbridge for entering the fortress is raised, making it difficult to proceed inside. Furthermore, summoners constantly summon enemies, turning it into a nest of corpses. The summoners have set amulets throughout the fortress, and dealing with these traps accurately is essential to capturing the fortress.

column1:
ジフール砦でのウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column2: The war missions at Jifule Fortress have concluded. We will provide reports on the achievements of each battle shortly. Until then, please remain on standby.

column1:
ジフール砦でのウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column2: The war missions at Jifule Fortress have concluded. We will provide reports on the achievements of each battle shortly. Until then, please remain on standby.

column1:
ダクレイム砦を悪しき竜軍が征服したようだ
場内はオークや大型の魔物で各エリアが占領され
大砲の弾が容赦なく降り注ぐ戦闘地帯となっている
まずは砦内へ進攻する手段を企て、戦況を好転させよ
悪しき竜軍側の反撃を抑え戦力を削り、砦最奥に潜む
獣の将を討伐して砦を奪還するのだ
column2: It seems that the evil Dragon Army has conquered the Dacreim Fortress. The area is occupied by orcs and large monsters, turning it into a battlefield where cannonballs rain mercilessly. First, we need to devise a plan to infiltrate the fortress and turn the tide of the battle. Suppress the evil Dragon Army's counterattack and weaken their forces, then defeat the Beast Master lurking in the depths of the fortress to reclaim it.

column1:
ミッションに参加する場合は
ティネス砦のアシュトンより
詳細を確認せよ
column2:
If you are participating in the mission,
please confirm the details from Ashton of Fort Thines.

column1:
ダクレイム砦を悪しき竜軍が征服したようだ
場内はオークや大型の魔物で各エリアが占領され
大砲の弾が容赦なく降り注ぐ戦闘地帯となっている
まずは砦内へ進攻する手段を企て、戦況を好転させよ
悪しき竜軍側の反撃を抑え戦力を削り、砦最奥に潜む
獣の将を討伐して砦を奪還するのだ
column2: It seems that the evil Dragon Army has conquered the Dacreim Fortress. The area is occupied by orcs and large monsters, turning it into a battlefield where cannonballs rain mercilessly. First, we need to devise a plan to infiltrate the fortress and turn the tide of the battle. Suppress the evil Dragon Army's counterattack and weaken their forces, then defeat the Beast Master lurking in the depths of the fortress to reclaim it.

column1:
ダクレイム砦でのウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column2: War missions at Dacreim Fortress have ended. We will provide reports on the achievements of each individual battle shortly. Until then, please remain on standby.

column1:
ダクレイム砦でのウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column2: War missions at Dacreim Fortress have ended. We will provide reports on the achievements of each individual battle shortly. Until then, please remain on standby.
The Deathly Battle of the Forest of Mist

column1:
霧の森に突如、闇の軍勢が出現した
内部は複数のルートに分かれており
征圧ポイントが点在している
敵軍による突然の襲撃が予想されており
慌ただしく変化する戦況を見定めながら
戦い抜かねばならない
column2: Suddenly, a dark army appeared in the Forest of Mist. The interior is divided into multiple routes, with various conquer points scattered throughout. A sudden attack by the enemy forces is anticipated, and we must fight through the rapidly changing battlefield while assessing the situation.

column1:
ミッションに参加する場合は
メガドにいるアッバスより
詳細を確認せよ
column2: If you are participating in the mission, please confirm the details from Abbas at Megado.

column1:
霧の森に突如、闇の軍勢が出現した
内部は複数のルートに分かれており
征圧ポイントが点在している
敵軍による突然の襲撃が予想されており
慌ただしく変化する戦況を見定めながら
戦い抜かねばならない

それまでは待機とする
column2: The war missions in the Forest of Mist have ended. Reports on each individual battle achievement will be provided shortly. Until then, please remain on standby.
Resurrection of the Flame of Despair

column1:
火垂れ山にて、ネド王子と白竜の覚者により滅ぼされた
悪しき竜だったが、四散した禍々しき竜力は
大地の浄化の流れに背くように山の不滅の炎と結び
つき、再び絶望を吐き散らす竜の姿となり動き出した
蘇った悪しき竜を討ち破り、つなぎ止めた希望を
死守せよ！
column2: At Firefall Mountain, the evil dragon, who was destroyed by Prince Nedo and the Arisen of the White Dragon, has arisen again. The malevolent dragon power that scattered has merged with the everlasting flame of the mountain, going against the flow of the earth's purification, and has taken on the form of a dragon once again, spewing despair. Defeat the revived evil dragon and protect the hope that has been bound and preserved!

column1:
ミッションに参加する場合は
火垂れ山野営地にいるザカリーより
詳細を確認せよ
column2: If you are participating in the mission, please confirm the details from Zachary at the Firefall Mountain Campsite.

column1:
火垂れ山にて、ネド王子と白竜の覚者により滅ぼされた
悪しき竜だったが、四散した禍々しき竜力は
大地の浄化の流れに背くように山の不滅の炎と結び
つき、再び絶望を吐き散らす竜の姿となり動き出した
蘇った悪しき竜を討ち破り、つなぎ止めた希望を
死守せよ！

The malevolent dragon power that scattered has merged with the everlasting flame of the mountain, going against the flow of the earth's purification, and has taken on the form of a dragon once again, spewing despair. Defeat the revived evil dragon and protect the hope that has been bound and preserved!

column1:
火垂れ山でのウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column2: The war mission at Firefall Mountain has ended. Reports on each individual battle achievement will be provided shortly. Until then, please remain on standby.

火垂れ山でのウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column2: The war mission at Firefall Mountain has ended. Reports on each individual battle achievement will be provided shortly. Until then, please remain on standby.

column1: アッカーシェラン追懐戦記

絶望に覆われた大地――
悪しき竜とその軍勢によって、全てが奪われたこの地で
覚者は戦い、消えかけていた希望を確かなものに
変えていった――
白竜の覚者よ、アッカーシェランを襲った数々の脅威に
今再び立ち向かえ
column2:
The land covered in despair - 
In this land where everything has been taken by the evil dragon and its forces, 
the Arisen fought to turn the fading hope into something certain - 
Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon, face once again the numerous threats that have befallen Acre Selund.

column1:
ミッションに参加する場合は
メガドにいるレイモンドより
詳細を確認せよ
column2: If you are participating in the mission, please confirm the details from Raymond at Megado.

column1:
絶望に覆われた大地――
悪しき竜とその軍勢によって、全てが奪われたこの地で
覚者は戦い、消えかけていた希望を確かなものに
変えていった――
白竜の覚者よ、アッカーシェランを襲った数々の脅威に
今再び立ち向かえ
column2:
The land covered in despair - 
In this land where everything has been taken by the evil dragon and its forces, 
the Arisen fought to turn the fading hope into something certain - 
Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon, face once again the numerous threats that have befallen Acre Selund.

覚者は戦い、消えかけていた希望を確かなものに
変えていった――
白竜の覚者よ、アッカーシェランを襲った数々の脅威に
今再び立ち向かえ
column2:
The land covered in despair - 
In this land where everything has been taken by the evil dragon and its forces, 
the Arisen fought to turn the fading hope into something certain - 
Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon, face once again the numerous threats that have befallen Acre Selund.

column1:
戦闘中、物理攻撃力／魔法攻撃力／物理防御力／魔法防御力が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にステータスアップ効果がより上昇</COL>
column2:
During battle, Physical Attack/Magick Attack/
Physical Defense/Magick Defense are increased.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases the effectiveness.</COL>

column1:
アバドーンの弱点部位に一定量のダメージを与えると
大ダメージを与える追撃が発生する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に追撃のダメージがより増加</COL>
column2:
Deal a great amount damage to Abaddon after you inflict
a certain amount of damage to its weak point.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases bonus damage.</COL>

column1:
バフォメットの弱点部位に一定量のダメージを与えると

<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に追撃のダメージがより増加</COL>
column2:
Deal a great amount damage to Baphomet after you inflict
a certain amount of damage to its weak point.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases bonus damage.</COL>

column1:
黒騎士の弱点部位に一定量のダメージを与えると
大ダメージを与える追撃が発生する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に追撃のダメージがより増加</COL>
column2:
Deal a great amount damage to Black Knight after you inflict
a certain amount of damage to its weak point.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases bonus damage.</COL>

column1:
黒竜の弱点部位、または黒竜により召喚された竜晶に
一定量のダメージを与えると、大ダメージを与える追撃が発生する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に追撃のダメージがより増加</COL>
column2:
Deal a great amount damage to Black Dragon and the summoned
Dragon Crystal after you inflict a certain amount of damage
to them.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases bonus damage.</COL>

column1:
大ダメージを受けるアバドーンの攻撃＜キラーアルベ＞の
ダメージを軽減する。残り体力が少ない場合は発動しない
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージをさらに軽減</COL>
column2:
Reduces damage of fatal attacks from Abaddon. Does not activate
if your health is low.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further reduces damage.</COL>

column1:
敵が攻撃を放ったタイミングで、攻撃してきた部位や周囲の
弱点部位を攻撃すると《精霊竜の反撃アイコン》が増加する
アイコンが満了になると破壊可能部位へのダメージが大幅に増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
column2:
When enemy strikes, attacking the part used by the attack
will increase the "Spirit Dragon Counterattack Gauge".
When the gauge is full, damage to destructible parts
is greatly increased.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases bonus damage.</COL>

column1:
闇炎の状態異常にかかった際に回復までの時間を短縮する
回復までの時間は、付与される毎にやや増減する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復までの時間がさらに短縮</COL>
column2:
Shorten the recovery time of Dark Flame debilitation. The time
needed slightly increases or decreases each time this is triggered.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further shortens the recovery time.</COL>

column1:
敵の＜魔法攻撃力上昇＞に合わせて
魔法攻撃のダメージを無効化するバリアを展開する
バリア展開中は筋力／魔力／疲労攻力／チャンス攻力が増加するが
魔法攻撃を受けるか時間経過によりバリアの耐久値は減少する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にステータスアップ効果／バリアの耐久値がより上昇</COL>
column2:
Create a barrier to disable the "Magick Attack Increase" buff
from enemy. While inside the barrier, Strength/Magick/
Chance Attack/Exhaust Attack are increased. The durability of the
barrier deteriotates over time and magick damage taken.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases the stat bonus and duration
of the barrier.</COL>

column1:
敵の＜物理攻撃力上昇＞に合わせて
物理攻撃のダメージを無効化するバリアを展開する
バリア展開中は筋力／魔力／疲労攻力／チャンス攻力が増加するが
物理攻撃を受けるか時間経過によりバリアの耐久値は減少する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にステータスアップ効果／バリアの耐久値がより上昇</COL>
column2:
Create a barrier to disable the "Physical Attack Increase" buff
from enemy. While inside the barrier, Strength/Magick/
Chance Attack/Exhaust Attack are increased. The durability of the
barrier deteriotates over time and physical damage taken.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases the stat bonus and duration
of the barrier.</COL>

column1:
敵の＜鎧硬化＞に合わせて
吹き飛ばし力が増加し、鎧硬化状態を解除しやすくなる
鎧硬化状態を解除すると、敵が体勢を崩している間
筋力／魔力／疲労攻力／チャンス攻力が増加する追加効果が発動する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にステータスアップ効果がより上昇</COL>
column2:
Blow power increases in response to "Armor Harden" state triggered
by enemy, making it easier to break through their armor. When the
enemy is in the staggered state, Strength/Magick/Exhaust Attack/
Chance Attack increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases the stat bonus.</COL>

column1:
ボス撃破時に獲得できる宝箱報酬が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に報酬がより増加</COL>
column2:
Increases the reward from chests after killing the boss.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases the reward.</COL>

column1:
黄金竜の攻撃により、敵の特定の攻撃を中断する
攻撃を中断すると＜破滅の力＞の蓄積量が減少する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に破滅の力の減少量がより増加</COL>
column2:
The Golden Dragon attacks, trying to interrupt a specific
attack of the enemy. If the interruption succeeds, the
"Power of Destruction" is lowered.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further decreases the Destruction power.</COL>

Seized small knife.
The blade appears to be dull, so its killing power is likely low.
The handle has the characters engraved, and it can be read as B-A-S-I-T.

column1:
メガドのゴロツキリーダーが
自警のため自主的に作成した市民名簿
一般市民だけでなく、闇に生きる
はみ出し者たちまでが網羅されている
本人の超記憶能力と照らし合わせているため
正確性は高いらしい
column2:
Megado's Thug Leader created a citizen register voluntarily for self-defense.
Not only regular citizens, but also those who live in the dark, including outcasts, are included.
Due to their extraordinary memory abilities, the accuracy of the register is said to be high.

column1:
メガドを縄張りにする子供から聞いた目撃証言
“ <NPC 691>は数度にわたって彼らの縄張りに
　踏み込み、覚者たちを尾行するための
　事前調査を行っていた ”
という旨の内容
column2:
Approximate eyewitness testimony from a child in the Megado's territory:
"<NPC 691> trespassed into their territory several times, conducting preliminary investigations to tail the Arisen Corps members."

column1:
汚い字でメモが書き込んである
“ ＜20時　対象を確認＞
　　場所：メガド居住区侯爵邸前
　　人数：2名
　　報告：ターゲットがレジスタンスと接触
　　　　　隠れ家へ向かうと思われるため
　　　　　引き続き、追跡監視の任務続行 ”
以下、同じような記録が淡々と続いている
column2:
The memo is written in messy handwriting.
"<20:00 Target Confirmation>
Location: In front of the Megado Residential District Marquis Mansion
Number of People: 2
Report: Target has made contact with the Resistance and is believed to be heading towards their hideout. The mission of tracking and surveillance will continue."
Similar records continue in a matter-of-fact manner.

column1:
憲兵が落とした日々の巡回記録
複数の憲兵により異なる筆跡で書かれているが
どれも書式は共通している
“ ＜22時　対象を確認＞
　　場所：メガド居住区東小門前
　　人数：5名
　　報告：通報のあった結社集会の現場を発見
　　　　　構成員は全て市民のため
　　　　　その場で拘束・連行し、任務完了 ”
以下、同じような記録が淡々と続いている
column2:
Daily Patrol Records Dropped by the Military Police.
Written in different handwriting by multiple military policemen,
but all the formats are the same.
"<22:00 Confirm target>
Location: Megado Residential Area, East Gate
Number of people: 5
Report: Discovered the site of a reported association gathering
 All members are citizens
 Arrested and taken into custody on the spot, mission complete"
Following that, similar records continue in a steady manner.

column1:
元憲兵の男が、獄中で書いた手記
“ 任務で小さなミスを犯し、侯爵の怒りを
　買ったために投獄された ”
という内容で、獄中の苦しい状況などが
克明に描写されている
ところどころがシミで汚れており読みづらい
column2:
Memoirs Written by a Former Military Police Officer in Prison
The handwritten memoirs of a former military police officer, who was imprisoned after committing a minor mistake on a mission and incurring the wrath of a nobleman.
The memoirs vividly depict the harsh conditions experienced in prison, although some parts are difficult to read due to stains.

column1:
連絡が途絶えた一人息子を想う父の
愛情が詰まった手作りのお守り
息子を憲兵隊に送り出す際に
渡し損ねたことを悔やむ日々が
傷だらけの表面に現れている
column2: A handmade amulet filled with a father's love, yearning for his son who he lost contact with. The days of regret for not being able to hand it over when sending his son off to the Military Police are evident on its scarred surface.

column1:
<NPC 586>と密通していたオークが
持っていた文書
オークの暗号文字で書かれており
読むことはできない
column2:
The document was in the possession of an Orc who was in secret communication with <NPC 586>.
It is written in Orc code letters and cannot be read.

column1:
オークの専門家が人語に翻訳してくれた
オーク軍の密通文書
“ オーク軍は要請に応え、
　メガドに援軍を手配した ”
という旨の内容
column2:
The Orc specialist has translated the confidential communication documents of the Orc army into human language.
"Orc Forces responded to the request and arranged for reinforcements to be sent to Megado."

column1:
オークの被害を受けた少女から聞いた
街に増加するオークについての目撃証言
“ 近頃急速に街中で目撃数が増加している
　オークたちは何かを探している様子
　人なのか物なのか、任務なのかは不明 ”
という旨の内容で、出没し始めた時期は
<NPC 586>の死亡・オークの尋問開始と
重なっている模様
column2:
From a girl who was affected by the Orcs' rampage, an eyewitness account about the increasing number of sightings of Orcs in the city.
"The number of sightings in the city has been rapidly increasing lately. The Orcs seem to be looking for something. Whether it's a person or an object, or if it's a mission, is unknown."
It seems that their appearance coincides with the death of <NPC 586> and the start of Orc interrogations.

column1:
<NPC 681>侯爵が描かれた肖像画
高価な貴族画ではなく
個人が安価に所有できる量産品である
雑な取扱いによる傷みはあるが、
顔かたちは十分に確認できる状態
column2:
Portrait depicting <NPC 681>, a marquis.
Not an expensive aristocratic painting, but a mass-produced item that individuals can afford.
There may be some damage due to rough handling, but the facial features are clearly discernible.

column1:
ある兵士から聞いた、メガド占領時に
<NPC 681>が行った英雄的行為の証言
“ ナヴィド侯爵は死の危険を冒し、果敢にも
  人間への残虐な仕打ちを止めるよう
  オーク軍と交渉した
  その後も市民の統率者として、オーク側との
  橋渡しを行い、犠牲者を抑える功績を残す ”
という旨の内容
column2:
Testimony of the heroic deeds performed by <NPC 681> during the Megado occupation, as told by a soldier:
"Lord Navido bravely risked his life and daringly negotiated with the Orc army to put an end to their cruel treatment of humans. Even after that, as a leader of the citizens, he acted as a bridge between the Orc side, leaving behind the achievement of minimizing casualties."

column1:
侯爵家を出入りしていた戦士が
偶然入手した謎の帳簿
かなり使い込まれているようで
几帳面な字で文字と数字が羅列されている
“オーク”という言葉が頻出している
column2:
A soldier who frequented the Marquis' household happened to come across a mysterious ledger. 
It appears to have been heavily used, with neat handwriting and a series of characters and numbers listed. 
The word "Orc" is frequently mentioned.

column1:
捕えたオークから尋問によって全てを吐かせた
<NPC 681>とオーク軍の機密についての証言

“ メガド陥落は、悲観した<NPC 681>侯爵の
  手引きによって引き起こされた事件であり
  陥落後も彼はオーク軍と取引し
  捕虜の統括に対する報酬を受け取っていた ”

という旨の内容となっている
column2:
The capture of <NPC 681> and interrogation of the orc revealed the following confidential information:

'Megado's fall was an event instigated through the guidance of the despairing Marquis <NPC 681>. Even after the fall, he continued to deal with the Orc army and received rewards for overseeing the prisoners.'

column1:
監修ガクシャ・制作セリンで捏造した
オーク軍の手配書

“ 人間に寝返った伝令兵を捜索中 ”

という旨の内容になっており
尋問で使用すれば
裏切りに対する報復を恐れるオークを
騙すことが出来るかもしれない
column2:
A fabricated wanted poster created by Supervisor Raksha and produced by Serine, 

"Searching for a defected messenger soldier"
It contains a message that may deceive the Orcs, who fear retaliation for their betrayal, when used for interrogation.

column1: お手製のメガド市民名簿
証言：怪しげな行動をとる<NPC 691>

column2: Memorandum of a Former Military Police

column1: オーク軍の密通文書・翻訳版
証言：メガドに出没するオークたち
証言：オーク軍の機密情報
column2: Testimony: Confidential Information of the Orc Army

column1: イベントリストを開く
イベントがありません

かつて覚者はレスタニアの王、そして次代の竜にな
るさだめだった
　しかし、３２４年前に状況が変わった。黄金竜との
戦いで傷ついた白竜が完全なる回復を遂げるまでの
間、自らを守る戦士として数人の覚者を生み出したの
だ
　彼らは古来からの作法に従い、白竜に心臓を預ける
代わりに竜力を受け取った。回復の途上にある白竜を
狙って近づく魔物を蹴散らすことが彼らのさだめだっ
た。希望者は絶えることなく、白竜は定期的に覚者を
増やした
　やがて、時とともに覚者たちの意識に変化が生じ
た。白竜のそばに控えることが、すべてではなくなっ
たのだ
　彼らはレスタニア全土に広がり、各地で暮らす人々
のために戦うようになった。土地に縛られず、あちこ
ちを移動して問題を解決する者も現れ、頼りにされる
ようになった
　もちろん、昔と同じく、この神殿に集う者も少なく
はない。今回誕生した覚者たちはどうだろう
　さて、気になる事件が二件起こっている。グリッテ
ン砦が、ついにオークどもに侵入されてしまった
　守備隊のヴァネッサと応援に行ったレオたちが見事
撃退したようだが、今後のオークの動向が気になると
ころだ
　加えて、多くの人々が目撃した、空を横切る巨大な
石塊も悩ましい。天変地異の類か、それとも誰か――
たとえば、信じがたいがオーク――の仕業か
　どこに落ちたのだろうか。ゲルト騎士団長が落下地
点を特定するための捜索部隊を派遣したとの報告を受
けている
column2:
Once, the Arisen were the kings of Lestania and destined to become the next dragons.
However, the situation changed 324 years ago. 
The White Dragon, who was injured in a battle against the Golden Dragon, gave birth to several Arisen to protect themselves until it fully recovered.
Following the ancient traditions, they entrusted their hearts to the White Dragon and received the power of the dragons in return. It was their destiny to scatter monsters approaching the White Dragon in the process of recovery. The White Dragon continued to create new Arisen regularly, as there were always those who sought to become one.

Eventually, the consciousness of the Arisen began to change over time. Being by the side of the White Dragon was no longer their sole purpose. They spread across all of Lestania, fighting for the people living in various places. Some even traveled around, solving problems wherever they went and became relied upon.

Of course, there are still those who gather in this temple, just like in the old days. What about the Arisen that have been born this time?

Now, there are two troubling incidents. Fort Gritten has finally been invaded by orcs.
It seems that Vanessa of the defense force and Leo, who went to support her, successfully repelled them, but we are concerned about the future movements of the orcs.

Additionally, a large boulder crossing the sky, witnessed by many people, is also worrying. Is it a natural disaster or the doing of someone—perhaps even the unbelievable act of orcs?

Where did it fall? Gerd, the commander of the knight order, has received a report that a search team has been dispatched to locate the point of impact.

column1:
覚者を束ねるレオは、時折新人覚者を連れてきて我
々に紹介する
　特段の便宜を計るようにそれとなく伝えてくるの
だ。なんらかの輝きを持つとレオが認めた者らしい
　今日もひとり、新人を連れてきた。わたしには覚者
の資質は皆目わからない。これは率直に認めるしかな
い
　しかし、覚者とて人である。人の善し悪しの見極め
は、この神殿では年長の部類に入るわたしの使命だと
密かに自認している
　さて、あの覚者はどうだろう。レオの人使いの荒さ
についてゆくことができるだろうか
　ともあれ神殿に集う顔ぶれの変化は好ましいこと
だ。新人が竜力の流れを活性化するような気がする
　老いて、肉体ばかりか精神も鈍重になったが、わた
しはまだここを去りたくはない。空気が淀み、その原
因がたとえ自分だとしても退場はまだ先にしたい
　故に、わたしは新しい顔を歓迎するのだ
column2:
Leo, who leads the Arisen, occasionally brings new Arisen to introduce them to us.
He subtly conveys the message that he expects us to accommodate them.
It seems that Leo has recognized them as someone with some kind of brilliance.
Today, he brought another newcomer. I really have no idea about the potential of an Arisen.
I can only be honest and admit this.
However, an Arisen is still a person. Assessing the goodness or badness of a person is secretly my mission as one of the elders of this temple.

Now, how will that Arisen fare? Will they be able to withstand Leo's rough handling of people?

In any case, it is good that the faces in the temple are changing. I have a feeling that newcomers can activate the flow of Dragon Force.

Though I have grown old and not just physically but mentally sluggish, I still don't want to leave this place. Even if the air stagnates, even if it's because of myself, I still want to stay a little longer.

That's why I welcome the new faces.

column1:
グリッテン砦の修復は着々と進んでいるようだ。幸
いヴァネッサたちハイデル平原守備隊の士気も高いま
まだ
　油断があったことを率直に認め、対策を講じること
で、今回の敵の侵入も良い経験とすることができるだ
ろう
　さて、久しぶりに白竜の前に《ブラッドオーブ》が
運ばれてきた。手に入れたのはレオが気に入っている
新人の覚者だ。なるほど、なかなか見込みがあるにち
がいない
　これで白竜の石化は回復し、進行も速度を下げるだ
ろう。効果は一時的で対症療法に過ぎないが、目下我
々に許された方法は《ブラッドオーブ》以外にはない
のだ
　悲観的な見方をする者もいるようだが、有効な方法
が判明しているだけマシだと考えた方が良いはずだ
column2:
The restoration of Fort Gritten is steadily progressing. Fortunately, the morale of Vanessa and the Hidell Plains Defense Corps remains high. However, we must admit our negligence and take measures to handle the enemy's invasion. It can be considered a valuable experience.
Now, after a long time, the《Blood Orb》has been brought before the White Dragon. Leo's new and promising Arisen acquired it. Indeed, they show great potential.

With this, the petrification of the White Dragon will be healed, slowing down its progress. Although the effect is temporary and only a palliative measure, there is no other method available to us at the moment.

Some may have a pessimistic view, but it is best to consider that we have discovered an effective method.

column1:
テル村事件の顛末を覚書として残しておく
　魔物退治の兵を派遣してくれとの要請を受けたゲル
ト騎士団長は、すぐに副長ハインツを指揮官とする騎
士たちを向かわせた。その後、村からの要請は何故か
レオにまで伝わり、覚者ガルドリンが派遣された
　騎士団と覚者たちの対立は絶えたことがない。今回
も現場のテル村で両者が揉めてしまったようだ。誤り
に気づいたレオが、仲裁のために派遣した新人覚者の
機転で大事には至らなかった。だが、この長く続く対
立は伝統という言葉ですませてしまって良いのだろう
か
　確執を原因とする手柄争いが良い具合に両者の士気
を高めているという意見があることは知っている。し
かし、両者から互いへの悪口雑言を聞かされるわたし
の立場も考えてほしいものだ
　我々の目下の敵はオークだ。内輪揉めはやめて、白
竜の下、心一つになろうではないか
column2:
Memo: The Conclusion of the Tel Village Incident
Upon receiving a request for assistance in fighting off monsters, Captain Gerd of the Knight Order immediately dispatched a group of knights under the command of Vice-Captain Heinz. Later on, the request somehow reached Leo, and the Arisen Gurdolin was sent to the village.
The conflict between the knights and the Arisen has always been ongoing. Once again, they clashed at the scene of the incident in Tel Village. Thanks to the quick thinking of a new Arisen who was sent as a mediator, Leo, the situation did not escalate. However, is it acceptable to brush off this long-lasting feud simply as a tradition?

I know that some argue that this rivalry born out of disputes boosts the morale of both parties. Nevertheless, please consider my position as well, as I am exposed to insults and slander from both sides.

Our current enemy is the Orcs. Let us put an end to internal conflicts and unite under the banner of the White Dragon.

column1:
飛来した巨大な石と思われる物体を我々は大石塊
（アーク）と呼ぶことにした
　およその落下地点も判明しており、正確な場所の把
握まであと一歩というところだ
　すでに調査隊の編成も始まっている。アークの正体
については悲観的な思いがある。だがそれを口に出し
てどうなるものではない。ほどなく派遣される調査隊
が持ち帰るであろう報告を待って対応すべきだろう
　さて、覚者のひとりがポーンとの契約に挑むよう
だ。ポーンを連れ歩かない覚者も多いが、一度は契約
を交わすことが、一人前の覚者の条件だと言われてい
る。首尾良くやり遂げることを願ってやまない
　そういえば新人覚者たちはアルフレドと会ったのだ
ろうか。アルフレドは礼節を知る、素晴らしいエリア
マスターだ。もしまだなら、強制してでもテル村へ行
かせる必要がある
column2:
We have decided to call the object that appears to be a huge flying stone "The Ark." We have approximately determined the landing site, and we are just one step away from pinpointing the exact location.
The formation of the investigation team is already underway. There is a sense of pessimism surrounding The Ark's true identity. However, it is not productive to vocalize these concerns. We should wait for the report that the dispatched investigation team will bring back before taking any action.

By the way, one of the Arisen is about to challenge a contract with a Pawn. Many Arisen choose not to accompany a Pawn, but it is said that making a contract with one is a requirement to become a full-fledged Arisen. I hope they can successfully accomplish this.

Speaking of which, have the new Arisen met Alfred? Alfred is an excellent Area Master who knows proper etiquette. If they haven't met him yet, it is necessary to force them to go to Tel Village.

column1:
覚者とポーンによる契約の儀式は何度見ても慣れる
ということがない
　ポーンはどこから来るのだろうか。こことは異なる
別の世界の存在を思わずにはいられない
　幾つもの世界がポーンによって繋がっているのかも
しれないと想像しては、その途方もない無限に、わた
しは憧れ、怯えるのだ
　ともあれ、ポーンは現れ、契約は無事に交わされ
た。おめでとうと言わせてもらおう
column2:
No matter how many times I witness the ritual of the contract between the Arisen and the Pawn, I never get used to it.
