of hope. That is how determined he must be.
 Anyways, we should not take our eyes off of
Prince Ned from here on.

column1:
彼の地では盗賊たちの協力を得て王子の足取りを探
っているとのこと。ことこの件に関しては盗賊たちが
最後まで善人であることを切に望む
　聞くところによると王子の不在によって城内の空気
がゆるんできたとのこと。さもありなん。戦は半ば勢
いでするものと言っても過言ではない。王子にはまだ
その機微はわからないのであろう。多少でも理解が及
べばこのような不在はありえない。王子には猛省を促
したい
column2:
We acquired the assistance of the
Northern Bandits and are searching for
the prince. I hope that the bandits
remain honorable until the end.
 From what I hear with the prince's
disappearance the atmosphere in the castle
has become more lax. It stands to reason,
nobody wants to fight a war. A king would
not understand this. If they could understand,
he would not have disappeared. I urge
the prince to reconsider his actions.

column1:
エリオットの傷は快方に向かっているがまだ監視を
解くわけにはいかない。少し良くなると無茶をするに
決まっている。関係者には強く言い渡しておいた
　アッカーシェランではサマラの指輪探しが行われ、
これは我らの覚者の活躍によって無事に手に入ったと
のことだ。この指輪は閉ざされた門を開く力があるら
しい。事態は一歩前進といえよう
　しかしながらその踏み出した道はかつてないほどに
険しいと聞く。現地を行く覚者たちの無事を祈るしか
ない
　さてサマラの指輪のごとく思わぬ効果、価値を持つ
品はこのレスタニアにも数多くあるはずだ。それらを
一同に集めて神殿で管理することを検討しようと思
う。歴史的遺物の散逸は防がねばならない。レスタニ
アにもアッカーシェランと同じことが起こるかもしれ
ない。教訓は生かされねばならないのだ
column2:
Elliot's wounds are recovering, however
we must continue monitoring him. As soon
as he starts to feel better he will
surely attempt something reckless. I
informed the person handling him.
 The arisen searched for the Ring of
Samara in Acre Selund, and have finally
acquired it. It has the power to open the
sealed gate it seems. This is another
step forward.
 However I hear the path set before them
is rigorous. I can only pray for safety
of the arisen.
 Much like the Ring of Samara, there are
many objects here in Lestania with
unexpected effects. I am considering having
them gathered and kept here in the temple.
We must prevent these relics from being
lost to time. What is happening in Acre
Selund could happen here as well. We must
learn this lesson well.

column1:
アッカーシェランの動乱のほとぼりも冷めやらぬ中
で、白竜が掴み取った予兆は、このレスタニア、いや
竜の理の世界にとっては、あまりにも大きな禍の前触
れであった
　先の動乱の裏で、遠く離れた場所に存在していたで
あろう水竜が治める大陸は、既に黒竜と黒騎士、そし
てあろうことか、長らく行方知れずとなっていたレオ
によって滅ぼされたのだという
　その衝撃的な事実を我々が掴んだタイミングにおい
て、ついに黒竜は世界を滅ぼす皮切りとして、フィン
ダムの空に禍々しい滅びの渦を出現させたのだ
　フィンダムの滅びは、竜の理の世界の滅びに等し
い。白竜にフィンダムの救いを託された覚者たちは、
フィンダムの滅びの渦を消し去ろうと奔走する。そし
て渦の前で、あの黒騎士を伴ったレオと再会したのだ
そうだ。レオは彼らにはっきりと、黒竜の闇の陣営に
与したことを認めたのだという。なんと嘆かわしいこ
とだろうか
　レオは彼らに、竜の持つ竜力の争奪を匂わせ去って
行ったという。より多くの竜力を集めた方が、この戦
いの勝敗を握る鍵となるとも受け取れるが、果たして
その真意は未だに見えぬ
　フィンダムに現れた渦の勢いを一時的に弱めること
には成功したが、渦を完全に消し去ることは叶わず、
今後も渦の魔物を幾度となく打ち払う飽くなき戦いが
予想されるだろう
column2:
In the midst of the still raging turmoil in Acre Selund, the White Dragon's premonition was a harbinger of great disaster for the world of Lestania, and indeed, for the world of dragonkind.
Behind the recent upheaval, on a distant continent ruled by the Water Dragon, the Black Dragon and the Black Knight, along with Leo, who had long been missing, had annihilated it.
At the moment we learned of this shocking fact, the Black Dragon, as a prelude to destroying the world, unleashed a sinister vortex of destruction in the skies of Phindym.

The destruction of Phindym is equivalent to the annihilation of the dragon world. The Arisen entrusted with the salvation of Phindym are striving to eradicate the Vortex of Stagnation. And there, they encountered Leo, accompanied by the Black Knight, before the vortex. It is said that Leo unreservedly admitted his allegiance to the dark forces of the Black Dragon. How tragic.

Leo hinted to them about the competition for Dragon Force possessed by the dragons. It can be inferred that acquiring more Dragon Force would be the key to determining the outcome of this battle, but the true intention behind it is still unclear.

Although they succeeded in temporarily weakening the force of the vortex that appeared in Phindym, they were unable to completely eliminate it, and a ceaseless battle of repelling the monsters within the vortex is anticipated in the future.

column1:
フィンダムに続き、アッカーシェランにも滅びの渦
が出現した
　渦は、大地に刺された黒剣を通じ、大地の竜力を吸
い上げて大陸を滅ぼそうとしていることは、先のフィ
ンダムの状況と変わりはないそうだ
　我々レスタニアもフィンダムの時と同じく、アッカ
ーシェランに現れた滅びの渦の直下、闇に覆われた王
都メガドを救うべく騎士団を派遣した
　ネド王子とレスタニアの騎士団の協力の元に、覚者
隊は渦の中へと突入し、渦の力を弱めることに成功し
た。しかし、渦から戻った覚者隊とそれを迎い受けた
ネド王子たちを嘲るように、黒騎士の声が天を衝き響
き渡ったという
　ネド王子から火竜の竜力を託された我が白竜の覚者
が、今や闇の陣営の障害となったことを認めた黒騎士
は、我が覚者と全てのレスタニアの覚者を抹殺すると
宣言したそうだ
　未だフィンダムとアッカーシェランの奮戦が続く深
刻な状況の中で、いよいよこのレスタニアに滅びの渦
が現れる事態に備えねばならないようだ
column2:
Following Phindym, a vortex of stagnation has appeared in Acre Selund as well.
The vortex is sucking up the dragon force from the earth through the black sword plunged into the ground, just like the situation in Phindym.
Just like during the Phindym incident, we sent a knight order to the capital city of Megado, which is directly beneath the vortex of stagnation that appeared in Acre Selund, enveloped in darkness, in order to save it.

Under the cooperation of Prince Nedo and the Lestania knight order, the Arisen squad successfully penetrated into the vortex and weakened its power. However, as the Arisen Corps returned from the vortex and were welcomed by Prince Nedo and the others, the voice of the Black Knight resounded throughout the heavens, mocking them.

The Black Knight, who acknowledged that the Arisen of our White Dragon, who had been entrusted with the dragon force of the Fire Dragon by Prince Nedo, had now become an obstacle for the forces of darkness, declared that he would exterminate our Arisen and all the Arisen of Lestania.

Amidst the dire situation of the ongoing fierce battle in Phindym and Acre Selund, it seems that we must now prepare for the appearance of a vortex of stagnation in Lestania as well.

column1:
アッカーシェランでの滅びの渦から戻った際に、黒
騎士からの宣告通り、レスタニアの中央、ダウ渓谷に
あるドリード城の空に滅びの渦が現れた
　各地に突き立てられた黒剣の排除と、襲い来る闇の
魔物に抗するために、すべてのレスタニアの騎士、覚
者が奮戦した
 多くの仲間の力に支えられた我が白竜の覚者は、黒
騎士の待つ闇の渦の中へ突入し決戦を挑んだ。だが闇
の中ではけして滅ぼすことのできない黒騎士に追い詰
められ苦戦の様相を呈した
　しかしなんということであろうか、その刹那、我が
白竜の覚者に託された理を守るそれぞれの竜、 すな
わち精霊竜、火竜、白竜の竜力の力が炎となり、滅ぼ
すことのできない黒騎士を滅したのだ
　宿敵の黒騎士を滅ぼした喜びも束の間、我が白竜の
覚者の前に再びレオが現れ、黒竜の到来、世界の滅び
の予告をしたのだ。もはや竜力の争奪をする猶予など
なくなったといえよう。これでわたしの覚悟も定まっ
た。今の成し得た力の全てを持ってして、世界の命運
を、我が白竜の覚者に託すとしよう
column2:
Upon returning from the Vortex of Stagnation in Acre Selund, as proclaimed by the Black Knight, a Vortex of Stagnation appeared in the sky above Dowe Valley in the center of Lestania.
To combat the dark creatures that attacked, all the knights and Arisen of Lestania fought valiantly to eliminate the black swords erected throughout the land.
Supported by the power of many allies, our Arisen of the White Dragon plunged into the Vortex of Darkness to challenge the Black Knight. However, in the darkness, the Arisen struggled against the Black Knight, who could not be defeated.

But in that moment, the essence of each dragon entrusted to the Arisen of our White Dragon, namely the Spirit Dragon, Fire Dragon, and the power of the White Dragon's Dragon Force, turned into flames and destroyed the invincible Black Knight.

The joy of vanquishing the archenemy, the Black Knight, was short-lived as Leo appeared once again before our Arisen of the White Dragon, predicting the arrival of the Black Dragon and the world's destruction. We can no longer afford to compete for the Dragon Force. My resolve is now solidified. With all the power I have obtained, I will entrust the fate of the world to our Arisen of the White Dragon.

column1:
ついにメルゴダの深淵の空に、黒竜自らがこの世界
を滅ぼすためにくぐり抜ける渦が現れた
　もはやレスタニアで動ける騎士と覚者は一握りとな
った今、黒剣の発見には、クラウスがいちはやく亡都
メルゴダに目星をつけ、錬金術師たちの中心となり動
いてくれた
　亡都メルゴダで錬金術師たちの協力のもとに黒剣を
全て破壊した我が覚者は、最後の滅びの渦へ渡るた
め、メルゴダ護政区にあるメルゴダの深淵へと向かっ
た
　メルゴダの深淵の淵に開いた、滅びの渦へのゲート
の前でミシアルが現れ、黒竜を倒すことが世界を滅び
から救う唯一の道だと告げたと言う
　滅びの渦の中では、レオが我が覚者を待ち受けてい
た。レオは、黒竜を倒し得る唯一無二の存在となるた
めにすべてを、そう、自らをも犠牲にして動いていた
ようだ。世界を救える存在は、自身、または我が白竜
の覚者のいずれなのかを問うたのだ
　レオは、世界の命運を賭けて我が覚者と果し合いを
し、すべての力と未来を託して消え去ったという
　かくて黒竜の元へ辿り着いた我が覚者は、竜の理の
破壊を目論む黒竜を討ち破り、そして誰もが想像だに
しなかった新たな理のかたち、人と竜が等しく生きる
時代が幕を上げた
　この物語の続きは、次なる神官であり、錬金術師で
もある愛すべき我が不逞の弟子、クラウスに託すとし
よう
　白竜の神官長ジョゼフ、ここに記す
column2:
Finally, in the sky above the Mergoda Abyss, the black dragon itself appeared, bringing with it a vortex to destroy this world.
Now that only a handful of knights and Arisen remain in Lestania, Klaus quickly identified the location of the Black Sword, Mysial, in the capital city of Mergoda, and rallied the alchemists to assist.
With the cooperation of the alchemists in the Mergoda Ruins, our Arisen, who had destroyed all the Black Swords, set off towards the Mergoda Abyss in the Mergoda Security District to cross into the final vortex of destruction.
At the gate to the vortex of destruction, Mysial appeared and proclaimed that defeating the black dragon is the only way to save the world from ruin.

Within the vortex of destruction, Leo awaited our Arisen. It seemed that Leo had sacrificed everything, even himself, to become the one and only being capable of defeating the black dragon. He questioned whether the savior of the world would be himself or our white dragon's Arisen.

Leo engaged in a final battle with our Arisen, staking the fate of the world. He entrusted all his power and the future to our Arisen before disappearing.

And so, our Arisen who reached the black dragon, planning to destroy the order of the dragons, finally defeated it. 
And thus, a new era, one where humans and dragons live equally, unfolded, something no one had ever imagined.

The continuation of this story will be entrusted to Klaus, the next priest, and also, the lovable disciple of our rogue ways, an alchemist.

Joseph, the High Priest of the White Dragon, writes it here.

column1:
攻守のバランスに長けた戦場の花形
盾を駆使したカウンター戦法を得意とする
常に前線に斬り込んでいける安定感が持ち味
column2:
Balances offense and defense in battle.
Can use their shield to counter attacks.
The Leader of the Battlefield.

column1:
ヒット＆アウェイのかく乱戦を得意とする軽業師
ロープワークで死角に回り込み、瞬時に巨大敵の
頭上に迫り連撃を加える様は戦場の疾風
column2:
An acrobat who excels at hit and run tactics.
Uses a rope to instantly move to the blind
spot of large enemies.
The Gale of the Battlefield.

column1:
精密な射撃で遠距離から先制するスナイパー役
特殊矢による多様な支援力も魅力
強敵の弱点を正確に射ぬき戦況を優位に導く
column2:
Able to deal precise damage from
long distances.
Has a variey of support abilities by the use of
special arrows.
The Sniper of the Battlefield.

column1:
回復と支援魔法で仲間を支える癒しの術師
その術は味方へのさまざまな恩恵だけでなく
怒れる敵の“隠された弱点”すら看破する
column2:
Supports the party with healing and
support magick.
Can not only heal, but also reveal weakness
of enemies.
The Pillar of the Battlefield.

column1:
敵の注目を一手に集め反撃する強固な砦役
大盾で受けた敵の力を攻撃・支援の術に変換
５属性を操り、仲間を属性面でもフォローする
column2:
Attracts attention and protect others with
their strong defense.
Convert the power of their enemies into
magick of the five elements to attack
and support.
The Fortress of the Battlefield.

column1:
絶大な威力の攻撃魔法を操る魔術師
術は紡がれた魔法陣によりさらに威力を高める
長い詠唱を効率よく放つには仲間の支援が必要
column2:
Magician who commands great magick to
cause great harm.
Can enhance magick by chanting, but needs
to be protected.
The Calamity of the Battlefield.

column1:
受けた痛みを反撃の力に変える剛力の重戦車
敵の攻撃を耐え忍ぶほどにその一撃は重みを増す
大剣の一振りは巨大な標的をも怯ませ葬る
column2:
Endures pain to deliver even greater damage
to their enemies.
One swing of their huge sword can even
bury enemies.
The Behemoth of the Battlefield.

column1:
魔道弓により霊力の魔矢を操る神秘の射手
自動的に標的を追ういく本もの魔矢は敵の急所を
穿つ刃のみならず、味方を癒す光にもなる
column2:
Mysterious archer who manipulates magick
into their magick bow.
They can attack enemies, support allies and
show the weak points of enemies.
The Eyes of the Battlefield.

column1:
錬金の秘術により敵の注意を引きうける策士
論理と錬成物質を用いて状態異常を操り、摂理を
超えた高い移動能力を駆使して敵戦力を散らす
column2:
Soldier who attracts the enemys' attention
using alchemy and high mobility.
Uses the secrets of alchemy to inflict and
manipulate status abnormalities.
The Trickster of the Battlefield.

column1:
精霊槍を振るい森羅の加護を得た槍士
霊の加護は一時的に戦闘能力を引き上げるだけ
でなく、自身や仲間を癒し導く守護にもなる
column2:
A warrior blessed and protected by
the spirits.
With their spirit spear they can heal, lead and
support the party.
The Druid of the Battlefield.

column1:
魔道剣で敵の魔力を我が物とする魔法剣士
魔力を攻守に長けた魔法へと変化させ
様々な状況で戦況を覆す事で輝きを放つ
column2:
A magical swordsman who uses his sword to take his enemy's magic into his own hands.
Transforms magic into offensive and defensive magic.
He shines by overturning the battle situation in various situations.

column1: 剣による連続攻撃を繰り出す
column2: Perform a continuous attack with your sword.

column1: 剣による連続一点集中攻撃を繰り出す
column2:
Pausing after your first swing allows you to follow
up with a powerful concentrated attack.

column1:
剣による一撃で敵のガード状態を崩し気絶を誘う
ボタンの長押しで威力が増し
敵を転倒させることができる
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで攻撃威力が上昇し
長押しなしで敵を転倒させる＜強斬り崩し＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Perform a strong overhead swing, holding down longer
for increased power that's capable of breaking an enemies 
guard. It is also possible to topple the enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increase attack power
Evolve into "Strong Guard Break" allowing you to guard
break without max power.</COL>

column1:
剣による渾身の一撃で敵のガード状態を崩し
転倒させる。さらに気絶させやすくなる
ボタンの長押しで威力が増す
column2:
Perform a stronger overhead swing capable of breaking
an enemies guard, holding down longer for increased power. 
A longer hold has a better chance to topple.

column1:
盾を構え敵の攻撃を防ぐ
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Hold your shield strong to block enemy attacks.
Can also be activated while in the air.

column1:
盾を素早く構え敵の攻撃をはじき返す
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Timing your block just as the enemy attacks you,
will deflect their attack.
Can also be activated while in the air.

column1:
腰を落とした姿勢で構え、
近接してきた仲間を上方に放りあげる
column2:
Hold yourself in a crouched position, and toss
nearby allies into the air.
Swing your sword while in the air.

column1:
空中で剣を縦に振り下ろす
高所から行うことで威力が上昇する
column2:
Slash downwards while airborne, falling down onto the
enemy. Increased power at an increased height.

column1: 敵に吹き飛ばされた際に転倒を回避する
column2: Recover quickly from being knocked down by an enemy.

column1:
しがみついた状態から、剣を突き刺し連続してえぐる
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
column2:
While clinging onto an enemy, thrust your sword into
them. Continuous presses increase attack count.

column1: ダガーによる連撃を繰り出す
攻撃範囲の広い回し蹴りを連続して繰り出す
column2: Perform a wide range of consecutive kicks.

column1:
ダガーによる素早い連続斬りを繰り出す
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UPでより攻撃回数が増加する
＜阿修羅斬り＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Perform a series of quick dagger slashes.
The number of attacks rises with consecutive button presses.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases the number of attacks.
Evolves into (Hundred Kisses).</COL>

column1:
ダガーによるさらに高速の連続斬りを繰り出す
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
column2:
Perform a faster series of quick dagger slashes.
The number of attacks rises with consecutive button presses.

column1:
シーカーロープを構えて狙いをつける
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Hold the Seeker Rope and take aim.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
構えたシーカーロープを狙った対象に放つ
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Throw the seeker rope towards the target aimed at.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1: 身を跳び退かせ、敵の攻撃を避ける
column2: Duck and roll to avoid an enemy attack.

column1:
腰を落とした姿勢で構え、
近接してきた仲間を上方に放りあげる
column2:
Hold yourself in a crouched position, and toss
nearby allies into the air.

column1: 空中でダガーによる連撃を繰り出す
column2: Perform consecutive dagger slashes while in the air.

column1:
空中でダガーによる回転攻撃を繰り出す
高所から行うことで威力が上昇し気絶させやすくなる
column2:
Perform a continuous somersault in the air with daggers
extended. When performed from a high place, the damage increases and it is
easier to stagger enemies.

column1: 空中で壁蹴りを行い、より遠方にジャンプする
column2:
Kick off the wall while airbone, propelling yourself
to further distances.

column1: ジャンプ中、再度ジャンプを行う
column2: While jumping, perform a double jump.

column1:
しがみついた状態から、素早い連続斬りを繰り出す
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UPでより攻撃回数が増加する
＜大乱斬り＞に進化</COL>
column2:
While climbing an enemy, perform a series of quick dagger slashes.
The number of attacks rises with consecutive button presses.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases the number of attacks.
Evolves into (Hundred Kisses).</COL>

column1:
しがみついた状態から、
より素早い連続斬りを繰り出す
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
column2:
While climbing an enemy, perform a series of quick dagger slashes.
The number of attacks rises with consecutive button presses.

column1:
前方に向け弓を構える
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Hold the bow forward.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
弓構えの状態から矢を放つ
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Loose arrows while in a bow stance.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
矢を放った後、次の矢をつがえる速度が速くなる
空中でも発動可能
column2:
After landing a hit with an arrow, the speed
of the next arrow is increased.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
<PADM>爆薬矢をつがえ弓を上方に構える<KEYM>通常の弓構えか、上方に向ける
爆矢構えかを選択する</KEYM>
空中でも発動可能
column2:
<PADM>Hold an explosive arrow, and keep the bow pointed upwards.
<KEYM>Point the bow upwards while in a normal bow stance,
and decide the destination of the explosive arrows.</KEYM>
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
爆薬矢を上方に放つ
爆薬矢は一定時間で自動起爆するが
攻撃により起爆させるとダメージが上昇する
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Loose an explosive arrow upwards.
The explosive arrow will detonate automatically after a period of time,
but the damage increases by detonating when struck by an attack.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
爆薬矢の準備動作が高速化される
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Speed up the time it takes to prepare an
explosive arrow.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1: 狙撃照準に切り替わり、正確に敵を狙い射てる
column2: Hone your sight, and precisely aim at the enemy.

column1:
前方に蹴りを放つ
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Kick forward.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1: 矢筒に矢を高速補充する
column2: Quickly replenish the quiver with arrows.

column1:
矢の種類を切り替える
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Switch the type of arrow.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
しがみついた状態から
装備中の矢の先端で突き刺す
ボタン連打で攻撃回数が増加する
column2:
While climbing an enemy, stab into them with
the tip of the arrow that is equipped.
The number of attacks rises with repeated button presses.

column1:
杖から魔法球を放つ
ボタンの長押しで弾数、威力が上昇する
空中でも発動可能（ボタン長押しは地上のみ）
column2:
Fire magickal bolts from the tip of the cane.
Holding the button down will increase the number and damage of bolts.
Can be activated even while in the air, but can only charge on the ground.

column1:
自身を中心に体力回復効果のある魔法エリアを
展開する（最大回復量は治癒上限値）
空中でも発動可能、フィールドシフトに対応
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで回復力が上昇し、より広範囲に
エリア展開する＜ヒールオーラエクス＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Release a magickal aura around yourself that recovers
the health of those within it. (Maximum recovery amount scales with healing power.)
Can be activated even while in the air, and works with Field Shift.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases healing power, and becomes a larger radius
form (Great Heal Aura).</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に体力回復効果のある
魔法エリアを広範囲に展開する
空中でも発動可能、フィールドシフトに対応
column2:
Release a magical aura around yourself that recovers
the health of those within it.
Can be activated even while in the air, and works with Field Shift.

column1:
自身を中心に聖属性を帯びた攻撃魔法エリアを
展開する
空中でも発動可能、フィールドシフトに対応
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで攻撃威力が上昇し、より広範囲に
エリア展開する＜セイントオーラエクス＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Release a damaging Holy aura around yourself.
Can be activated even while in the air, and works with Field Shift.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill, and becomes
a larger radius form (Greater Holy Aura).</COL>

column1:
自身を中心に聖属性を帯びた攻撃魔法エリアを
広範囲に展開する
空中でも発動可能、フィールドシフトに対応
column2:
Release a damaging Holy aura around yourself.
Can be activated even while in the air, and works with Field Shift.

column1:
自身が展開している魔法エリアを
味方全員に移し付与する
column2: Transfer an active magickal aura to an ally.

column1:
ジャンプ中の落下速度を抑制し
滞空時間を延長する
column2:
Slow your descent while falling, and
extend the duration you stay in the air.

column1:
しがみついた状態から、癒しの魔法陣を展開させる
魔法陣の内部は味方の体力が回復する
column2:
While climbing an enemy, form a healing aura around yourself
that recovers the health of allies inside of it.

column1:
しがみついた状態から、自身を中心に
聖属性の攻撃魔法エリアを展開する
column2: While climbing an enemy, form a damaging holy aura around yourself.

column1:
ロッドに属性効果を付与する
（炎・氷・雷のいずれか）
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで選択可能属性が聖・闇を含む
５属性の＜ペンタエレメントチェンジ＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Change the elemental attribute on your rod.
(Ice/Fire/Thunder)
Can be activated in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Add the elements of Light and Darkness
to the elements you can change to.</COL>

column1:
ロッドに属性効果を付与する
（炎・氷・雷・聖・闇のいずれか）
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Change the elemental attribute on your rod.
(Ice/Fire/Thunder/Light/Darkness)
Can be activated in the air.

column1:
大盾で敵の攻撃を自動的に防ぎ、攻力を吸収する
ロッドの選択属性と受けた攻撃が同属性だと
吸収量増加。空中でも発動可能
column2:
Block the enemy's attack with your greatshield to
charge the gauge with the current element on your rod.
Can be activated in the air.

column1:
大盾を構え、防御方向を固定する
固定中は攻力吸収量が上がり、スキが減少
ロッドの選択属性と受けた攻撃が同属性だと
吸収量増加。空中でも発動可能
column2:
Affix your greatshield towards the enemy, increasing
the rate of gauge gain. Gauge increase is larger
if the attack matches the element on your rod.
Can be activated in the air.

column1:
大盾で敵の攻撃をタイミングよく直前防御する
多量の攻力を吸収し、スタミナ消費もゼロになる
ロッドの選択属性と受けた攻撃が同属性だと
吸収量増加。空中でも発動可能
column2:
Activate the greatshield as an enemy strikes you to
increase the gauge by a large amount. Gauge increase
is larger if the attack matches the element on
your rod. Consumes no Stamina on block.

column1:
大盾に蓄積した攻力を敵に放つ
空中でも発動可能
フォースゲージ１本消費で発動可能
column2:
Fire a ball of elemental energy at the enemy.
The element is the same as the current selected.
Consumes 1 bar of Force Gauge.

column1:
ロッドの閃光で敵の注目を集め、自身を狙わせる
注目を集めている間、フォースゲージがやや増加する
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで敵の注目を奪う効果がより大きい
＜モアアトラクト＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Attract the attention of the enemies.
Increases Force Gauge slightly during execution.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases the amount of attraction.</COL>

column1:
ロッドの閃光で敵の注目をより集め、自身を狙わせる
注目を集めている間、フォースゲージがやや増加する
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Attract the attention of enemies by a large amount.
Increases Force Gauge slightly during execution.
Can be activated in the air.

column1:
大盾に蓄積した攻力（炎・氷・雷・聖・闇いずれか）
を属性化し味方に付与する。空中でも発動可能
フォースゲージ１本消費で発動可能
column2:
Consumes 1 bar of Force Gauge to enchant ally
weapons with the currently selected rod element.
Can be activated in the air.

column1:
敵の攻撃を大盾で防いだ直後、敵の注意を引く
属性攻撃をするか、素早く後方に身を逸らす
攻撃時フォースゲージ1本以上なら消費し技性能上昇
column2:
Immediately after blocking, either attack
the enemy to increase enmity or dodge backwards.
Will consume 1 Force Gauge to increase effects if available.

column1: 空中から大盾で殴りつける
column2: Attack with your greatshield in the air.

column1:
しがみついた状態から、付与した属性の異常値を
敵に蓄積させる放射光を放つ
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
column2:
While clinging to an enemy, attack with the currently
selected attribute. Will consume 1 bar of force
gauge to enhance the effect if available.

column1:
魔法弾を放つ
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Release a magickal bolt.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
魔法の罠を敵の足元に展開する
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Summon a Magickal Trap at an enemy's feet.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
マジックボールの弾数と
マジックトラップの範囲を上昇させる
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Increases the number of Magick Bolts released and
extends the range of Magick Traps.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
魔法詠唱中スペルサークルに示される順序で
<PADM>スティック入力<KEYM>マウス移動</KEYM>を行い、魔法の威力を増加させる
column2:
Move the <PADM> Right Stick;KEYM>Mouse</KEYM> in
the order shown in the magic circle while casting a spell to increase its power.

column1: 後方にすばやく移動する

ジャンプ中の落下速度を抑制し
滞空時間を延長する
column2:
Slow your descent while falling, and
extend the duration you stay in the air.

column1:
しがみついた状態から、敵の体に魔印を刻む
魔印に攻撃を加えると魔法波で敵を攻撃する
column2:
While climbing an enemy, place a magickal orb on them
that when attacked, will explode into waves of powerful magick.

column1:
大剣で斬りつける
攻撃を当てることで連続斬りが可能
column2:
Deliver slashes with a large sword.
Landing the first hit will allow further consecutive slashes.

column1:
大剣で広範囲に対して斬撃を放つ
攻撃を当てることで連続斬りが可能
column2:
Deliver slashes over a wide area with a large sword.
Landing the first hit will allow further consecutive slashes.

column1:
振り上げた大剣に力を溜め、振り下ろす
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
リベンジゲージ蓄積量に応じて、さらに威力が増加
<COL ffdc78>LV UPでさらに攻撃威力が上昇する
＜真・魔人斬り＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Channel energy into the blade, and slam it down.
When the button is released the moment the charge finishes, the damage
increases significantly.
Increases in damage as the Revenge Gauge rises.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
Becomes (Indomitable Lash).</COL>

column1:
振り上げた大剣に力を溜め、渾身の力で振り下ろす
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
リベンジゲージ蓄積量に応じて、さらに威力が増加
column2:
Channel energy into the blade, and slam it down with
the force of the entire body. When the button is released the moment the charge
finishes, the damage increases significantly.
Increases in damage as the Revenge Gauge rises.

column1:
身を固め、敵の攻撃に耐える
攻撃を受けとめるとリベンジゲージが増加する
column2:
Steel yourself, and endure an enemy's attack.
Increases the Revenge Gauge a bit when hit by an attack.

column1:
腰を落とした姿勢で構え、
近接してきた仲間を上方に放りあげる
column2:
Hold yourself in a crouched position, and toss
nearby allies into the air.

column1: 空中で大剣の一撃を振るう
column2: Deliver slashes with the blade while in the air.

column1:
空中から多段ヒット性能を持つ振り下ろし攻撃を放つ
高所から行うことで威力が上昇する
column2:
Slam the blade downward while in the air,
delivering multiple hits.
Damage rises when performed from high altitudes.

column1: 転倒を回避し体勢を立て直す
column2: Recover from being knocked away while in the air.

column1:
しがみついた状態から力を溜め、
破壊力のある一撃を放つ
column2:
While clinging to an enemy, the user readies the
blade briefly, and delivers a single devastating blow.

column1:
闘波の矢を生成し、魔道弓を前方に向けて構える
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Hold the Magick Bow forward, and create Seeker Arrows.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
魔道弓を敵に向け、対象を捉える
捉える敵が多いほど、闘波の矢の威力上昇速度が
速くなる。空中でも発動可能
column2:
Face the Magick Bow towards the enemy, and
capture them within its sights. The more enemies that are targeted,
the higher the rate at which the Seeker Arrow charges.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
捉えた敵に向けて闘波の矢を放ち、攻撃を与える
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Fire the Seeker Arrow towards the
targeted enemy.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
闘波の矢の威力を強化する
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Increases damage of the Seeker Arrow.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
助真の矢を生成し、魔道弓を前方に向けて構える
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Hold the Magick Bow forward, and create True Aid Arrows.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
魔道弓を味方に向け、対象を捉える
捉える味方が多いほど、助真の矢の回復力
上昇速度が速くなる。空中でも発動可能
column2:
Face the Magick Bow towards an ally, and
capture them within its sights. The more allies that are targeted,
the higher the rate at which the True Aid Arrow charges.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
捉えた味方に向けて助真の矢を放ち、味方の傷を癒す
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Fire the True Aid Arrow at a targeted ally
and heal their wounds.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
助真の矢の威力を強化する
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Enhances the recovery power of the True Aid Arrow.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
前方に蹴りを放つ
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Kicks forward.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
自身の傷を癒す
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Heal your wounds.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
照準をより多数の目標に合わせ、狙いを定める
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Increase the maximum number of targets
that can be locked on while aiming.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
しがみついた状態から、魔矢を放ち
スタミナを癒す魔法陣を発現させる
column2:
While climbing an enemy, release a magickal
arrow that restores the stamina of party members near it.

column1:
複数の魔矢を放つ攻撃スキルの捕捉対象を
単体を捉えるシングルロックオンと
複数を捉えるマルチロックオンに切り替える
空中でも発動可能
錬成物質を生みだし前方に放つ
column2:
Create an alchemical substance
and fire it forward.

column1: 錬成物質を生みだし広範囲に放つ
column2:
Create alchemical substances
and release them over a wide area.

column1:
錬成物質を一点集中して成長させる
タイミングよくボタンを押すと攻撃回数が増加
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで攻撃回数が増加し、錬成物質を
より成長させる＜クラスター・マギス＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Create an alchemical substance that expands outward.
Pressing the set button with correct timing increases number of attacks.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Becomes Cluster Magis, increasing maximum number
of attacks and expansion radius.</COL>

column1:
錬成物質を一点集中して、さらに成長させる
タイミングよくボタンを押すと攻撃回数が増加
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Concentrate an alchemical substance on one point
and expand it outwards. Pressing the set button with correct timing
increases the number of attacks.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
錬成物質を生みつつ、素早く後方に身を逸らす
錬成物質に敵の攻撃が接触すると、自動で
攻撃が繰り出される
column2:
Create a mass of alchemical substances that
quickly propels you backward. When an enemy's attack comes into
contact with the mass, it will explode outward and damage them.

column1:
装備しているエリクシルを切替える
エリクシルの種類により、エリクシル
発動時に発生する状態異常が変化する
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Switch the currently equipped elixir.
Depending on the Elixir's type, the status abnormality
inflicted upon Elixir activation changes.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
エリクシルが秘めた性質を解放する
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Unleash the Elixir's hidden potential.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1: 空中で錬成物質を生みだし下方に放つ
column2:
Create an alchemical substance while in the air,
and fire it downward.

column1: 空中で錬成物質を生みだし前方に放つ
column2:
Create an alchemical substance while in the air,
and launch it spinning forward.

column1:
空中に錬成式で足場を生成し
それを蹴ることでより遠くまで跳ぶ
column2:
Generate a temporary foothold while in the air
and propel yourself by kicking off of it.

column1:
しがみついた状態で
錬成物質を一点集中して、さらに成長させる
タイミングよくボタンを押すと攻撃回数が増加
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで攻撃回数が増加し、錬成物質を
より成長させる＜コンクラスター・マギス＞に進化</COL>
column2:
While climbing an enemy,
concentrate an alchemical substance on one point and expand it 
outwards. Pressing the set button with correct timing increases
the number of attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Becomes Concluster Magis, increasing maximum number
of attacks and expansion radius.</COL>

column1:
しがみついた状態で
錬成物質を一点集中して、さらに成長させる
タイミングよくボタンを押すと攻撃回数が増加
column2:
While climbing an enemy,
concentrate an alchemical substance on one point and expand it 
outwards. Pressing the set button with correct timing increases
the number of attacks.

column1:
敵の攻撃に対してタイミングよく自身のスキルを
放つことで、敵の攻撃を防いで錬成物質を
付着させる。また、自身に金を纏って一定時間
敵の攻撃を遮断する
一部の回避／防御スキルでは発動不可
column2:
When timely unleashing your skills while an enemy attacks,
coat yourself in a protective layer of gold to prevent further attacks
for a period of time, and attach alchemical stakes to them in the process.

column1: 奪還を指揮せし異才者

column2: Expose the Dark Side to the One Operating behind the Scenes

column1:
ティネス砦の奪還に成功した解放軍
しかし――
魔軍の占領によって大食堂は瓦礫の山と化し
かつての姿を完全に失っていた――
食料も底を尽き
荒れ果てた大食堂で独り
絶望の淵に立つ料理番“キャリー”
果たして、そんな彼女を救う手立ては
あるのだろうか――
column2:
The Liberation Army successfully recaptured Fort Thines. 
However, due to the occupation by the Demon Army, the cafeteria had turned into a pile of rubble, completely losing its former appearance. 
With food running out, the cook "Carrie" stood alone in the desolate cafeteria, on the brink of despair. 
Will there be any way to save her in such a situation?

column1:
展望城の奪還に成功した解放軍
しかし――
魔軍の残党は、城外の防衛区画へ逃げ込み
今もなお、籠城を続けていた――
展望城の防衛にも十分な戦力を割けない
解放軍には、その奪還は不可能――
そう思われていた
ただ、そんな状況を打破できる人物が一人
解放軍にいるという――
天才参謀官“ソネル”
展望城奪還に尽力した覚者は
彼と共に“不可能な奪還任務”に挑むこととなる
column2:
The Liberation Army succeeded in retaking Lookout Castle. 
However, the remnants of the Demon Army escaped into the outer defense zone of the castle and continue to hold their ground. 
It was believed that the Liberation Army could not possibly reclaim the castle as they could not allocate sufficient forces for its defense. However, there is one person who can break through such a situation. 
A genius staff officer named Sonel, who is a member of the Liberation Army. 
The Arisen who played a significant role in the recapture of Lookout Castle will join him in the "impossible recapture mission."

column1:
王都メガドの奪還に成功した解放軍
しかし――
メガドの市民は、支配者の圧政に怯え
街には不穏な気配が漂っていた――
市民に礼賛される絶対的支配者へ
密かに反旗を翻したレジスタンスと
そのリーダーである暗躍者“メフィス”
覚者は、メガドの人々の真の平穏を奪還するため
彼らと共に隠された闇へと挑むこととなる――
column2:
Royal Capital Megado successfully recaptured by the Liberation Army.
However, the citizens of Megado live in fear of the tyrannical rule of their oppressors,
and an unsettling atmosphere lingers in the city.
In secret opposition to the absolute ruler, a resistance group has risen, led by a manipulative figure known as Mephis.
To reclaim true peace for the people of Megado, the Arisen join forces with them, and together, they venture into the hidden darkness.

column1: 盗賊団のアジトへ食料運搬

column1:
現在選択中のジョブで
プレイポイントのコンテンツを解放済み
column2: Currently selected job with Play point content already released

column1:
レスタニア最北の《禁じられた地》
かつて黄金都市と謳われたメルゴダは大地ごと
消失しており、深く抉れた大穴だけがその痕跡を
示している。錬金技術で造られた歪な半生物は
大地に残され、今なお徘徊し続けているという
column2:
North of Lestania lies the Forbidden Land, known as Mergoda, which was once hailed as the Golden City.
However, it has completely disappeared, leaving only a deep, gouged hole as its trace. 
Twisted, semi-living creatures created through alchemy remain on the land, still wandering to this day.

column1:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
古いポーン、ダイオンが百年以上に渡り
護り続けている祠。ザンドラ禁域を訪れる
覚者への任務と警鐘を伝えるための場でもある
column2:
One of the altars of the White Dragon, which was worshipped in various regions in ancient times.
The old Pawn, Dian, has been protecting this shrine for over a hundred years. 
It is also a place to convey missions and warnings to the Arisen who visit the Zandora Wastelands.

column1:
古い時代の謎に魅せられ、世俗を捨てた隠者が
一人で住む家。隠者はたびたび依頼の品や
問題について、祠に依頼を寄せているようだ
column2: A hermit who was captivated by the mysteries of ancient times, and who abandoned the secular world, lives alone in a house. The hermit often sends requests to the shrine for items or issues that need attention.

column1:
二つのアーチ状の岩壁に囲まれた谷。そこを
メルゴダを守り続ける錬魔兵団が巡回している
今や、その巡視命令を解ける者はいないため
亡都へ向かうには彼らとの交戦もやむないだろう
まれに、恐るべき女守官が帯同することも
column2: A valley enclosed by two arched rock walls. The Mergoda Patrol Corps, dedicated to guarding Mergoda, conducts regular patrols there. At present, there is no one capable of revoking their patrol orders, so it may be inevitable to engage in combat with them in order to proceed towards the capital. Occasionally, a formidable female commander accompanies them.

column1:
ザンドラの蛮族が縄張りとする彼らの関所、通称
バンデッドホーントで、鉄の巨人が目撃された
彼らが発掘したものなのか、亡都からやって来た
ものかは不明。秘術の流出やバートランドの
新たな脅威となる前に破壊する必要がある
column2: Their checkpoint, known as the Banded Haunt, is the territory of Zandora's barbarians. A giant made of iron was seen there. It is unclear whether they discovered it or if it came from the fallen capital. It is necessary to destroy it before it becomes a new threat of leaked secret arts or Betland.

column1:
禁域南東部の遺跡群には、文化を失い蛮行を
働き生き続けてきた集団が居付いている。彼ら
《ザンドラ・バルバロイ》に交渉や説得は不可能
なため、遭遇時は流血沙汰を覚悟しなければ
ならないだろう
column2: In the ruins in the southeastern forbidden area, there is a group called the Zandora Barbarians who have lost their culture and continue to engage in savage acts. Negotiation and persuasion with them are impossible, so one must be prepared for bloodshed if encountered.

column1:
セラー湖北岸の浜辺付近で、オークの残党が
野営を行っているのが確認された
どうやら、ガルドノックを離れた大将級の一派
らしい。新勢力となる前に有力な残党は叩いて
おきたい所だ
column2: Near the beach on the northern shore of Lake Cera, it has been confirmed that remnants of orcs are camping. It appears to be a faction of high-ranking commanders who have left Gardnox. We should strike down the influential remnants before they become a new force.

column1:
湿った黒土の谷間に、一頭のナイトメアが飛来した
かつてメルゴダの民が《嘆きのモーラ》と呼び
白竜自らが撃退せしめた恐るべき魔鳥である
放置すれば、レスタニア全土の危機となる
可能性がある
column2: In the moist crevice of black soil, a Nightmare flew in. It was once known as the "Wailing Mora" by the people of Mergoda, a fearsome bird that the White Dragon himself repelled. If left unchecked, it could pose a threat to the entire land of Lestania.

column1:
ザンドラ禁域の一画、錬金の秘術に
魅せられた者たちが潜み独自の研究を
繰り広げていた場所
現在もその名残の書物などが散乱するが
肝心の研究者たちがどこに消えたかは不明
column2: In a corner of the Zandora Wastelands, where people fascinated by the secrets of alchemy hid, they carried out their own research. Even now, remnants of their studies such as books can be found scattered about, but the whereabouts of the researchers themselves remain unknown.

column1:
禁域のどこかにあるらしい地下泉
祝福を受けた泉は高位の術師が管理していた
そうだが現在はその場所すら定かでない
column2:
There seems to be an underground spring somewhere in the restricted area.
The blessed spring was managed by a high-ranking sorcerer, but now, even the exact location is uncertain.

column1:
ザンドラ禁域北端、地上に残った外周部
メルゴダ入り口にあたる区画であり、政治と深く
関わる錬金術研究の中心地であった。そのため
最も警戒すべき場所として、神殿により禁域と
して秘匿されてきた
column2:
Located at the northern border of Zandora Wastelands, this is the section that corresponds to the entrance of Mergoda. 
It was the hub of alchemized research closely intertwined with politics. 
As a result, it has been concealed as a forbidden area by the temple, making it the most guarded of places.

column1:
ザンドラ禁域を東西に結ぶ大地下水路
セラー湖の水をメルゴダへ送るため整備された
水路であったが、現在は恐ろしい魔物の潜む
大迷路と化している
column2:
The Underground Waterway that connects the Zandora Wastelands from east to west.
Was originally constructed to transport water from Lake Cera to Mergoda. 
However, it has now transformed into a terrifying labyrinth infested with dangerous enemies.

column1:
旧時代、錬金研究の実験所だった地下施設
現在内部がどうなっているかは不明だが
秘術の実験体など忌まわしい研究の産物が
潜んでいる可能性は大きい
column2: In the past, it was an underground facility for alchemic research. The current state of its interior is unknown. However, there is a high possibility that abominable creations of forbidden experiments, such as experimental subjects of secret arts, may be lurking.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《南ザンドラ遺跡群》の一角にある旧時代の井戸
これまではその存在すら忘れられていたが
恐ろしい咆哮が奥から遺跡群一帯に響くようになった
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An ancient well in a corner of the "South Zandora Ruins".
Its existence had been forgotten until now, but a terrifying roar began to echo throughout the entire ruins.

column1:
メルゴダ繁栄期、都の一部だった地域
都喪失の後は凶悪な魔物が跋扈し、墓地群は
不死者の彷徨う呪われた地と化した。しかし
数多く残された家屋遺跡は訪れた者に再利用
され、探検拠点として賑わいを見せている
column2:
During the flourishing period of Mergoda, it was a part of the capital city. 
After the loss of the capital, brutal enemies ran rampant, and the group of graveyards became a cursed land where the undead wander. 
However, many remaining house ruins have been repurposed by visitors and have become lively exploration bases.

column1:
禁じられた地にもっとも近い、探索者の拠点
すでに元の住民はおらず、旧時代の宝や発見を
求める者達が遺跡を再利用し、宿や商店を開いて
いる。この町のよろず屋には剣豪《ウォリアー》
として名高いオリバーが滞在している
column2:
Nearest to the forbidden land, the base of the explorers.
The original residents are no longer here, and those who seek ancient treasures and discoveries have repurposed the ruins, opening inns and shops.
Oliver, renowned as a warrior, resides in this town's general shop.

column1:
禁域と東部の狭間の谷に、奇妙なバランスで
そびえる岩がある。その岩の周囲には、不思議と
不気味な物が集まりやすいようだ。不浄の魔物が
発生していた場合でも、急いで抜ければ追い
つかれることはないはずだ
column2: In the valley between the Forbidden Zone and the eastern region, there stands a peculiar, towering rock formation. It seems that strange and eerie things are naturally drawn to its surroundings. Even if foul enemies were to emerge, one should be able to escape without being pursued if they hurry.

column1:
東ザンドラ廃墟群のただ中に、忽然と灼熱の
魔像が姿を現したという
盗掘者が掘りあてたのか、遺物が侵入者に
反応したか起動の原因は不明だが、ゾマに
とって新たな心配の種であることは間違いない
column2: In the heart of the East Zandora Ruins, a scorching hot magical statue suddenly materialized. Whether it was unearthed by looters or if it was triggered by the intrusion of relics, the exact cause of its activation remains unclear. Nevertheless, it is undoubtedly a new source of worry for Zoma.

column1:
ザンドラ・バルバロイの一派が魔獣を手なずけ
北の灯台を根城に居座り始めたとの情報が入った
大きなトサカと翼の影が目撃されていることから
彼らの飼う魔物はコカトリスであると見られる
column2: We have received information that Zandora's Barbarian faction has tamed a magical beast and taken up residence in the northern lighthouse. Large crests and shadows of wings have been sighted, suggesting that the creature they possess is a Cockatrice.

column1:
死者の丘、祠墓地前に広がる陰鬱な庭
そこに何者かが突如として現れ、盗掘者を
皆殺しにしたという
墓荒らしと間違われぬためにも、周囲は避けて
通る方が賢明だろう
column2:
Hill of the Dead, a gloomy garden in front of the cemetery.
Suddenly, someone appeared there and slaughtered all the grave robbers.
To avoid being mistaken for a grave desecrator, it would be wise to avoid passing through the area.

column1:
ザンドラ東部、《死者の丘》と呼ばれる地にある
地下礼拝堂。冥界の王を奉るための場所であり
深部には亡霊騎士が守る呪われた秘宝があると
墓荒らしの間でまことしやかに囁かれている
挑んだ者全てが帰らなかったため、封鎖された
column2:
Eastern Zandora, a underground chapel referred to as the "Hill of the Dead". 
It is a place dedicated to the king of the underworld, and deep within, it is rumored that a cursed treasure guarded by a ghost knight can be found. 
Due to the fact that everyone who has challenged it has never returned, it has been sealed off.

column1:
ザンドラ東部、人獣を問わず屍が放置された
ままとなり死臭が染みついた小路
屍は盗賊の襲撃を受けた犠牲者とも、魔物に
喰らわれた獲物とも推測されているが
この地においてそれを追及する者はいない
column2: A narrow path in Eastern Zandora where corpses of both humans and animals are left unattended, permeating the air with the stench of death. It is speculated that these corpses are the victims of bandit raids or prey devoured by enemy creatures. However, there is no one here who investigates such matters.

column1:
セラー湖にそびえる禊の神殿・上層部
禊の神殿内部には、失われた都に続く湖底大通路
が存在すると言われるが、長らくその扉は白竜神殿
により管理、封印されてきた
column2:
The upper echelons of the Temple of Purification located on Lake Cera, towering over the lake. 
It is said that within the temple lies a grand underwater passageway leading to the lost city. 
However, for a long time, the doors to this passageway have been guarded and sealed by The White Dragon Temple.

column1:
ゾマのすぐ裏手にある枯れ井戸
死者の丘から迷い込み、井戸に入り込んだまま
出られなくなった亡者がいるらしく、不気味な
声が周囲に漏れることがある
column2:
Behind Zoma, there is a dried-up well.
It is said that there are spirits who got lost from the Hill of the Dead and ended up trapped in the well, unable to escape.
Sometimes, eerie voices leak out into the surroundings.

column1:
東ザンドラ廃墟群と呼ばれる亡都の周辺都市は
いまだわずかに当時の生活様式が見て取れ、錬金
遺物も発掘される。廃墟の中には屋内や
地下へ入れる遺構も多いが、魔物や掠奪者
も居付いているため危険が伴う
column2: The area surrounding the ruins known as the East Zandora Ruins still retains some remnants of the lifestyle of that time, and alchemized artifacts are also excavated. Within the ruins, there are many structures that lead indoors or underground, but they are also inhabited by enemies and looters, so there is danger involved.

column1:
ザンドラ灯台の地下倉庫
もしかするとまだ使える物資も残っている
かもしれないが、じめじめとした僻地の
地下はそれよりも不浄なもののほうが多く
溜まっているだろう
column2:
Zandora Lighthouse's Underground Stores.
There might still be usable supplies left,
but in the damp and remote underground,
there are more foul things accumulated
than clean ones.

column1:
不気味な庭を持つ祠。夜な夜な生者か死者か
判別できぬ怨嗟の声が聞こえると言われ
一帯でも特に不吉な場所とされている
近寄れば、冥府の執行者により魂を奪われる
という噂がある
column2: A shrine with a creepy garden. It is said that eerie voices of unknown origin can be heard at night, whether they come from the living or the dead. This place is considered particularly ominous in the entire area. If you approach it, it is rumored that the executor of the underworld will take away your soul.

column1:
《死者の丘》では比較的規模の小さな祠
本来は地下墓地だったが、入り込んだ魔獣達に
遺体のほとんどは食われてしまっている
死者はほぼ空の地下墓地だが、内部には別の
存在が潜んでいるかもしれない
column2: In the Hill of the Dead, there is a relatively small shrine that was originally an underground burial ground. However, most of the bodies have been consumed by the invading animals. The underground burial ground is almost empty of the dead, but there may be another entity lurking inside.

column1:
セラー湖の湖底地下洞窟に広がる大水路
禊の神殿本殿と離殿を繋ぐ、水の浄化施設を
兼ねた補助連絡通路だった
あまりに長く、迷う者が絶えなかったため
封鎖されていた
column2: The large waterway that spreads through the underground caverns at the bottom of Lake Cera was a supplementary communication passage that also served as a purification facility for the main and detached shrines of the Temple of Purification. It had been sealed off because many people got lost in its extensive length.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
ザンドラ東部、《死者の丘》ふもとの崖から
近年発掘された旧時代の地下墓地
発見した墓荒らしによると、侵入直後に恐ろしい
までの悪寒に襲われ、命からがら逃げ出したという
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Located at the foot of the Hill of the Dead in Eastern Zandora.
A recently discovered underground tomb from ancient times. 
According to the grave robber who was found, they were attacked by a terrifying cold moment after entering and narrowly escaped with their lives.

column1:
白竜により、かつて大地から切り離された都
レスタニアとは隔てられた異界に漂い、時の流れも
異なっている。現在は地上で見られなくなった
錬金技術が随所にほどこされ、秘術で生み出された
錬魔は今も亡都を守護している
column2:
The city once cut off from the earth by The White Dragon.
Now drifts in a different realm, no longer seen in Lestania.
Time flows differently here.
Alchemized technology, which has disappeared from the surface, is still present throughout, and the city is protected by guardian spirits created through secret spells.

column1:
300年の昔に地上から失われた都
旧王都として錬金術師により統治され、栄華を
極めた。だが、白竜によりレスタニアから
切り離されて後、異界を漂い続けている
今なお僅かな民が生存している
column2:
300 years ago, the ancient capital that disappeared from the earth's surface was ruled by alchemists and flourished. 
However, after being separated from Lestania by the White Dragon, it continues to drift in the otherworld. 
Even now, only a few people survive.

column1:
錬金術師テオドールの工房
錬金術に関する様々な書物や研究資材が並ぶ
ディアマンテスに抵抗する者、そして
《アルケミスト》を志す者にとっては重要な
場所である
column2:
The workshop of alchemist Theodor.
Various books and research materials related to alchemy are lined up.
It is an important place for those who resist Diamantes and aspire to be Alchemists.

column1:
ディアマンテスが封じられた元・王の間
レスタニアからメルゴダが切り離されて後も
その影響力は大きく、力までも完全に
封じることはできなかった
column2:
The former king's space where Diamantes was sealed.
Even after Mergoda was separated from Lestania, its influence remained significant and its power could not be completely sealed.

column1:
未完成状態の素材錬魔が暴走し、研究室に踏み
入った者に攻撃を加えるようになった
完成前とはいえ、監視索敵用に特別開発されるはず
だった魔物のようだ
小型の未完成品と侮ってはいけない
column2: An incomplete material-altering creature has gone berserk and started attacking anyone who enters the laboratory. It was supposed to be specially developed for surveillance and reconnaissance, even though it is not yet complete. Do not underestimate this small unfinished product.

column1:
護政区の研究者であった錬金術師の家
すでに主は不在だが、研究成果や遺物は
遺されているかもしれない
それが、どういった内容であるかは不明
column2:
The home of an alchemist who was a researcher in the Security District.
 The master is already absent, but there may be alchemized research results and artifacts left behind. 
It is unclear what the contents are.

column1:
メルガン技師の研究室
技師の中にも、竜を排すという異端思想に傾倒
した者が少なからずいた。そういった思想の信徒が
使っていた研究室は封鎖、監視対象となっている
ここも、何らかの研究のため使われていたようだ
column2:
Laboratory of Engineer Mergan.
Here, there were some who were inclined towards the heretical idea of rejecting dragons. 
The research facility used by those who believed in such ideas has been shut down and placed under surveillance. 
It seems that this place was also used for some kind of research.

column1:
宮殿前広場に、ディアマンテス派メルガン技師が
魔道兵器ギガン・マキナを改造し配置している
この兵器はあまりに危険なため、広場を通る
際は周到な戦闘準備が必要となる
column2:
In front of the palace plaza, Diamantes faction Melgan engineers have modified the magic weapon Gigant Machina. 
As this weapon is extremely dangerous, thorough combat preparations are necessary when passing through the plaza.

column1:
亡都メルゴダ　王宮層にある廃墟
元の住民のものと思しき大量の書籍もそのままに
打ち捨てられている。すっかり荒れ果ててはいるが
異端思想に傾倒する者たちが未だに集会所として
いるとの噂がある
column2: Mergoda Ruins, located in the royal palace layer, is a deserted place where the remnants of the original residents, including a large number of books, remain untouched. Although it is completely in ruins, there are rumors that people who lean towards heretical ideologies still use it as a gathering place.

column1:
王宮内研究室、メルガン・アルケミデアで
あのズールと思しき魔物が目撃された
どうやら、錬金術師が複製体の創造
に成功したらしい。複製体が意思を持つ前に
どうにか食い止めなければならない
column2:
In the royal research laboratory, Mergan Alchemdia, the enemy that appears to be Zuhl has been sighted.
It seems that the alchemists have succeeded in creating a duplicate.
We must somehow stop it before the duplicate gains consciousness.

column1:
亡都メルゴダの元は市街地であった区画
整理され美しかったであろう街並みの
様子は、遺跡群からも見てとれる
今なおメルゴダの民が暮らす地でもある
column2: The Mergoda Ruins was originally a district in the city, which must have been organized and beautiful. This can also be seen from the remnants where the people of Mergoda still live.

column1:
亡都メルゴダの王ゴルゴラン、そして政権を握る
ディアマンテスら特別な錬金術師たちが集った
壮麗なる王宮
広い研究所や宮殿は現在も巨人兵が護りつづけ
ており、支配者の影響力を強く残している
column2:
The magnificent palace where Golgorran, the king of the exiled city of Mergoda, and the special alchemists led by Diamantes who hold political power, gathered. 
The large laboratories and palaces are still guarded by Giant soldiers, preserving the strong influence of the rulers.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
女性錬金術師ペトラネアが、自宅の地下に密かに
併設した実験場。秘術によって錬魔や不死者に
特殊なエレメントを付与する研究や、人間を
魔物に変える残酷な実験がここで繰り返し行われた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】 Door</COL>
Petranea, a female alchemist, secretly established an experimental facility in the basement of her home.
Research of bestowing special elements to alchemized demons and immortals through secret arts, as well as cruel experiments that transform humans into monsters, were repeatedly conducted here.

column1:
突如レスタニアの沖合に出現したフィンダム
大陸の一部。レスタニアに出現した侵食魔も
ここから飛来しており、この絶海の孤島が
“侵食”という脅威に対抗するための手がかりを
秘めていると予測される
column2:
Phindym suddenly appeared off the coast of Lestania. 
The invading corrupted creatures from the continent fly in from here.
It is predicted that this isolated island in the vast sea holds clues to opposing the threat of "corruption."

column1:
魔赤島の北西部、最も高い断崖に近い一帯
何層にも崖が重なったような複雑な地形を
しており、滑落には特に注意が必要
column2:
A complex terrain resembling layers of overlapping cliffs found in the northwestern part of Bloodbane Isle.
Special attention must be paid to the risk of falling.

column1:
魔赤島の北東部、一際標高が高い一帯
空に渦巻く何らかのエネルギー体に
最も近く、赤く照らされている
column2:
In the northeastern part of Bloodbane Isle, there is an especially high elevation area, 
where some kind of energy body swirls in the sky close to it and illuminating it in red.

column1:
魔赤島における調査のために自然洞窟を
整備して駐屯地とした
侵食が進む魔赤島において、状態が良く
広さも申し分ない洞窟を発見できたことは
調査隊にとってまさに奇跡的な幸運であった
column2:
A natural cave developed and turned into a base camp for the investigation of Bloodbane Isle.
In the rapidly deteriorating island plagued by Corruption, it was truly a miraculous stroke of luck for the research team to discover a cave that was not only in good condition but also spacious enough to meet their needs.

column1:
《群像の岩屋》近くの広場
高所から流れ落ちる雄大な滝を見ることが
できる。ただし、日光を避ける傾向にある
はずの侵食魔や菌胞がその勢力を日向にまで
拡げている、侵食の勢いが強い場所でもある
column2: Nearby the Picturesque Grotto, there is a plaza where you can witness the majestic waterfall cascading down from a high place. However, the corruption and infected fungi, which are supposed to avoid direct sunlight, have extended their influence even to the sunny areas. It is a place where the force of corruption is strong.

column1:
肉食の魔物が獲物を貯蓄しているらしく
おびただしい数の死肉が散乱している
死肉の臭いが新たなる魔物を呼ぶため
それを漁る魔物は増加の一路を辿って
いるようだ
column2:
It appears that the carnivorous monsters are storing their prey.
An enormous amount of dead flesh is scattered around.
The smell of the dead flesh is attracting new monsters, and the monsters that are scavenging for it seem to be increasing.

column1:
《聖遺の塔》付近にある広場
海から吹き込む風が周囲を囲む崖面に
当たることで複雑な気流を生み出している
気流に誘い込まれてか、風を好んでか
有翼の魔物の姿がよく確認される
column2:
Plaza near the Sage Tower Ruins
The wind blowing in from the sea creates complex air currents as it hits the surrounding cliffs.
Winged Beasts are often seen in this area, seemingly drawn by these air currents or perhaps attracted to the wind.

column1:
魔赤島中心部に位置する侵食の進んだ洞窟
洞窟入口周辺には溢れ出したかのように大量の
菌胞がはびこっている。内部の侵食がかなり
進んでいることは確実であり、慎重を期した
調査が望まれる
column2:
Located in the central part of Bloodbane Isle, the cave is heavily corrupted.
In the vicinity of the cave entrance, there is an overwhelming amount of fungal spores spreading.
The internal infection is considerable, and a cautious investigation is desired.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
南部の海岸沿いの小道の先に発見された地下通路
内部の気温は地上と比べて数度低めである
単なる通路ではなく、遺跡のような造りになっており
崩れた人工物からは文化の一端が垣間見える
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An underground passage was discovered at the end of a small path along the southern coast. 
The temperature inside is a few degrees lower compared to the surface. 
It is not just a simple passage but is constructed like a ruin, and glimpses of a culture can be seen from the collapsed artifacts.

column1:
魔赤島東部の海岸沿いに発見された洞窟
入口付近を調査した斥候隊により、微動だにしない
多数の人影を見たという報告が寄せられている
恐らく何らかの魔物による犠牲者の姿かと思われる
ため、軽率に足を踏み入れることは禁じられている
column2:
Cave discovered along the coast in the eastern part of Bloodbane Isle
Reports have been received from the scouting party who investigated the entrance area, saying that they saw numerous figures that didn't move even a bit.
It is likely that these are the victims of some kind of enemy.
Therefore, it is forbidden to step inside without caution.

column1:
魔赤島南部にある洞窟
斥候隊により、侵食ゴアサイクロプスがここを
ねぐらとしていることが判明している
残飯を狙ってか別種の魔物も多数棲みついているため
一定以上の戦力を持つ者のみが調査を許される
column2:
Located in the southern part of Bloodbane Isle, there is a cave that has been discovered by the scouts. 
It has been confirmed that the Infected Gorecyclops have made this place their lair. 
Due to the presence of various other creatures, possibly attracted by the leftovers, only those with a certain level of strength are allowed to conduct investigations.

column1:
魔赤島の自然洞窟
地盤が一部落ち窪んだようになっており
天井部分から青空が見える箇所もある
陽光が差し込む様は幻想的で美しい光景だが
内部は侵食魔が跋扈し、多数の菌胞も確認されている
column2:
The natural caves of Bloodbane Isle have partially sunken and concave terrain, with some areas where the ceiling reveals the blue sky.
The sunlight shining through creates a fantastical and beautiful scene, but the interior is infested with corruption, with numerous fungal spores confirmed as well.

column1:
魔赤島中央部の海岸を辿った先に入口が発見された
地下施設。内部では水のせせらぎが絶えず響き
神聖さを感じさせる造りになっていることから
聖堂であると判断された。彫刻などの人工物が多数
残されており、異郷の文化を感じることができる
column2:
An entrance was discovered at the coast in the central part of Bloodbane Isle. 
Inside the underground facility, the sound of flowing water constantly echoes, giving a sense of holiness. 
It was determined to be a sanctuary due to its construction. 
Many artificial objects, such as sculptures, have been left behind, allowing one to experience a foreign culture.

column1:
魔赤島に唯一存在する塔《聖遺の塔》の傍にある
枯れ井戸。長らく人の手が入らなかったようで
井戸蓋が錆び付いており、中々内部の様子を
探ることができなかった
column2: Next to the Tower of the Holy Relics, the only tower that exists on Bloodbane Isle, there is a dried-up well. It seems that no one has touched it for a long time, as the well cover is rusted and it is difficult to examine the interior.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
《侵食魔の巣窟》のさらに奥に存在する空間
侵食魔は日光を避ける傾向にあることが判明
しているため、光の届かない内部にはさらに
侵食の進んだ魔物が潜んでいる可能性がある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
A space that exists further inside the Infected Den.
It has been determined that the Infected creatures tend to avoid sunlight.
Therefore, there is a possibility that further inside the area where light does not reach, there are more infected enemies lurking.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
魔赤島の絶崖側と山頂側を繋ぐ橋の付近にある坑道
橋から見える滝の裏側に、ひっそりと隠れるように
存在していたため、発見と初期調査が遅れた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
There is a tunnel near the bridge that connects the cliff side and the summit side of Bloodbane Isle.
It was hidden quietly on the back of the waterfall visible from the bridge, which caused the discovery and initial investigation to be delayed.

column1:
《異邦の岬》の一部から崖下に降りた先に発見
された洞窟。内部からは激しい水音が響き
通常の洞窟と比べてはるかに大量の水を湛えた
洞窟であることが確認されている
column2: Discovered at the bottom of the cliff after descending from a part of the "Foreign Cape," a cave where intense water sounds resonate inside has been confirmed to hold a significantly larger amount of water compared to a typical cave.

column1:
魔赤島・絶崖側の西端に見つかった洞窟
入口付近にも大きく成長した菌胞が張り付き
内部の侵食が激しく進んでいることが一目見て
わかるほどになっている。危機に対処可能な
実力を持つと認められた者のみが調査を許される
column2: Cave found on the western edge of Bloodbane Isle Precipice, known for its intense corruption and infected fungal growth covering the entrance. Only those recognized as having the ability to handle the crisis are permitted to investigate it.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
魔赤島・絶崖側に発見された小聖堂
入口の扉は開閉されるごとに施錠される仕組みと
なっており、特殊な鍵を用いることでしか
開くことができない
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
A small chapel discovered on the Bloodbane Isle - Cliffside.
The entrance door is equipped with a locking mechanism that locks every time it is opened and closed, and can only be opened by using a special key.

column1:
魔赤島中央部にそびえる海を臨む小塔
外壁の様子から、かなり古くも丁寧に手入れをされ
てきたことがうかがえる。用途は不明だが、すぐ傍に
井戸があることから塔内部あるいはその地下にも水が
流れている可能性がある
column2:
A small tower overlooks the sea towering in the central part of Bloodbane Isle. 
From the appearance of the outer wall, it can be inferred that it has been quite old but carefully maintained. 
The purpose is unknown, but there is a well nearby, suggesting that there may be water inside the tower or underground.

column1:
フィンダムの中でも特に自然の美しさに恵まれた水林
大半の水がエランより湧き出でているとされており
良質な水を守るために周辺の森林についても厳重に
管理されている
column2:
In Phindym, the water forest is particularly blessed with natural beauty. 
Most of its water is said to spring forth from Elan, and to protect the high-quality water, 
the surrounding forests are carefully managed.

column1:
エラン水林を管理するために設えられた科学者の住居
元は恵まれた環境を保全するという側面が強かったが
現在は侵食の被害をいかに食い止めるかという点に
研究の重点が置かれているようだ
column2:
The residence of scientists established to manage the Elan Water Grove. 
Initially, the emphasis was on preserving the rich environment, but now the focus of research seems to be on how to halt the spread of corruption and damage caused by it.

column1:
ピクシーたちが棲みついていた場所だが
何らかの魔物の襲撃を受けたらしく
数日に渡り、ピクシーたちの騒ぎ声が
周辺に響いていたという。結局のところ
ピクシーたちは一匹残らず逃げ出したようだ
column2:
The place where the Pixies were residing seems to have been attacked by some kind of enemy. 
For several days, the Pixies' restless voices echoed in the surroundings. 
In the end, it appears that all the Pixies fled.

column1:
川へ降りられるなだらかな坂を有する川辺
一見、水を汲むために最適な場所かと思えるが
水獣が這い上がってくるのにもうってつけの
地形であり、周辺のくさむらを歩く際は
くれぐれも注意が必要
column2:
Riverbank with a gentle slope that leads down to the river. 
At first glance, it may seem like the perfect place to fetch water. 
However, it is a terrain that is ideal for water animals crawling up, so please be careful when walking through the surrounding grasslands.

column1:
エラン水林西部にあるワーグの住み処
戦士たちが力を合わせて何度もワーグの
撃退を試みているが、しばらくすると
この場に群れが舞い戻ってきてしまうという
column2:
Warg dwelling place in the western part of the Elan Water Grove. 
The soldiers have been trying repeatedly to repel the Warg, but shortly after, the creatures return to this location in flocks.

column1:
エラン水林の奥、紫色の花が群生する場所
ほのかに甘い香りが漂うため、花を摘もうと
この場を訪れる者は多い。しかし、芳香に
惹かれるのは人だけではないため、魔物と遭遇
してしまうという不運に見舞われることもある
column2:
In the depths of Elan Water Grove, there is a place where purple flowers bloom in abundance. 
Many people visit this place with the intention of picking the flowers, as a faint sweet fragrance fills the air. 
However, not only humans are drawn to this wonderful scent, but also monsters. 
Thus, the unfortunate could encounter them.

column1:
エラン水林西部、滝の傍にある高台
有翼の魔物の住み処となっていて常に羽音が
絶えない。周辺は草花の群生地にもなっており
鳥に花にと、遠目に見るだけであれば美しい
光景が広がる
column2:
The high ground in the western part of the Elan Water Grove by the waterfall is the home of winged demons and the sound of their wings is always constant. 
The surrounding area is also home to a cluster of flowers and grasses and is beautiful if only seen from a distance, with birds, flowers, and other beautiful sights.

column1:
エラン水林地域にある廃村跡地
住人が魔物の襲撃を受け、全滅して久しい
全滅に至った詳しい経緯は伝わっておらず
いまや忘れ去られた場である
column2:
In the Elan Water Grove, there is a deserted village that has long been destroyed by an enemy attack. 
The detailed circumstances that led to the complete annihilation remain unknown, and now it is a forgotten place.

column1:
《<SPOT 931>》の傍にある、大きな滝に
面した広場。地名の由来は滝に虹がかかる
ことからという説の他に、色鮮やかな鳥達が
辺りを舞うからだという説もある
column2:
A plaza facing a large waterfall beside<SPOT 931>. 
The origin of the name of the place is said to be the rainbow over the waterfall as well as the brightly colored birds dancing around the area.

column1:
《旧船頭寄合所》の周辺、木々に囲まれた川辺
美しい木漏れ日が差す中、エランの美しい川や
流れ落ちる滝を眺めることができる
column2: Surrounded by trees, near the "Old Ferryman's Haunt", one can admire the beauty of the Elan River, with its beautiful sunlight filtering through the leaves, and the sight of cascading waterfalls.

column1:
エラン水林とファーラナ平原を繋ぐ
経路上にある大きな門。以前は簡単な
検問所を備え、エラン水林へ立ち入る
旅人の数を管理していた
column2:
A grand gate stands on the route that connects Elan Water Grove and Farana Plains. 
It used to have a simple checkpoint to manage the number of travelers entering Elan Water Grove.

column1:
《エラン大門》の門前広場
大門が閉ざされるまでは、この場は
商人や旅人で賑わっていた
簡単な造りの店舗もいくつかあったが
いまや骨組を残すばかりである
column2:
In front of the Elan Front Gate Plaza.
Until the gate was closed, his place was bustling with merchants and travelers.
There were several simple shops, but now only the framework remains.

column1:
モロー樹林地域とエラン水林地域を跨ぐ洞窟
距離としてはそう長い洞窟ではないが
野狼が潜んでいることが多いため
通行時には多少の注意が必要である
column2:
Cave spanning both the Morrow Forest and Elan Water Grove. 
It is not a particularly long cave in terms of distance. 
However, since wild wolves often lurk inside, some caution is required when passing through.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
エラン水林西部にある自然洞窟
陽光の差し込む場所がいくつかあり、小さな虹が舞う
ような幻想的な光景が見られることがあるという
かつては周辺住人にも親しまれた場所であった
column2:
<COL ffdc78> 【Treasure】Door</COL>
A natural cave located in the western part of Elan Water Grove. 
There are several places where sunlight filters through, creating a fantastical scene with small rainbows dancing in the air. This place used to be beloved by the local residents.

column1:
荒れ果てた《忘却の廃村》にのこる枯れ井戸
かつて魔物の襲撃を受けた村人たちが逃げ込んだと
いう井戸。村人たちのその後については様々な逸話が
残るが、一人残らず井戸の奥底に潜んでいた別種の
魔物の餌食となったという説が有力である
column2:
In the "Forgotten Abandoned Village" that has been left in ruins, an dried up well remains. 
It is said that the villagers who once fled from the attack of monsters sought refuge in this well. 
There are various tales about what happened to the villagers afterwards, but the theory that they all became prey to a different kind of monster lurking at the bottom of the well is the most plausible one.

column1:
聖域から降りてきた魔物が棲むと伝えられる
鍾乳洞。入り組んだ構造から奥へ進む者は
おらず、どのような魔物が巣食っているのかは
謎に包まれたままとなっている
column2:
It is said that monsters that have descended from the sacred grounds inhabit the limestone cave.
No one has ventured further into its intricate structure, leaving the question of what kind of enemy lurks there shrouded in mystery.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
元は船頭たちが休憩所として使っていた洞窟
居心地が良く、動物も訪れる癒しの場であったが
それゆえに獲物を求めた魔物に狙われることとなり
現在は魔物に乗っ取られた状態にある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone Door】</COL>
Originally a cave used by boatmen as a resting place, it was a soothing place where even animals visited. 
However, it became the target of monsters seeking prey, and it is currently under the control of these monsters.

column1:
中規模の採石場として使われていた洞窟
魔物が侵入し、作業中の人員が襲われるという
悲劇が起きた。命からがら逃げだした者はすぐに
洞窟を封鎖したが、その時まだ中からは助けを
求める声が響いていたという
column2:
The cave, which was used as a medium-sized quarry, was invaded by enemies that tragically attacked the workers. 
The survivors quickly sealed off the cave, but at that time, cries for help could still be heard from inside.

column1:
フィンダム大陸中部に広がる平原
起伏が多いフィンダムにおいて、ファーラナ平原は
なだらかで活用しやすい地形をしている
また、他の地域と比較すると侵食の度合は
緩やかなようで侵食魔の数も少ない
column2:
The Farana Plains, located in the central part of the Phindym continent, are characterized by gently rolling terrain, making them easy to utilize in the varied landscape of Phindym.
Furthermore, compared to other regions, the level of corruption is relatively low, resulting in fewer corrupted creatures.

column1:
フィンダム大陸の中央部
精霊竜がねぐらとしている《芯なる樹》が
青々と生い茂る様は、フィンダム大陸の
どの拠点からでも眺めることができる
人々はその壮大さに確かな加護を感じて過ごしていた
column2:
In the central part of the Phindym continent, the Spirit Dragon's habitat, the "Core Tree", thrives with lush greenery, which can be observed from any stronghold in Phindym.
People feel a definite blessing in its grandeur as they go about their lives.

column1:
ファーラナ平原に位置する戦士の村
武勇を最も尊ぶ部族が住まい、住人たちは
日々鍛錬と戦いに明け暮れている
力に裏付けされてか、地理的な理由に寄るものか
比較的侵食の影響を受けずに生活している
column2:
A village of warriors located in the Farana Plains.
The inhabitants, who hold valor in the highest regard, spend their days immersed in training and battles. 
Whether supported by their strength or due to geographical reasons, they live relatively unaffected by corruption.

column1:
ダナの村の近くに佇む庵
《スピリットランサー》のジョブマスターである
勇壮な槍士アデルドナハが住んでいる
見込みのある者に対しては、自身のもつ
技術を伝授することもあるという
column2:
Near Dana Village stands a hermitage, where the brave Job Master of the Spirit Lancers, Adair Donnchadh, resides. 
It is said that he also imparts his skills to promising individuals.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の片隅、大岩の割れ目に
隠れるようにして作られた小さな集落
一切の外部との交流を断った結果、非常に独特な
文化を形成するにいたった一族が住んでいる
column2: In a corner of the Farana Plains, in a crack in a large rock, there lives a small hidden settlement inhabited by a tribe that has developed a very unique culture as a result of refusing all contact with the outside world.

column1:
精霊竜が棲む《始まりの洞》下層に位置する拠点
精霊竜の守りをする者たちや訪れた人々が
暫しの休息を得るための場となっている
column2:
Base camp located in the lower level of the Hollow of Beginnings, where the Spirit Dragon resides. 
It serves as a place for the protectors of the Spirit Dragon and for those who have visited to find temporary rest and respite.

column1:
《芯なる樹》の最深部
侵食による影響が出るまでは、精霊竜との
謁見などはこの場所で行われていた
精霊竜の守りとして選ばれた者たちが控えていた
集いの間と隣接している
column2:
The deepest part of the "Core Tree".
Until the effects of corruption took hold, meetings with the Spirit Dragon were held in this location.
Those chosen as guardians of the Spirit Dragon awaited in the adjacent Gathering Hall.

column1:
ファーラナ平原にぽつりと佇む住居の遺跡
古くはこの場所にダナの村があったのだが
拓けた場という防御面の弱さが問題視され
地形が入り組み敵の進入を妨げる現在の
場に移り住んだ
column2:
In the Farana Plains, stands the ruins of a dwelling, all by itself.
Long ago, there was a village called Dana in this place.
However, the vulnerability of this wide-open area in terms of defense was seen as an issue.
So they moved to the current location, where the terrain is intricate and hinders enemy infiltration.

column1:
ファーラナ遺跡の周辺にある円形遺跡
在りし日は戦士たちが武を競う闘技場として
使用されていたらしいが、当時の柱などは
ほとんど倒壊してしまっているため
現在は特に注目されることもない
column2:
The circular ruins near the Farana Ruins.
Used to be a battlefield where warriors competed, but most of the columns from that time have collapsed, so there is currently no particular attention given to it.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の山肌にあるニュートの巣穴
そう深さは無く、食糧を貯蓄している様子も無いので
恐らく休息を得る目的で作られたのだろう
見張りを立てて交替で使用しているのか、入口
付近では常にニュートが目を光らせている
column2:
On the mountainside of the Farana Plains, there is a Newt Den. 
It doesn't appear to be very deep, and there doesn't seem to be any stored food, so it was probably made for the purpose of resting. 
Near the entrance, the Newts always keep watch, taking turns to stand guard.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の《マグサス古水路》入口付近、岩が
立ち並ぶ周辺。巨大な岩が数個露出している以外は
特に目立つものも無い場所であるが、鎧の擦れる音が
聞こえたり、視界の端に巨大な剣が見えたという
報告が絶えない
column2:
Near the entrance of Magusas Ancient Watercourse in the Farana Plains, there is a surrounding area with rocks scattered about. 
Other than a few exposed giant rocks, there is nothing particularly noticeable about this place. 
However, there are constant reports of hearing the sound of armor scraping and seeing a giant sword at the edge of one's field of vision.

column1:
ファーラナ平原奥地にある湿地帯
霧が発生しやすく視界が悪いことが多い
甲竜が棲息しており、目を凝らせば霧の
奥でゆっくりと動く巨影を確認することができる
column2:
In the depths of the Farana Plains, there is a marshland where mist often forms, making visibility poor.
Beasts known as "Shell Dragons" reside there, and if you focus your eyes, you can confirm the slow-moving silhouette deep within the mist.

column1:
ファーラナ平原とエラン水林を繋ぐ谷あい
の道、中ほどにある少し拓けた場所
周囲を崖に囲まれているため、大型の魔物が
身を隠して羽根を休めるための巣として
利用している
column2:
A slightly open place in the middle of the road connecting the Farana Plains and the Elan Water Grove. 
The surrounding cliffs make it a nest for large monsters to hide and rest their wings.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の川中に浮かぶ陸地
周辺は水深が浅く、水没してはいるものの
歩き回ることが可能。ただし、汚泥が流れ着く
ことも多いらしく、不浄の魔物がさ迷っている
こともある
column2:
A piece of land floating in the middle of the river in the Farana Plains. 
The surrounding waters are shallow, allowing for exploration on foot, despite periodic submersion. 
However, it appears that mud and debris often accumulate here, leading to the presence of foul creatures wandering about.

column1:
戦士の村であるダナ付近にある廟堂
ダナには、自らの武勇の証を立てるため
この廟堂に巣食う魔物を倒してみせるという
文化が存在する。ただし、かつては頻繁に行われて
いたらしいが、現代において使用されることはごく稀
column2:
There is a shrine near the village of warriors, called Dana.
In order to prove their bravery, there is a cultural tradition of defeating the monsters that inhabit this shrine.
However, it is very rare for this tradition to be practiced in modern times.

column1:
古代に住居として使用されていたらしき洞窟
最近はピクシーが棲みつき、人間が足を
踏み入れることは難しい状況にある。奥は猛獣が
縄張りとしているとの情報もあったが
ピクシーたちが必死に通路を塞いだようだ
column2:
It appears that this cave was once used as a dwelling in ancient times. 
Recently, it has been inhabited by pixies, making it difficult for humans to enter. 
There is also information that there are fierce animals deep inside, but it seems that the pixies have desperately blocked the passage.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ファーラナ平原中で最大規模の遺跡
多少崩壊している箇所もあるが全体の作りは堅固
であり、魔物に侵入されるまでは過去の貴重な
文献などを保管する書庫として活用されてきた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】 Door</COL>
The largest archaeological site in the Farana Plains, with some areas showing signs of collapse, but the overall structure is solid.
It was once used as a repository for valuable historical documents, storing them until it was invaded by enemies.

column1:
古将マグサスを始めとした歴戦の猛者たちが
眠る墓所。水路も兼ねていたが、いつの頃からか
ウィルムが棲みつき、慰霊のために訪れる者は
いなくなった。まれに、副葬品狙いの墓荒らしが
命知らずにも入り込むことがあるらしい
column2:
The resting place of seasoned warriors, including the ancient hero Magusas. 
While also serving as a waterway, it has been inhabited by a Wyrm for quite some time now, and those who used to visit to pay their respects have disappeared. 
Occasionally, grave robbers, driven by the desire for burial artifacts, dare to venture in unknowingly.

column1:
芯なる樹と聖塔が融合した《始まりの洞》内部
へと続く回廊。塔自体は数千年前から存在する
ものであるが、芯なる樹に支えられていることで
非常に良い状態で保たれている
column2: Corridor leading to the Hollow of Beginnings, where the Core Tree and the Holy Tower have merged. Although the tower itself has been in existence for thousands of years, it is kept in very good condition thanks to the support of the Core Tree.

column1:
《精霊竜のねぐら》へと続くらせん状の階段を
有した空間。空気中に満ちた竜力の加護か、
これだけの長い階段を上ってもまるで足の痛みを
感じることが無いという
column2:
A spiraling staircase leading to the "Spirit Dragon's Roost." 
Perhaps due to the divine protection of the Dragon Force permeating the air, one can ascend this long staircase without feeling any pain in their feet.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
大量の水を湛えた自然の地下洞窟を元に作られた
集水路。今まで水が枯れたことは無く、手入れが
必要無かったことから最低限しか手が入れられて
いない。最近は水竜が棲みついているとの噂もある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>[Treasure] Door</COL>
A canal that was built based on a natural underground cave filled with a large amount of water. 
The water has never dried up before and minimal maintenance has been carried out because it has not been necessary. 
There have been rumors recently that water dragons have made it their habitat.

column1:
精霊竜が棲む、《芯なる樹》の頂上部
フィンダム大陸中で最も竜力に満ちた
清浄な空間であったが、精霊竜が毒に
侵されたことにより、苦痛と禍々しさに
溢れる場所となった
column2:
At the top of the "Core Tree," where the "Spirit Dragon" resides.
The place most filled with "Dragon Force" in the entire continent of Phindym.
It was once a pure space, but due to the Spirit Dragon being tainted by poison, it has become a place filled with pain and malevolence.

column1:
《芯なる樹》の太い根が伸び、聖域の影響が
色濃く出た遺跡。入口が崩落してはいるが
そのせいもあってか人が入った形跡は最小限に
保たれている
column2:
The thick roots of the "Core Tree" stretch out, and the influence of the Sacred Grounds is strongly felt. 
Although the entrance has collapsed, and perhaps because of that, there are minimal signs of anyone entering.

column1:
かつてはフィンダム中から学者たちが集う学研の場で
あった小塔。魔物の襲撃を受けて放棄されたのち
ピクシーの大きな群れが移住した。位の高い
ピクシーは高所を好むため、小塔の上階には群れ
の長もしくは準ずる個体が生息していると思われる
column2:
A small tower in the midst of Phindym, where scholars gathered in the past. 
After being abandoned due to enemy raids, a large group of Pixies migrated there. 
Pixies of high rank prefer high places, so it is believed that the leader or a similar individual of the group resides on the upper floor of the tower.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の少し奥まった高台に建つ小塔
以前は代々内部で暮らす者たちがいたものの
彼らは二百年近く前に突然塔から出てダナ村に
合流したという。それ以来、たまに掃除に訪れる
者がいる程度で普段は無人となっている
column2:
On a slightly secluded hill in Farana Plains, there is a small tower. 
Previously, there were people living inside for generations. 
However, about two hundred years ago, they suddenly left the tower and joined Dana Village. 
Since then, it has been uninhabited, with only occasional visitors for cleaning.

column1:
フィンダム随一の森林地帯
樹木や草花、多様な獣といった森の恩恵を
受けられるこの地の特性は、反面侵食の影響が
最も色濃く発現する悲劇を招いた。生命力に
溢れていた森は今や赤く立ち枯れている箇所が目立つ
column2:
The premier woodland region of Phindym, where one can enjoy the benefits of the forest, including trees, flowers, and a variety of animals.
However, the characteristic of this land also brings about the tragic manifestation of the most intense corruption and infection.
The once vibrant forest now stands with prominent red decay.

column1:
モロー樹林にある、木々に囲まれた村
代々精霊竜の守りをしてきた一族が住まう
そのせいか理知的な者が多く、学者を多数
輩出してきた。威厳ある族長・ガラダに
よって統治されている
column2:
In the Morrow Forest, there is a village surrounded by trees, where a clan that has been guarding the Spirit Dragon for generations resides.
Perhaps because of this, there are many intellectual individuals, and they have produced numerous scholars. 
They are ruled by the dignified chieftain, Gearóid.

column1:
モルフォール周辺にある巨岩群
いずれかの巨岩の下に高名な賢者ティルカンが
眠ると言われている。残念ながら、墓となる岩を
特定するための情報は失われている
column2:
A group of giant rocks in the vicinity of Morfaul. 
It is said that a renowned sage named Tilkan sleeps under one of the rocks. 
Unfortunately, the information to identify the specific rock that serves as his grave is lost.

column1:
モロー樹林西部にある、ゴブリンが小さな群れを
形成して潜んでいた一帯。この小さな群れは
あまり攻撃性が高くなかったとみられ、ひっそりと
森の奥で暮らしていたらしい。しかし、今は侵食に
よって凶暴になってしまっているため注意が必要
column2:
In the Morrow Forest in the west, a small group of Goblins has formed and hidden. 
This small group appeared to have low aggressiveness and quietly lived deep in the forest. 
However, they have become dangerously aggressive due to corruption, so caution is necessary.

column1:
《モローケイヴァン》入口付近の木立
この辺りの土壌、木々は侵食が進むあまり
もはや目を覆いたくなるような状況である
緑豊かだった木々は今や立ち枯れ、菌糸体を
まとって赤くひび割れてすらいる
column2:
Near the entrance of Morrow Cavern, the surrounding grove is in such a state of corruption and infected that it becomes unbearable to look at. 
The once lush trees are now standing dead, covered in reddened cracks and even infected with mycelium.

column1:
モルフォールの裏手にあるピクシーたちの野営地
家畜や農作物をこっそり盗むのが元々の目的だった
のだろうが、侵食されたピクシーたちには最早
そういった知性は無く、恐らく侵食前の習慣に従い
辺りをうろついているのだと推測されている
column2:
Camp of Pixies behind Morfaul.
Originally, their purpose was to secretly steal livestock and crops.
However, the Pixies who have been corrupted no longer possess such intelligence, and it is speculated that they are simply wandering around based on their habits before corruption.

column1:
以前は人が暮らす小さな拠点として機能していたが
侵食魔に脅かされた住人たちは土地を捨てて
逃げることを選び、現在は魔物が闊歩するのみ
となっている
column2: It used to function as a small hub of human habitation, but threatened by the invading demons, the residents chose to abandon their land and flee, and now it is only a place where demons roam.

column1:
モロー樹林地域に現存する唯一の遺跡
大変古い小神殿の遺跡だと思われるが
殆ど倒壊しており痕跡が確認できるのみである
また、周囲には魔物が棲みつき始めたため
いよいよ誰も近寄らない場所となってしまった
column2:
Translation: It is believed to be the only remaining ruins in the Morrow Forest region. 
Though it appears to be the remnants of a very ancient shrine, it has mostly collapsed and only traces can be observed. Furthermore, due to the presence of enemy creatures in the vicinity, it has become a place that nobody dares to approach anymore.

column1:
<SPOT 964>にある木立
土壌の侵食が進み、木々も草花も
立ったままの姿で色褪せ、枯れかかっている
辺りに住んでいた小型の魔物たちも
残らず侵食が進んだ状態となっている
column2:
At <SPOT 964>, the surrounding trees are fading away and withering, with the soil being corrupted. 
Even the small creatures that once inhabited the area have been completely infected.

column1:
<SPOT 964>に位置する窪地
青い芝に覆われた小動物の住み処は、いまや
剥き出しの土の上に不気味な菌糸体を
はびこらせている。広々とした地形は大型の
魔物が巣食いやすく危険である
column2:
Located at <SPOT 964>, this depression which was once covered in green grass, is now overrun with eerie mycelium spread across the exposed earth. 
The spacious terrain makes it dangerous and a suitable nest for large monsters.

column1:
《ノーザナス侵林》入口のある崖の下に
広がる平地。封鎖されている侵林に
引き寄せられているのか、侵食が進んだ
有翼の魔物たちがしきりにこの辺りを
さまよう姿が確認されている
column2:
A flat area of land spreading out under the cliff where the entrance to the Northerners Infected Woods is
located. 
It is confirmed that winged beasts, infected by corruption, are frequently wandering around this area.

column1:
元はピクシーの群れが棲みついていた洞窟だったが
何らかの侵食魔の襲撃を受けたことがきっかけで
群れ全体に侵食が蔓延してしまったと推測される
侵食の度合から見て、ピクシーたちを襲った魔物は
洞窟の奥に潜んでいるらしい
column2:
The original cave was once inhabited by a group of Pixies, but it was attacked by some kind of corrupted creature, causing the corruption to spread throughout the entire group.
Based on the extent of the corruption, it is speculated that the creature that attacked the Pixies is lurking deep within the cave.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
元は採掘場として人でにぎわっていた洞窟
侵食による影響が発見されてからの進行がはやく
人々は採掘道具すら回収しきらぬままに撤退したが
情報が行きわたらず取り残された者もいた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>[Dragon Force] Door</COL>
Originally, the cave was bustling with people as a mining site. 
However, the progress since the discovery of the effects of corruption has been rapid. 
People withdrew without even fully recovering their mining tools, but there were some who were left behind without receiving any information.

column1:
モロー樹林北部、特に侵食が進んだ一帯にある
封鎖された森林。侵食前より森の強者が棲むとされ、
人が迷いこむことが無いようにと封鎖されていた場所
奥を確かめた者はいないが、凶暴な魔物が侵食された
状態にあることは確実であり、危険度は高い
column2:
The sealed forest located in the northern part of Morrow Forest, where corruption has particularly advanced.
It is said to be inhabited by powerful beings of the forest, and it was sealed off to prevent people from getting lost. 
No one has ventured deep inside, but it is certain that ferocious monsters have been infected. The level of danger is high.

column1:
モロー樹林北西部にある封鎖された森林
小さな集落がある穏やかな森だったものの
侵食の度合が激しく、人々も集落を捨てて
逃げ出している。ピクシーたちが集まる小屋も
あったが、侵食に飲み込まれてしまった
column2:
Sealed forest in the northwest of Morrow Forest. 
It was once a peaceful forest with a small village, but the level of corruption grew severe, causing the people to abandon the village and escape. 
There was also a cabin where the pixies gathered, but it too was swallowed up by the corruption.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
モロー樹林北部に位置する封鎖された森林
グリフィンの飛来を理由に立ち入りを制限されていた
確認しに行った者はいないが、恐らくこの場にいた
グリフィンも侵食されてしまったものと思われる
column2:
<COL ffdc78>Jewelry Door</COL>
A sealed forest located in the northern part of Morrow Forest.
Access was restricted due to the arrival of a griffin.
No one has confirmed it, but it is likely that the griffin present in this area has also been corrupted.

column1:
細長くうねった川と切り立った崖で構成された峡谷
古代からの遺跡が多くのこる地域であり、文化的に
重要な地帯である。この辺りに住む人々も、伝承や
習慣などを重視した生活を送る傾向にある
column2:
An area composed of a narrow, winding river and steep cliffs, forming a gorge. 
It is a region with many ancient ruins remaining, making it culturally significant. 
The people living in this area tend to prioritize traditions and customs in their way of life.

column1:
キンガル峡谷に位置する村
近くに多数のこる遺跡や神殿などの古代文明に
畏怖の念を抱き、古くからの伝統や伝承などを
現在に伝え継いできた一族が住んでいる
村の掟として、村人が遺跡に近づくことを禁じている
column2:
Village located in Kingal Canyon.
Nearby are numerous ancient ruins and temples that belong to a long-lost civilization.
The villagers, who have lived here since ancient times, hold a deep reverence for these sites and their traditions and legends.
As a village rule, the villagers are forbidden from approaching the ruins.

column1:
キンガル峡谷北部に位置する小塔
通常の拠点ではなく塔の中で暮らすことを
選んだ一族が暮らしている。住人は独自の
文化を継承しているらしく、殆ど小塔の外に
出ないように生活している
column2:
There is a small tower located in the northern part of Kingal Canyon. 
There, a clan has chosen to live inside the tower instead of a regular settlement. 
The residents seem to have inherited their own culture and live their lives mostly without venturing outside the tower.

column1:
キンガル峡谷西部にある川岸
《芯なる樹》を非常に近くから眺められるほか
崖に近寄ることで、その根元を見ることすら
可能。ただし、現在は獣の死骸を目当てに
寄ってくる魔物に注意が必要である
column2:
On the riverbank in the western part of Kingal Canyon, you can admire the "Core Tree" from a very close distance.
By approaching the cliffs, you can even see its roots.
However, caution is necessary as there are currently monsters that come near in search of animal carcasses.

column1:
グリンデュア対岸にあたる拓けた河岸
以前はこの河岸から河に出るための船が
出ていたが、ある頃から人や積み荷の
上げ降ろし中に魔物に襲われることが
増えたため、現在は使われていない
column2:
On the opposite bank of Glyndwr, there is a wide riverbank. 
In the past, boats would leave from this bank to go out onto the river. 
However, at some point, the number of attacks by enemies during the loading and unloading of people and cargo increased, so the boats are no longer in use.

column1:
キンガル峡谷中央部、遠浅の川岸が続く一帯
この周囲は人が歩いて渡れるほどに浅い岸が
広がっている。また、魔物が食い散らかしたと
見られる魚や動物の死肉が大量に流れ着いており
風向きによっては悪臭が漂う日もあるようだ
column2:
