In the central part of Kingal Canyon, there is an area where the riverbank is shallow enough for people to walk across. 
The surrounding area is extensive, with what seems to be a large amount of dead fish and animals that have been devoured by enemies. 
Depending on the wind direction, there are days when a foul smell lingers in the air.

column1:
《シェドレアン大神殿》の門前にある広場
荘厳な神殿を臨むこの場に似合わず、辺りには
獣の死骸が散らばり、死臭が立ち込めている
魔族の影を見たという報告もあるため、通行時には
十分な警戒が必要である
column2:
In front of the gate of the "Shadolean Great Temple", there is a plaza. 
Despite its majestic temple, there are animal carcasses scattered around, and the stench of death fills the air. 
There have also been reports of sightings of fiendish creatures, so caution is necessary when passing through.

column1:
グリンメル遺跡の近くにある川岸
以前は遺跡への参道だったが、土が水に削られてゆき
現在は完全に川の中に沈んでしまっている
見かけより水深はないため、子供でも歩いて
渡ることが可能である
column2:
A riverside near the Grinmel Ruins.
It used to be a pathway to the ruins, but the soil was eroded by water and now it has completely sunk into the river. 
Despite appearing treacherous, the water depth is not significant, so even children can walk across it.

column1:
キンガル峡谷西部にある拠点跡地
この村が滅んだ理由は明らかになっていないが
周辺の状況から、局所的な飢饉に襲われ
抵抗する力が落ちていたところへ魔物の襲撃を受け
全滅したのではないかと言われている
column2:
Village ruins located in the western part of Kingal Canyon.
The reason for the village's demise is still unclear, but it is said that it was attacked by monsters when its resistance was weakened by a localized famine. 
It is believed that the village was completely wiped out.

column1:
元々はフィンダムの大地へ、そして竜のために季節
ごとの舞踊が奉納されていた広場。侵食によって
フィンダム全域での危険度が増したことでこれらの
行事は中止され、以来本来の使い方をされることは
無くなった
column2:
A square originally dedicated to seasonal dances dedicated to the dragon. 
Due to the increase in danger throughout Phindym caused by the Corruption, these events were canceled and have since ceased to be used for their original purpose.

column1:
グリンデュア対岸に位置する古代神殿の遺跡
内部は活性化したデーモンが多数巣食っている
ところどころにそう古くはない書籍などが
散乱しているところから、最近まで何らかの
施設として利用されていた様子が垣間見える
column2:
Situated across from Glyndwr, there are the remains of an ancient temple. 
The interior is inhabited by numerous active demons. 
Scattered throughout are relatively new books and materials, indicating that it was recently used as some kind of facility.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
キンガル峡谷にある遺跡
当時の覚者を導いたとされる巫女が祀られている遺跡
周りを山脈に囲まれているせいか、元は大地を巡る
竜力の恩恵を受けやすい立地であった
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】 Door</COL>
An Arisen is said to have been guided by a maiden who is enshrined in the ruins of Kingal Canyon. 
The ruins are surrounded by mountains, making it a location that was easily influenced by the blessings of Dragon Force, which once circulated the land.

column1:
キンガル峡谷に悠然と佇む古代神殿
数百年前に遺棄されたものの、当時満ち満ちていた
竜力によって未だ壮麗な姿をそのままにしている
遺棄された理由は、恐らく精霊竜自身が神殿よりも
《芯なる樹》の傍にあることを好んだためだろう
column2:
Standing gracefully in the Kingal Canyon, the ancient temple remains magnificent, even after being abandoned hundreds of years ago.
It still retains its grandeur, thanks to the Dragon Force that once thrived here. 
The reason for its abandonment was likely because the Spirit Dragon preferred to be near the "Core Tree" rather than the temple itself.

column1:
《イヴァノスの塔》付近にある大遺跡
倒壊はしているものの入口付近には飾柱も
多数のこっており、豪華な造りだったことが
うかがえる。壁面には何らかの呪印が刻まれて
いるらしく強い魔力の痕跡がある
column2:
Near the "Tower of Ivanos" there is a large ancient ruin. 
Although it has collapsed, there are numerous decorative columns near the entrance, suggesting that it was once splendidly built. 
The walls are engraved with some kind spell, leaving traces of intense magic power.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
以前は旅商人たちが頻繁に利用していたらしいが
少し前からピクシーたちに乗っ取られた状態にある
奥へ行くほど侵食が進んでいるため、内部に
入り込もうとした者も途中で引き返してきたという
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
It seems that in the past, it was frequently used by traveling merchants, but for a while now, it has been taken over by Pixies.
The further you go inside, the more the corruption is apparent.
Those who tried to enter have turned back halfway.

column1:
侵食が拡がっているほか、それ以前からも盗賊に
よってひどく荒らされた形跡が生々しく残る
活性化したデーモンが巣食っており、侵食によって
さらに凶暴化した状態で跋扈している
column2:
The corruption is spreading, and there are clear signs of extensive damage caused by bandits even before that. 
Demons have taken up residence and are rampaging in a more aggressive state due to the corruption.

column1:
多彩な獣が棲息し、アッカーシェランにおいて
国内有数の狩場となっている山麓
まっすぐに伸びる良質な木材にも恵まれており
近隣に棲む人々の多くは狩猟、もしくは林業で
生計を立てて暮らしている
column2:
Various animals inhabit the foothills and it has become one of the top hunting grounds in the country. 
The foothills are also blessed with high-quality timber that stretches straight. 
Many of the nearby residents make a living through hunting or forestry.

column1:
西部にはアッカーシェラン最大の湖《翡翠湖》が
広がっているのが最大の特徴。
その大きな湖からもたらされる恵みの一つが
大振りで上品な味の魚であり、地域の村や
集落には独自の魚料理が発達している
column2: In the western region, the largest lake in Acre Selund, known as "Emerald Lake," spreads out, which is its main feature of area. One of the blessings brought by this large lake is the large and elegant-tasting fish, which has led to the development of unique fish cuisine in the local villages and settlements.

column1:
解放軍が拠点として使っている小さな集落
元はきこりが使っていたらしき空き家を中心に、
逃げ延びた人たちがテントを張って暮らしているが
いつオークに攻め込まれるかわからない状況にある
column2:
The small settlement used as a base by the Liberation Army.
It originally consisted of vacant houses, seemingly once occupied by lumberjacks. 
Now, people who managed to escape have pitched tents and are living there, constantly facing the uncertainty of when they will be attacked by Orcs.

column1:
600年ほど前に建造された砦
アッカー家が並み居る地方豪族を倒して
大陸統一を果たした後に、対オーク用に強化されて
現在に至る。長く役目を果たしていたが“悪しき竜”
出現直後にオーク軍に占拠された
column2:
A fort that was built about 600 years ago. 
After the Acre family defeated the local feudal lords, they strengthened it to fend off the Orcs and it has remained that way to this day. 
It had served its purpose for a long time, but was occupied by the Orc army shortly after the appearance of the "Evil Dragon."

column1:
翡翠湖を臨む、長くロスギル家が治める地方の中心地
魔物が多い地帯ならではの重装家屋が見られる
王族アッカー家から一帯の守護を任されてきた
ロスギル家の末裔を長に頂き、忠誠心に篤い人々が
暮らしている
column2:
Overlooking Emerald Lake, in the heart of a region long ruled by the Rothgill family.
One can see the sturdy houses characteristic of this land abundant in enemies. 
Tasked with protecting the entire area by the noble Acre family, descendants of the Rothgill family serve as its leaders, with loyal and devoted individuals living here.

column1:
一部では“南の盗賊”と呼ばれる大盗賊ベルタ
率いる盗賊団の隠れ里。湖に流れ込む川に
よって浸食されてできた洞窟でもある
並の人間では辿り着くことができない場所に
あるといわれている
column2:
A hidden village of a notorious bandit group led by the great bandit Bertha, also known as the "Bandit of the South." 
It is said to be located in a cave formed by erosion from a river that flows into the lake, in a place that cannot be reached by ordinary people.

column1:
隠れ村ピレモス付近にあるグリムゴブリンたちの
縄張り。見よう見まねで作ったらしき、オークや
人間の作るものに似た構造物が散見される
どうやらゴブリンたちもここを拠点とし
人間の動向を見張っているつもりのようだ
column2:
The territory of the Grim Goblins near Hidden Village Piremoth. 
Structures resembling those made by orcs and humans can be seen, apparently made by mimicking. 
It seems that the goblins consider this place their base and are keeping an eye on the movements of humans.

column1:
ロスギルにほど近い開けた高台
まだ拠点として使われている様子は
見られないが、魔狼たちがなわばりとして
警戒し続けていることから、ロスギルへ
攻め込む際の足掛かりとされる可能性がある
column2:
An open plateau, not far from Rothgill. 
Although it doesn't appear to be currently used as a base, there is a possibility that it serves as a stepping stone for an attack on Rothgill, as the demon wolves continue to guard it territorially.

column1:
魔軍の襲撃により抵抗虚しく潰えた村
周囲の小さな集落を繋ぐ役割を果たしていた中心的な
山村だったが、それ故に早期に魔軍の襲撃を受けた
建物は一つ残らず破壊され、放たれた火が未だ燻り
続ける様には生々しい痛ましさが漂う
column2:
The village, which served as the central mountain village connecting the surrounding small settlements, was completely crushed by the raid of the Demon Army. 
Every building was destroyed without exception, and the lingering fire still smolders, carrying a raw and painful sensation.

column1:
解放軍が休憩をとるために設営した小さな小屋
オークたちの襲撃を受けた際に母屋以外は全て
破壊されてしまった。そればかりか、現在は
魔軍が利用している形跡すらみられる
column2:
The small hut set up by the Liberation Army for rest was completely destroyed during the Orc attack, except for the main house.
Not only that, but there are even signs that the Demon Army is currently using it.

column1:
魔軍が休息地として利用している岩洞
入口からは想像がつかないほど大きく開けた内部
空間は一見休むに最適かと思えるが、じめじめと
しており、スライムなども発生しやすい。魔物ならば
いざ知らず人間はここで休む気にはなれないだろう
column2:
The demon army is using the cave as a resting place. 
The interior, which is much larger than one would imagine from the entrance, seems like an ideal place to rest at first glance. However, it is damp and prone to slime and other creatures. 
While demons may not mind, humans would not feel inclined to rest here.

column1:
関所を守るように魔軍の大隊が留まっている拠点
設置された多数の大砲は解放軍の戦力を大幅に削いだ
運良く砲弾を逃れた兵もいたようだが、敵陣の
中で寡兵での戦いを強いられることとなったのは
寧ろ悲劇であった
column2:
The demon army's battalion is stationed at the stronghold, as if guarding a checkpoint. 
The numerous cannons that were set up significantly depleted the liberation army's forces. 
Some fortunate soldiers managed to dodge the cannonballs, but they were forced into a battle with few troops within enemy lines. 
It was a tragedy.

column1:
魔軍戦車《カトブレパス》が留められている広場
巨大且つ凶暴、全てを踏み砕きながら進む
カトブレパスだが、魔軍はそれをさらに武装させた
ものを“戦車”として使役している
column2:
The plaza where the demon army's tank, Catoblepas, is stationed.
Gigantic and fierce, it crushes everything in its path.
The demon army has further armed and prepared it as a "tank" for their use.

column1:
他の拠点とは異なり、施設や柵の類が極端に少ない
魔軍拠点。何らかの理由で本来意図しなかった
場所に拠点を急造しなければならなかったのか、
あるいは柵を立てられない状況にあったのかは
偵察からの情報だけでは判断できない
column2:
Unlike other bases, this Demon Army stronghold has extremely few facilities and fences. 
It is unclear whether the base had to be hastily constructed in an unintended location due to some reason, or if they were unable to erect fences in their current situation. 
This cannot be determined based solely on reconnaissance information.

column1:
オーク軍の将軍《獣の将》が支配する魔獣を
放している危険な区画が発見された
うろついている魔獣は獣の将が特に気に入って
いる個体であるとも、強化実験のために何らかの
特別な処理を施された個体だとも推測されている
column2:
A dangerous zone where the Beast Master of the Orc army controls the beasts has been discovered. 
It is speculated that the roaming demon beasts are individuals that the Beast Master particularly favors or individuals that have undergone some special treatment for strengthening experiments.

column1:
一見よくある洞窟だが高低差が激しい
箇所があったり、より奥へ進んだ者がことごとく
戻らなかったという経緯から、近辺で育った
者はこの洞穴に近寄らないよう厳しく教え
込まれるという
column2:
At first glance, it appears to be a typical cave, but there are steep variations in height, and those who venture further inside never return. 
People who grew up in the vicinity are strictly instructed not to approach this cave.

column1:
廃村デニスィルの裏手にある古い地下水路
魔軍のオークが見張りについていることから
内部に何かが隠されているか、あるいは重要な
通路の一つとして見なされていると推測される
また、ティネス砦に繋がっているという説もある
column2:
Behind the deserted village of Denisyr, there is an old underground waterway. 
The fact that orc soldiers from the Demon Army are stationed there suggests that something is hidden inside or that it is considered an important passage. 
There is also a theory that it connects to Fort Thines.

column1:
野生動物が棲みついている洞窟
特にめぼしい資源があるわけでもない場所
だったが、なぜか近年にわかに「奥に宝物が
隠されている」という噂が流れた
column2:
The cave where wild animals reside is not particularly known for any valuable resources.
However, for some reason, a rumor has recently spread saying that treasure is hidden deep within.

column1:
ダクレイム砦付近にある岩山の中に造られた遺跡
砦の付近という格好の場所にあるため、魔軍・人間
両勢力がこの遺跡を拠点として利用しようとしたが
共に最深部まで辿り着くことはできなかった
誰一人として生還者がいないため、その原因も不明
column2:
Ruins built inside a rocky mountain near Dacreim Fortress. 
It was a prime location, so both the Demon Army and the humans tried to use this ruin as their base. 
However, neither of them were able to reach the deepest part. 
There were no survivors, and the cause is also unknown.

column1:
ベルタ盗賊団のアジト近くに流れる地下水路
武装した魔獣が徘徊しているが、それを御す
オークの姿は確認されていない。盗賊団の
アジトを探すために放たれた魔獣が迷い込み、
そのまま帰還せず棲みついてしまったようだ
column2:
Near the hideout of Bertha's Bandit Group, there is an underground waterway flowing. 
Armed beasts roam around, but they are tamed. 
No orcs have been spotted. 
A magical creature that was unleashed to search for the bandit group's hideout got lost and ended up settling there.

column1:
アッカーシェラン王家に連なる者、または王家の
ためにその力を尽くした英雄たちが眠る祠
王家の治める地の中でもラスニテ山麓との
縁が深い英雄たちが祀られ、死した後も
人々を見守っているという
column2: Shrine where the descendants of the Acre Selund royal family, or the heroes who devoted their power to the royal family, rest. Among the lands ruled by the royal family, it is said that the heroes who have a deep connection with the Rathnite Foothills are enshrined and continue to watch over the people even after their death.

column1:
本人が生前に希望、もしくは身寄りがないなど
特殊な事情を背負って散った戦士たちが葬られている
集団墓地。国が乱れる前までは専属の衛士によって
警備されていたが、現在は封鎖。内部がどのような状況
かもわからず、不気味な噂のみが広まっている
column2:
A collective graveyard where warriors who perished under special circumstances, such as having no kin, or expressing their desire for it before their death, are buried. 
Before the country fell into chaos, it was guarded by dedicated soldiers, but now it is sealed off. 
The interior's condition is unknown, and only eerie rumors have spread.

column1:
北東部には、アッカーシェラン王国にとっての要衝
である《展望城》が存在する。通常、王族が居留
することはなく、兵士たちによる防衛拠点として機能
していた。水脈が豊富である一方で水はけの悪い地質
であり、ぬかるみや滝が多いため足元には注意が必要
column2:
In the northeastern region, there is a critical stronghold for the Kingdom of Acre Selund, called "Lookout Castle." 
It usually functions as a defensive base for the soldiers and is not typically inhabited by the royal family. 
The area has abundant water veins, but due to its poor drainage, there are many muddy areas and waterfalls, requiring caution when walking.

column1:
戦禍を逃れてきた人たちが、森の中で
息を潜めるように、しかししたたかに支え合って
暮らしている非常に小さな集落
避難民の中に統率力に優れる者がいるらしく
今のところ比較的安定した生活を送っている
column2:
A very small settlement where people who have escaped from the ravages of war live hidden in the forest. 
They support each other cunningly yet quietly, living together. 
Among the refugees, there seems to be someone with exceptional leadership skills, and they are currently leading a relatively stable life.

column1:
かつては蛮族の地と呼ばれた南部地方に睨みを
きかせる要衝として建造された
アッカーシェラン大陸ではメガド離宮、王都メガドに
次いで古い建造物。城主はアッカー家の当主だが
実質的な管理者である“城番”は兵士が就くことが
できる最高位とされている
column2:
In the southern region, which was once called the land of barbarians, a strategic point was built to intimidate the surrounding area. 
It is the third oldest structure in the Acre Selund continent, following the Megado Detached Palace and the Royal Capital Megado. 
While the lord of the Acre family is the castle owner, the "Castle Sentinel", who is the actual administrator, is considered the highest position that soldiers can hold.

column1:
河の流れによって様々なものが漂着する河岸
上流から流されてきたものの中には、解放軍の戦士
たちだけでなく魔軍の獣の死骸も多数存在する
流れ着いた骸から出でたものか、死臭に惹かれて
きたものか、骨になっても徘徊する魔物が徘徊する
column2:
By the flow of the river, various things drift and accumulate on the riverbank. 
Among the things carried downstream, there are not only soldiers of the Liberation Army, but also many carcasses of the enemy's animals. 
Whether they emerged from the washed-up corpses or were attracted by the stench of death, wandering monsters continue to wander even in their skeletal forms.

column1:
丘の上を縄張りとするゴブリン族の住処
一際凶暴なグレーターゴブリン《小鬼殺しのオジナ》
がリーダーとなっている。オジナは仲間をも攻撃
する残虐さで群れを支配しており、手下たちは
恐怖からか異常なまでの興奮状態にある
column2:
Goblin territory on top of the hill.
Led by the exceptionally vicious Greater Goblin, Ogina, known as the "Kobold Killer".
Ogina dominates the pack with his cruelness, attacking even his own allies, and his subordinates are in an abnormally excited state, perhaps out of fear.

column1:
魔軍が進軍する際に通過する中継地
ここで一旦の補給や、オークたちが使役する
魔物の装甲を手入れしてから目的地へ出発
しているとの情報が寄せられている
column2:
Intermediate point through which the demon army passes when advancing. 
It has been reported that they temporarily replenish supplies here and Orcs maintain their armor before departing for their destination.

column1:
アッカーシェラン大陸の西域に広がる大湿地帯
その広さ故に、古来から戦場になることが多い
傷を負って死を待つばかりの兵たちの嘆きが
絶えることがなかったと伝えられている
column2:
The vast swamp spreads to the western region of Acre Selund Continent. 
Due to its size, it has often been a battlefield since ancient times. 
It is said that the lament of soldiers who were only waiting for death while wounded never ceased.

column1:
フェルヤナ地方の外れにある門。そこを抜けると
魔軍の拠点に繋がるらしく、魔軍側も警戒を
強める最近では大門の前にまで野営地が拡がり
見張りの魔物が日夜目を光らせている
column2:
Gate located at the outskirts of Feryana region. 
It seems to connect to the demon army's base, and recently, the demon army has been increasing their vigilance. 
The encampment has expanded all the way to the front of the main gate, and the guarding monsters keep their eyes shining day and night.

column1:
年老いた奇面獣《ブルータルハーミット》の住処
人々の間ではその恐ろしさが代々語り継がれる
ほどであり、周囲に近寄ろうとする者はまずいない
しかし、魔軍はこの強力な奇面獣をなんとか利用
しようと捕獲を目論んでいるようだ
column2:
The lair of the aged beast, Brutal Hermit.
Its terror has been passed down through generations, so much so that few dare to approach it.
However, the Demon Army seems intent on capturing and somehow harnessing the power of this formidable creature.

column1:
森を抜けて展望城へと向かう兵士たちが
ことごとくこの周辺にて魔物の襲撃を受けている
どうやら人間を待ち伏せするに格好の場所
として魔軍に認識されているようだ
column2:
Soldiers heading towards Lookout Castle after passing through the forest have all been attacked by monsters in this area. 
It seems that this place has been recognized by the Demon Army as a perfect location to ambush humans.

column1:
展望城の目前に広がる湿地帯全域を監視
している魔軍拠点。監視対象としている範囲が
広いため、魔軍に使役されるナイトメアが空からも
目を光らせる。要衝である展望城に近いせいか
数多くの兵器が配備されていることがわかっている
column2:
This is a base for the Demon Army that monitors the entire marshy area that stretches in front of the observatory castle. Because the area being monitored is wide, nightmares are used by the Demon Army keep an eye on it from the sky. It is known that a large number of weapons are deployed in the area due to its proximity to the Lookout Castle, which is a key
point.

column1:
王家の次期当主がその力を示すために
代々使われてきた地下道。内部には強力な
守護者が配置されているとみられるが、これまで
王家の者以外が足を踏み入れられることは
無かったため、情報に乏しい
column2:
The underground passage that has been used by the next head of the royal family to demonstrate his power. 
It is believed that powerful guardians are placed inside, but there is little information as no one other than the royal family has ever set foot in there.

column1:
《森の隠れ村》にほど近い古い祠
アッカーシェランの大地に満ちた炎の気が滞留し
内部に足を踏み入れるとじっとりとした熱さを感じる
悪意を秘めたままに落命した者は、その悪意
を忘れ去るまで魂を焼かれながら祠を徘徊するという
column2:
An old shrine near the "Forest's Hidden Village".
It is filled with the lingering flame in the land of Acre Selund.
Once you step inside, you can feel the damp heat.
It is said that those who died with malice in their hearts will roam the shrine, their souls burning until they forget their malice.

column1:
王族のみが知りえた隠れ道
有事の際は隠れ家としても使えるよう工夫されて
おり、最低限の施設は整っている
王家の統治が行き届くようになってからは
使われることもなくなり、忘れ去られていた
column2:
The hidden passage that only the royal family knew about was designed to also serve as a hiding place in times of emergency. 
It had the minimum necessary facilities. 
Since the governance of the royal family became more meticulous, it was no longer used and forgotten.

column1:
遺跡をそのまま活用した魔軍の拠点
しばらく出入りが途絶えた後も本拠点から
魔軍が進行するなどの様子から、一時的な
滞在ではなく、この場で一通りの生活が
できるように設計されているものと思われる
column2:
The demon army's base, which has been constructed by utilizing ruins as is. 
From the fact that the demon army continues to advance even after there has been no activity for a while, it is believed that this base is designed for not just temporary stays, but for living a complete life here after all.

column1:
古くより放棄されたままとなっていた地下水道
既に水はほぼ枯れたものと思われていたが
何者かが侵入した形跡が発見され、調査される
こととなった。内部にはおびただしいほどの不死者や
思念体がはびこっているが、発生の原因は不明
column2:
Long abandoned, the underground sewage system was thought to have already dried up. 
However, evidence of someone's intrusion was discovered and further investigation was initiated. 
Inside, an overwhelming number of undead beings were rampant, but the cause of their emergence remains unknown.

column1:
アッカーシェラン王家に連なる者、または王家の
ためにその力を尽くした英雄たちが眠る遺跡
英霊は王家に危機が迫る時あらば再び
呼び声に応じ、その力を貸すといわれる
column2:
The royal descendants of the Acre Selund family, or the heroes who exerted their power for the sake of the royal family, rest in this shrine. 
When the royal family is in imminent danger, it is said that the heroic spirits respond to the call and lend their power.

column1:
この大陸にアッカー王家が誕生する遥か昔から
大地を蝕む強大な魔物が棲息していた――という
話は、アッカーシェランの国民ならば一度は
聞いたことがある昔話である。物語の結末は
「魔物は王によって地下深く封印された」となる
column2:
Since ancient times, there has been a tale that tells of powerful monsters residing in this land, where the Acre royal family was born. 
If you are a citizen of Acre Selund, you have surely heard this story once before. 
The conclusion of the tale is that "the monsters were sealed deep underground by the king."

column1:
フェルヤナ荒原南部、多数のオークが出入りする洞窟
自然の洞窟を利用した拠点のように偽装しているが
内部が強力な兵器を集めた武器庫として使われている
ことは、時折洞窟の奥から響く轟音から明らかである
column2:
In the southern area of the Feryana Wilderness, there is a cave where numerous orcs come and go. 
It is disguised as a natural cave, but it is evident from the occasional roar that echoes from the depths of the cave that it is actually being used as an arsenal gathering powerful weapons.

column1:
レスタニア中部に広がる大平原
白竜が墜ちた地として神殿が築かれ、人々が集った
ことから、全ての民にとって寄り所と言える地域に
なった。そのため、比較的魔物の勢力は弱いが
オークなど強力な魔物の侵入は脅威となる
column2:
A large plain spread across central Lestania.
A temple was built where the White Dragon fell, and it
became an area that can be said to be a stronghold
for all people. Therefore, although nearby monsters
are relatively weak, the intrusion of more powerful
demons such as Orcs pose a threat.

column1:
白竜が座すレスタニアの中心地
覚者と白騎団の本拠地であるだけでなく、神殿周囲
には商店区、宿場区、港が築かれ都市となった
３００年に渡り、人々はこの地で竜に寄り添い
暮らしを営んでいる
column2:
Not only the home of the Arisen, the White Dragon
sits at the center of Lestania. With a temple built
around them, over 300 years a bustling city grew,
with a relay station, harbor and shopping district.

column1:
ハイデル平原南部に位置する村
ワインなど果実酒造りが盛んだったが、近年は不作
と原因不明の病により活力が落ちつつある
この異変には、廃屋化したハイデル教会が何らか
の形で関わるのではと噂されている
column2:
A village located in the southern part of Hidell Plains.
Wine-making, such as fruit wines was a thriving trade,
but in recent years, trade and health have declined
from bad crop harvests and a mysterious disease.
After rumors about the nearby Hidell Chapel's
involvement surfaced, the chapel has since been
abandoned.

column1:
ハイデル平原とミスリウ森林を繋ぐ橋は以前の
水害で損壊したが、テルで資材手配が可能
となり、ようやく修復された
これでポーン郷、リンウッド方面との往来は
回復するだろう
column2:
The bridge that formerly had connected the Hidell
Plains and Mysree Forest was destroyed by flood
damage, but resources can be arranged at Tel Village
to repair the broken bridge. With this, the traffic to
and from Lynwood will be restored.

column1:
ハイデル南部、テル村に近い石造りの橋
ダウ渓谷方面との往来が盛んだった頃、この橋を通る
行商人が多かったことから、その襲撃に味を
しめたゴブリンにより度々占拠されるようになった
退治する者と小鬼のイタチごっこは現在も続いている
column2:
A stone bridge near Tel Village in Southern Hidell.
When traffic to and from Dowe Valley was thriving,
there were many peddlers passing through this
bridge, which led goblins to occasionally occupy it.
Those who exterminate the small demons on the
bridge may still continue to do so.

column1:
テルの東にあるハイデル教会地下墓地
以前は祈りの場として訪れる者も多かったが
廃屋化して後、扉が開かれたことはない
夜間徘徊する亡者の目撃談もあり、今では誰も
教会に近づかなくなっている
column2:
Hidell Chapel catacombs located to the east of Tel
village. Previously visited by many as a place of
prayer, the doors to the catacombs have not been
opened since the chapel's abandonment.
Eyewitnesses report sighting the deceased wandering
the grounds at night; nobody has approached chapel
since.

column1:
テル村、廃墟の地下倉庫に存在する目的不明の
地下道。民家の地下室にこのような場所がある
ことを巡り、その昔ある事件があったらしいが
語る者はおらず、忘れられようとしている

平原中央付近の河原。グリッテン砦以北の川上から
さまざまな物――戦場の残がいや遺体――が流れ
つくことから、その名で呼ばれるようになった
血の臭いに魅かれたリザードマンが棲みつくように
なり、現在は危険地域に指定されている

ハイデル街道全域を脅かす野盗《黒狼団》のアジト
強力な首領が束ねており、騎士団や覚者と度々
衝突してきた。結果、アジトは戦陣のように物物しく
なっている。街道を通る際は彼らへの警戒を
忘れてはならない

ハイデル地下霊廟には、疫病で死んだ者や罪人
のみを埋葬する下層階が存在する
より強い瘴気が溜まっており、特別な用でも
ない限り足を踏み入れるべき場所ではない

ハイデル地下霊廟には秘密の最下層があり
邪教の礼拝堂があるとも噂されていた
その噂は過去にテルで起こった事件から
発したものであるらしいが、真相は不明

テルの西、《アーク》に近い通路
元は特筆すべきこともないただの通路だったが
付近を通りかかった人々から、ここで耳慣れぬ
金属が擦れるような音を聞いたという噂が
流れ始めたため、調査の対象となった

旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
動乱のおりに一度は廃墟化したものの
現在は見習い騎士や新人覚者の修行場として
新たな役割を担っている

テル村の外れにある廃屋の地下室
度々周囲で魔物が目撃され、夜は不気味な
物音が響くこともしばしば
今では近寄る者はほとんどいない

ハイデル平原とミスリウ森林を繋ぐ自然洞窟
以前は狩人により頻繁に使われていたが
テルの南に橋が建造されてからは安全面の
問題から立ち入り禁止になっていた

テル村の裏手にある枯れ井戸
使われなくなって久しいが、たまに妙な物音
や悪臭が中から漂ってくることがある
column2:
A dried up well behind Tel village. It has been
unusable for a long time, but occasionally strange
sounds and bad odors may drift out from inside.

column1:
ハイデル街道の傍にある枯れ井戸
リザードマンや、時にはさらに恐ろしい魔物が
潜伏していることもある
まだ見習いの覚者や騎士は、下手に内部を
探査しないほうがよい

ハイデル平原、グリッテン砦に近い川沿いの
小墓地。古い時代から存在しており、それほど
広くないものの現在は彷徨う死者の目撃例が
絶えず、近寄る者はいない

ハイデル平原、倒壊した家の地下室
周囲に猿獣が群れていることが多いため
内部にも入り込んでいる可能性が高い
column2:
The basement of a collapsed house in the Hidell
Plains. Brute apes are often seen flocking around the
cellar, so it is highly probable they are also inside.

column1:
天空より飛来した異様な石の塊《大石塊》
圧倒的な存在感は他に比類するものがなく、この
物体が現在レスタニアに存在するあらゆる技術
魔術の域を大きく凌駕していることは間違いない

<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
テルの西に落下したアークの裏側から続く別階層
表側とは異なり、こちらには恐るべき危険性を
秘めた大型の錬魔も確認されたという。後に神殿を
攻める足がかりとして準備されていた可能性がある

アッカーシェラン大陸のほぼ中央に位置する地域
荒涼とした風景が広がるこの地域には竜の神殿があり、
その神殿に寄り添うように王都メガドが建造された
要塞を思わせる王都はアッカー家三代目当主キリークの
治世に計画され、完成は十四代目当主ドラフの
即位目前であった
column2:
Located almost in the centre of Acre Selund, this area is characterized by a barren landscape. 
In this region, there is a dragon temple, and adjacent to the temple, the royal capital of Megado was built, resembling a fortress. 
The construction of this royal capital was planned during the reign of Kilik, the third head of the Acre family, and it was completed just before the coronation of Doraf, the fourteenth head.

column1:
メガドシスの土地に焼きついた歴史の世界
悪しき竜が現れたことにより、各地を巡る竜力にも
異変が起きた。その結果、土地の持っている“記憶”
というべきものにすら歪みが生じているようだ
column2:
The world of history engraved into the land of Megado.
Various anomalies have occurred in the Dragon Force that travel across the land, due to the appearance of the evil dragon. 
As a result, even the "memories" that the land holds seem to have become distorted.

column1:
メガド周辺を警備する目的で使われる監視塔
すでに地上階は魔軍により占拠されているが
魔物たちは地下階の存在には気付かなかったようだ
地下階には、メガド陥落の折に逃げ延びた兵士たちが
救援を信じ、息を殺すように潜んでいる
column2:
A surveillance tower is used to secure the surroundings of Megado. 
The ground floors have already been occupied by the demon army, but it seems like they were unaware of the existence of the underground floors. 
Soldiers who managed to escape during the fall of Megado are hiding in the underground floors, holding their breath as they believe in the possibility of rescue.

column1:
王家に仕えるハイセプター、キルスティが住む小屋
魔物によって民が苦しむアッカーシェランを憂い
秘術であるハイセプターの戦闘術を世に広めんと
慣れぬあばら家で暮らしているらしい
column2:
The cottage where Kirsty, serving the royal family, lives.
She worries about Acre Selund, where the people suffer due to monsters.
Thus, she endeavors to spread the combat techniques of the High Scepter, a secret art. 
It seems that she lives in an unfamiliar, rundown house.

column1:
城塞都市メガドにて一般市民が住まう居住層
メガド全体から見ると下層にあたり、大陸の人口の
過半数が暮らしていた
長きに渡り繁栄を誇っていたが、魔軍の急襲に
よって蹂躙され、多くの住民が命を落とした
column2:
In the residential layer of Fortress City Megado, where ordinary citizens reside, it is known as the lower level and where over half of the continent's population lived. 
It had been prosperous for a long time, but it was devastated by a sudden attack from the Demon Army, and many residents lost their lives.

column1:
白い木で作られた簡易な柵は、アンセスターオークが
縄張りを誇示する際に多用されるもの
賢明な旅人であれば忌避すべき“危険”の標である
column2: The simple fence made of white wood is often used by Ancestor Orcs to showcase their territory, and it serves as a "danger" sign that wise travelers should avoid.

column1:
火垂れ山から飛来した巨大な噴石とその周辺
岩は鳥が羽根を休め、獣が身を隠すのに
ちょうどよかったらしく様々な獣たちが住処として
いるようだ
column2:
A huge volcanic rock from the Firefall Mountain and its surrounding rocks were perfect for birds to rest their feathers and for animals to hide. 
It seems that various animals have made this place their habitat.

column1:
水辺に面した小さな洞穴
霧の森から漏れ出でたものが留まりやすい
風の音が何事かを囁いているように聞こえる
ことから、以前より不気味な噂が立っている
column2:
A small cave facing the water's edge where things leaking out of the Forest of Mist tend to stay.
The sound of the wind seems to whisper something, which has led to eerie rumors for some time now.

column1:
霧の森の中にある焼け野原
忌まわしい考えに取り付かれたある女が
多数の犠牲者を洗脳し、自ら炎の中へと
飛び込ませたという事件が起こった場所
事件から何十年と経過しているが、未だに
土は焼けたままであり草木も回復していない
column2:
A burnt field in the Forest of Mist. 
This is where a woman obsessed with abominable thoughts brainwashed numerous victims and forced them to jump
into the flames themselves.
Decades have passed since the incident, yet the soil remains burned and the grass and trees have not recovered.

column1:
城塞都市メガドの城門外に設えられた詰所
元は商人らが優先的にメガドへ入るための手続きを
受けていた場であるが、現在は出撃の令を待つ
ドワーフオークや、軍属の獣たちがひしめいている
column2:
Outside the gates of the fortress city Megado, there is a guard post set up. 
Originally, it was a place where merchants would go through the necessary procedures to enter Megado. 
However, it is now crowded with dwarf orcs and military animals waiting for the order to march out.

column1:
メガド居住層の奥に造られた野ざらしの牢屋
魔軍の襲撃から逃げられず、また不幸にも生け捕りに
された人々がドワーフオークから無残な拷問を受けた
であろうことは、その場に生々しく残る痕跡から容易
に察することができる
column2: Hidden prison exposed beyond the depths of the Megado residential layer; it is easy to deduce from the vivid traces left behind that the unfortunate individuals who were unable to escape the onslaught of the Demon Army have fallen into the hands of the Orcs and likely suffered gruesome torture.

column1:
王家の命により封鎖されている地下道
王族関連施設に繋がるであろうという
推測以外、情報が無い場所でもある
何らかの意図を持って隠されている場で
あることは確かだ
column2:
The underground passage is sealed off by the royal family's orders. 
It is a place where there is no information other than speculation that it may be connected to facilities related to the royal family. 
It is certain that it is hidden with some intention.

column1:
城塞都市メガドの防衛の要となるニルビリス大橋と
その上に建つ関所。魔軍側も本関所の重要性は
理解しているらしく、防衛のために随時戦力を
割いている。関所の開閉については、魔軍の
集結具合と連動しているらしい
column2:
The Nilviris Bridge, which serves as a crucial defense point for the fortress city of Megado, accompanied by a checkpoint built on top of it. 
It appears that the Demon Army also understands the importance of this checkpoint, as they are constantly dedicating forces to its defense. 
The opening and closing of the checkpoint seem to be synchronized with the gathering of the Demon Army.

column1:
メガド城壁内、最奥に位置する広場
ドワーフオークが捕えた魔物に対して戦甲を
装着するために使われている。魔物は戦甲に
よって自らの意思を制御され、ドワーフオークに
使役される存在となる
column2:
Inside Megado Castle, at the very back, there is a plaza where beasts captured by Dwarf Orcs are dressed in battle armor.
The enemies are controlled by the battle armor, making them subservient to the Dwarf Orcs.

column1:
フェルヤナ荒原の山壁側からメガドシス高地
中心部を繋ぐ通路。かつては頻繁に使われていたが
渓谷を渡る船や家畜を使っての山越えが主流となって
からは、たまに狩人らが利用するのみとなっていた
メガド周辺が魔軍に包囲された際、徒歩での脱出を
試みる者にはこの古道しか残されていなかった
column2:
From the mountain wall side of the Feryana Wilderness to the center of the Megadosys Plateau, there is a pathway. 
It used to be frequently used, but now crossing the mountains using livestock or ships to cross the valley has become the mainstream. 
Only occasionally do hunters use it now. 
When the area around Megado was surrounded by the Demon Army, those who attempted to escape on foot had no choice but to use this ancient path.

column1:
大地の陥没からなる自然豊かな洞窟
目立たない場所に位置することと、陽の光が差し込む
構造から内部には緑が生い茂り、野生動物たちが棲む
今となっては、悪しき竜と魔軍の所業によって荒廃する
前の“アッカーシェランの自然”が残る貴重な場所
column2:
A natural and abundant cave formed by the collapse of the surface. 
Located in an inconspicuous place, it is filled with greenery and inhabited by wild animals, thanks to the structure that allows sunlight to penetrate it. 
It is now in a state of ruin due to the deeds of the evil dragon and the demon army. 
This is a precious place where the remnants of the previous "Self" of Acre Selund remain.

column1: ニルビリス大橋からメガド居住層へと繋がる地下水路
column2: From Nilviris Bridge, an underground waterway leads to the Megado residential layer.

column1:
城塞都市メガド市民の生活を支える上水道
都市には無くてはならない設備だが、汚水を飲む
ことに慣れたドワーフオークたちは重要性を見出さず
魔軍の中継基地として使っている
column2:
Fortress City Megado's water supply supports the lives of its citizens. 
Although it is an essential facility for the city, the Dwarf Orcs, who have become accustomed to drinking sewage, fail to recognize its importance and instead use it as a relay base for the Demon Army.

column1:
メガド王宮層の周辺には王宮層を取り囲むように
複数の建造物が円形に立ち並び、それぞれ左右に
伸びた通路で繋がっている。元は回廊であったため
現在もそれらの建造物の総称として≪メガド回廊≫
という呼称が用いられている
column2:
Around the Megado Palace on the Megado Royal Layer, multiple buildings are arranged in a circle, connected by corridors extending left and right. 
Originally a corridor, they are still collectively referred to as the "Megado Corridor."

column1:
城塞都市メガドの最上部に位置する王宮
王族とそれに連なる限られた者のみが居住する
ことを許された場所であり、厳重に守られている
一般市民がこの場を直に目にすることは
人生の中で恐らく一度も無いだろう
column2:
At the top of Fortress City Megado stands the royal palace, a place allowed only to the royal family and a select few.
It is heavily guarded and unlikely for ordinary citizens to ever lay eyes upon in their lifetime.

column1:
メガド王宮層を囲むように建てられた建造物の内
聖堂として使われていた場所
王族の挙式や戴冠式の際は、大陸中から集まった
有力な貴族が一堂に会する
column2:
Within the buildings built around the Megado Royal Palace Layer, a place that was used as a cathedral.
During royal weddings and coronations, prominent nobles from all over the continent would gather together.

column1:
戦士の修行を目的とし、様々な種類の魔物が
わざと放たれている祠。以前は王族を護る者たちが
平時にあってもその腕を鈍らせないようにと鍛練に
励んでいた場所であるが、近年はひたすらに武を
誇る風潮が薄れたため使用されることも減り、内部の
魔物のみが取り残されている
column2:
The shrine, which is intentionally filled with various types of enemies, serves as a training ground for soldiers. 
In the past, it was a place where those who protected the royal family trained to keep their skills sharp even during times of peace. 
However, in recent years, the enthusiasm for showcasing one's martial prowess has diminished, resulting in a decrease in its usage. 
As a result, only the monsters inside the shrine remain.

column1:
ウルテカ山岳　西部、城塞都市メガドからは
北西にあたり、メガド離宮を通り抜けた先に
広がる一帯。周辺は火山地帯のため、緑が
少ないが、この一帯には珍しく草木が茂る様が
見られる
column2:
Located in the western region of the Urteca Mountains, to the northwest of the fortress city of Megado, it is an area that stretches beyond the Megado Detached Palace. 
Due to the volcanic nature of the surrounding area, there is little greenery, but this area is rare in that it is lush with vegetation.

column1:
城塞都市メガドからちょうど北側にあたる一帯
元々アンセスターオークの集落が多数存在しており
“悪しき竜”出現以前から危険な場所として
認識されていた。時折腕の立つハンターが
稀少な動植物を狙って立ち入るのみであり
人の手が殆ど入っていない
column2:
In the area just north of Fortress City Megado, there were originally many settlements of Ancestor Orcs.
It has long been recognized as a hazardous location, even before the emergence of the "Evil Dragon". 
Occasionally, capable hunters enter only to gather rare plants and animals, and there is little human involvement.

column1:
城塞都市メガドの東側にあたる一帯
悪しき竜の影響により、炎を纏った数多の
命の残骸がさ迷い、徘徊している
悪しき竜の影響が色濃く出ている場所といえる
column2:
Located on the eastern side of the fortress city Megado, this area is heavily influenced by the evil dragon.
Numerous charred remains, engulfed in flames, wander aimlessly, a testament to the dragon's malevolence.

column1:
ウルテカの土地に焼きついた歴史の世界
悪しき竜の影響により、土地の持つ“記憶”
というべきものにも歪みが生じ、本来の
ウルテカの歴史とは異なった姿を見せる
column2:
The world of history engraved into the land of Urteca.
Due to the influence of the Evil Dragon, even the "memories" that the land possesses have become distorted, showing a different appearance from the true history of Urteca.

column1:
アッカーシェラン大陸の南部にアジトを構え
定住しつつ活動するベルタ盗賊団とは異なり
通称“北の盗賊”と呼ばれる彼らは、一定期間ごとに
アジトを変えて活動している。その姿勢からも
わかる通り、警戒心が強く、自らの存在を徹底的に
隠す傾向にある
column2:
Unlike Bertha's Bandit Group, who have a stronghold in the southern part of Acre Selund, they are known as "Northern Bandits" and change their hideout at regular intervals.
They are very cautious and tend to conceal their presence thoroughly, as can be seen from their attitude.

column1:
《聖炎の参竜道》へと続く扉の前に
急きょ設営された野営地。厳しいウルテカ山岳の
環境に負けず、宿やよろず屋といった覚者隊のための
設備を維持すべく、王家に仕える兵のみならず
盗賊も手を貸している
column2:
In front of the door leading to the "Sacred Flame Path," a temporary camp has been hastily set up. 
Despite the harsh environment of the Urteca Mountains, the facilities for the Arisen Corps, such as inns and general shops, are being maintained not only by the soldiers serving the royal family, but also with the help of bandits.

column1:
小さな群れを作って生活するサラマンダーだが
繁殖のため、一時的に大きな群れを成して
生活することもある。外敵から身を隠すことができ
適度な湿度・温度に保たれる洞穴などは
そのような場所に選ばれやすい
column2:
Salamanders live in small groups, but for breeding purposes, they occasionally form large herds and live together. 
They hide from predators in caves or other places where the humidity and temperature are kept at an appropriate level.

column1:
城塞都市メガドを臨み、振り返れば悠然たる
火垂れ山がよく見える眺望スポット。しかし今や
肉食動物や魔物が徘徊し、腐肉や死骸が
転がる殺伐とした広場となっている。メガドに
これほどまでに近い場所に魔物が現れるように
なったのはごく最近のことだ
column2:
Approaching the fortress city of Megado, when I turned around, I saw a serene view of Firefall Mountain. 
Nowadays, it has become a grim plaza where carnivorous animals and monsters roam, with rotting flesh and corpses scattered around. 
It is only recently that monsters have started to appear in a place so close to Megado.

column1:
橋を渡り、王家の墓へと侵攻しようとする
ドワーフオークを、王家の兵士たちが命を賭して
食い止めてきた場所。兵士、ドワーフオーク両者の
亡骸が無造作に転がっており、静かな場所ながら
激戦の痕跡を残す
column2:
Crossing the bridge, soldiers of the royal family risked their lives to stop the Dwarf Orcs from invading the Royal Family Mausoleum. 
The corpses of both soldiers and Dwarf Orcs lay scattered haphazardly, leaving behind traces of a fierce battle in this quiet place.

column1:
《王家の墓》付近にある小さな洞窟
これまでは注目されてこなかった場所だが
ドワーフオークが出入りする姿や、手勢の
魔獣を置いていく様子が確認されている
内部に何らかの秘密があるのかもしれない
column2:
Near the "Royal Family Mausoleum" is a small cave, which has not attracted much attention until now. 
However, there have been sightings of Dwarf Orcs coming in and out, as well as witnessing them leaving their animals. 
There may be some kind of secret inside.

column1:
アンセスターオークたちが棲息する、とても
原始的な拠点のようなもの。実際には集団で
生活しているだけの縄張りのようなものかと
思われているが、ヘルハウンドを家畜のように
飼い慣らしている節が見受けられる点には
今後も警戒が必要だろう
column2:
A primitive base-like habitat where Ancestor Orcs dwell. 
It is believed to be a territory where they simply live in groups, but caution will be necessary in the future, as there seems to be a tendency to tame Hellhounds like livestock.

column1:
ウルテカ山岳　東部にある資材置き場
ここにあるものはメガド市街にて使用される資材
だが、資材をここに集約しているというよりかは
市街に持ち込むための検査を受けるための
一時的な保管所といった位置付けのものだ
column2:
Urteca Mountains' Eastern Materials Storage Area.
The items found here are materials used in the city of Megado. 
However, instead of being a centralized location for materials, it serves as a temporary storage facility for inspections before being brought into the city.

column1:
ウルテカ山岳　北部は元よりアンセスターオークや
その他の魔獣が多く生息する一帯であったが
戦乱によってそれぞれの住処に変化が生じたようだ
ここでは特にアンセスターオークの群れが勢いを
持っている様子が報告され、要注意スポットである
column2:
In the north, there used to be home to many Ancestor Orcs and other magical creatures. 
Due to the ongoing conflict, there have been changes in their respective habitats. 
It has been reported that particularly in this area, there is a strong presence of Ancestor Orc herds, making it a spot that requires caution.

column1:
本来であれば、死して大地に還るはずの魂が
何らかの理由で炎をまとった影として徘徊する
ことがある。ここにはそのような魔物が集まりやすい
らしく、駆除しなければ集まる魔物の数は
増えるばかりだ
column2:
Souls that were supposed to return to the earth in death sometimes wander as shadows clad in flames for some reason. 
It seems that such creatures tend to gather here, and if they are not exterminated, the number of creatures that gather only increases.

column1:
アッカーシェランでは竜は、すなわち、王でもある
離宮は竜となった王が人々と交流する神殿として
有史以前に造られた。以降、時々の王によって
改修、改装が行われて現在の姿になっている
column2:
In Acre Selund, the dragon is also the king.
The palace was built as a temple for the king who became a dragon to interact with the people in prehistoric times. Since then, it has been renovated and refurbished by occasional kings and has become its current form.

column1:
代々のアッカー家にて竜にならなかった者たちが
眠る墓地。アッカー家以外でも友好関係にあった
豪族も埋葬が許されている
かつては財宝の数々が死者を飾っていたが、ほとんどが
オークとゴブリンに持ち去られた。南北の盗賊団は
関与を否定してる。
column2:
The cemetery where those from the Acre family, who did not become dragons, lie sleeping. 
Even noble families who had a friendly relationship with the Acre family are allowed to be buried here. 
Once, numerous treasures adorned the deceased, but most were taken away by orcs and goblins. 
The northern and southern bandits deny involvement.

column1:
旅人たちの簡易宿としても使われていた経緯がある
自然洞窟。各地の宿が発達したこともあり、百年
ほど前には完全に放棄されている。現在は戦乱により
住処を追われた魔物が棲みついているようだ。魔物
同士は敵対することもなく静かに暮らしているようだが
侵入者とみなした人間には確実に襲い掛かるだろう
column2:
There is a history of a natural cave being used as a simple accommodation for travelers. 
Due to the development of accommodations in various places, it was completely abandoned about a hundred years ago. Currently, it seems that monsters, driven from their homes by war, have taken up residence there. 
The monsters live quietly with no hostility towards each other, but they will surely attack anyone they consider an intruder.

column1:
小さなほこらの壁面が崩れ、その先に
謎の空間が確認できている。空間は奥に続いている
ため、不要になった貯蔵庫の類を埋めたものでは
ないようだ
column2:
The wall of a small shrine has collapsed, revealing a mysterious space beyond. 
The space continues further back, suggesting that it is not simply filled with unused storage items.

column1:
民間人が竜への敬意を示すために参拝する寺院
大変古くからあるため、一見すると廃墟のようだが
アッカーシェランの人間にとっては憧れの場でもある
聖職者たちが参拝者への対応に当たっていたが
現在は魔物に乗っ取られてしまい、この場を守る
者たちも完全に退避している
column2:
Private individuals visit the temple to show respect to the dragon. 
Despite its appearance of being in ruins at first glance, it is also a place of longing for the people of Acre Selund. 
Clergymen used to handle interactions with visitors, but the place has now been taken over by enemies. 
Those who protect this place have completely evacuated.

column1:
火竜が休息をとる火垂れ山内部へと至る道
基本的には王家の人間が稀に通るのみであり
細工の凝った巨大な門は、代々門番の家系である
バシアス、もしくは王家の人間にしか開門できない
column2:
The road leads to the interior of Firefall Mountain, where the Fire Dragon rests.
Usually, only members of the royal family pass through.
The intricately crafted enormous gate can only be opened by the gatekeeper lineage, the Bacias, or members of the royal family.

column1:
突如現れた不気味な竜族の魔物が巣食う広間
アッカーシェランではこれまでその姿を見た者や
存在を知る者は誰一人としておらず、恐らく
悪しき竜によって造り出されたか、召喚された魔物
だろうと推測される
column2:
A grand hall infested with creepy dragonkin creatures that suddenly appeared. 
No one in Acre Selund has ever seen or known of their existence. 
It is presumed that they were either created by or summoned by the evil dragon.

column1:
地理的に《王家の墓》の反対側に位置する墓場
入り口は厳重に閉ざされ、その位置から
“王家ゆかりではあるが、正しく葬られる価値の無い
行き場の無い人物らの亡骸”を安置する場所で
あったのではないかと推測されている
column2: Geographically located on the opposite side of the Royal Tombs, the entrance is tightly closed, and its location suggests that it may have been a place where "the corpses of not worthy of a proper burial, with nowhere else to go" were laid to rest.

column1:
レスタニア西部の海岸地帯
白い砂浜が続く景色は美しいが、時には思いも
よらぬものが浜辺に流れ着くことも。温暖で湿った
気候から、乾燥しがちのハイデル平原とは植生や
生息する魔物も異なる
column2:
A coastal zone in western Lestania.
The view of the white sandy beach is beautiful.
With its dry climate, the fauna and flora living
in the Hidell Plains is different.

column1:
ブリア海岸地域の漁村
比較的おだやかな環境に恵まれ、海が近く人々も
おおらか。しかし、海が村にもたらすものは魚や貝
だけではない。座礁船や、時には海竜といった脅威
が姿を現すこともある
column2:
Breya Coast region's fishing village.
It is blessed with a relatively calm environment and a close proximity to the sea, making the people easy-going. 
However, what the sea brings to the village is not just fish and shellfish.
There are also threats such as stranded ships and sometimes even sea dragons that appear.

column1:
ブリア海岸の岬に立つ古い灯台
洋撃船や漁船の標として、レスタニアの海を
照らし続けてきた。灯台守は代々、退役騎士が
務める習わしとなっており、現在の守番は高名な
《シールドセージ》、ルドルフォである
column2:
The old lighthouse on the cape of Breya Coast.
Shining over the sea of Lestania as a beacon for foreign ships and fishing boats. It is a tradition for retired knights to serve as lighthouse keepers, and the current guardian is the renowned Shield Sage, Rudolfo.

column1:
ローテスに近い岸壁裏の小さな浜
人目に付きにくく、村や街道にも近いため、ならず者
が野宿をしたり盗品の一時保管に使う事も多い
覚者がローテスに立ち寄った際は、浜に異変がないか
確認しておいたほうがいい
column2:
A small beach behind the quay near Rotes.
It is hidden from view and close to the village and the road, so it is often used by rogues to camp out and temporarily store stolen goods.
When Arisen stop by Rotes, they should check the beach to see if there is anything unusual.

column1:
ブリア海岸、岬に近い断崖地帯の大岩群
多数のハーピーが棲息しており、彼女らの巣が
密集していることから、村人達からその名で呼ばれて
いる。灯台に用がある時以外、鳥寄せ岩の付近を
通らぬよう村人は子供の頃から教えられている
column2:
A large group of rocks in the cliff area near the cape ofThe Breya Coast.
It is inhabited by numerous Harpies, and their nests are densely clustered there. 
Because of this, the villagers have given it the name "Birdcall Rock". 
The villagers have been taught since childhood not to pass near Birdcall Rock unless they have business at the lighthouse.

column1:
海辺にある朽ちた廃屋の地下倉庫
魔物やならず者の溜まり場になりやすい
ことから封鎖されたが、何者かが侵入
したらしい形跡や物音が最近しばしば
確認されている
column2:
Abandoned underground storehouse within a decaying shack by the seaside. 
It tends to become a gathering place for monsters and rogues, which is why it was sealed off. 
However, recently there have been frequent sightings of signs of someone or something trespassing and strange noises.

column1:
南の海岸へ続く谷道にある、小鬼のキャンプ地
残虐で体格の大きなホブゴブリンの目撃があり
村人にとって不安の種となっている
また、このキャンプを境に南側は強力な魔物が
多いため、むやみに近づかない方がいい
column2:
There have been sightings of brutal and physically imposing Hobgoblins in the valley path that leads to the southern coast, where the little goblins have set up their camp. 
This has become a cause of concern for the villagers. 
Additionally, on the southern side of this camp, there are powerful enemies, so it is advisable not to approach casually.

column1:
数十年以上昔に魔物に襲われ、廃村と化した集落
白竜の力が弱まって後、恐ろしい魔物の襲撃にあい
抵抗の術もないまま一夜にして滅んだらしいが、
現在は当時の本当の経緯を知る者はいない
column2:
Decades ago, the village was attacked by monsters and turned into an abandoned village. 
After the power of the White Dragon weakened, the village suffered a terrifying monster raid. 
It was said that the village was destroyed overnight without any means of resistance. 
Currently, there is no one who knows the true circumstances of that time.

column1:
ブリア海岸、南部に広がる浜辺
かつてはここも漁民にとって生活の場であったが
今や完全に魔物が徘徊する危険地帯となっている
特に近頃は大型の魔物が居付いてしまったようだ
column2:
A beach that stretches out in the southern part of Breya Coast.
Once, this place was also a living place for fishermen, but now it has become a dangerous area where monsters roam freely.
Especially recently, it seems that large monsters have settled here.

column1:
ブリア海岸のはずれ、断崖の中腹に入り口を
もつ自然洞窟。絶えず水音が聞こえることから
潮騒洞窟と呼ばれ、奥の滝は霊験あらたかとの
噂だが、ある事件をきっかけに封鎖されていた
column2:
Natural Cave on the edge of Breya coast.
Along a cliff's midsection, lies an entrance to a natural cave. It is known as the Roaring Tide Cave due to the constant sound of water. There are rumors that the waterfall deep inside possesses supernatural power. However, following an incident, it has been sealed off.

column1:
《灯台下の古井戸》を覗き込んだ者が何か煌めく
ものを見たという噂が流れたが、古井戸の中には
投げ捨てられた廃棄物や動物の死骸などもどこかに
溜まっているであろうことから、内部に入ってまで
噂の元を探ろうとする者はいないようだ
column2:
Rumors have circulated that someone who peered into the "Lighthouse Old Well" saw something sparkling. 
However, since it is likely that waste and animal carcasses have accumulated somewhere inside the well, no one seems willing to enter and investigate the source of the rumors.

column1:
モルトバ灯台の傍にある古井戸
水が引いて後はリザードマンなどの魔物が
出入りするようになった
機能しているかは不明だが、魔物の侵入を
防ぐための古い装置が残っている
column2:
Next to the Moltova Lighthouse, there is an old well.
After the water dried up, it became a place where creatures like Saurians would come and go.
It is unclear if it still functions, but there are still old devices that remain to prevent the invasion of enemies like Saurians.

column1:
青爪浜にある廃村ルフローの地下室
ブリア海岸の奥は強力な魔物が多いため
とっさに逃げ場のない地下室の探索時は
準備をしておく方がいいだろう
column2: It would be wise to prepare before exploring the underground chamber of the deserted village of Ruflow in Blue Claw Beach, as the depths of Breya Coast are home to many powerful enemies.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
ブリア海岸傍の灯台下の井戸の中に入口が発見された
忘れられた古代の水路遺跡。長く閉鎖され未踏の地
であったため、独自の生態系を保持した環境と
なっているようだ
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
An entrance has been discovered within a well beneath the lighthouse near the Breya Coast. It is a forgotten ancient aqueduct relic that has long been closed off and unexplored. It appears to have maintained its own unique ecosystem.

column1:
レスタニア南部の広大な森林
多くの動植物、人、そして魔物が住み、それを可能
にするだけの恵みに満ちている。また、森のいたる
所に自然洞窟や旧時代の遺跡なども存在するため
探索には事欠かない地域である
column2:
A vast forest in southern Lestania.
Abundant with a wide variety of animals, plants, people, and creatures, thanks to its bountiful blessings. Moreover, the forest is adorned with natural caves and ancient ruins scattered throughout, making it an ideal region for exploration.

column1:
ポーンの民が集い、新しき覚者との契約を待つ聖堂
聖堂はレスタニアと異界との接点を守るために
偉大な覚者が大昔建造したと伝えられている
現在は里長アルヴァーが管理者を務めており
《プリースト》の導き手カミュも滞在している
column2:
The holy temple where the pawns gather, awaiting the contract with the newly awakened Arisen.
It is said that the temple was built by a great Arisen in ancient times to protect the connection between Lestania and the other realm.
Currently, it is managed by the village elder, Alvar, and the Priest, Camus, also resides there.

column1:
ミスリウ森林中部にある、狩人と木こりの村
獣革や木材、薬草類など森は資源が豊富なため
素材を扱う者にとって重要な村である
ただし森には遺跡や自然洞窟も多く、そこをねぐら
とする魔物への警戒は常に必要だ
column2:
A village of Hunters and Woodcutters.
Located in the central part of the Mysree Forest, this village is important for those who handle materials such as animal hides, lumber, and medicinal herbs, as the forest is abundant in resources. However, the forest is also filled with ruins and natural caves, which serve as lairs for enemies, so caution is always necessary.

column1:
魔女エメラダが住む森林の家
彼女に教えを請うことで
《ソーサラー》として破壊の魔術の
深淵により近づくことができるだろう
column2:
The house in the forest where Witch Emerada lives. 
By seeking her guidance, one can come closer to the abyss of destructive magic as a Sorcerer.

column1:
ポーン郷からリンウッド方面に繋がる
木造の橋。南ハイデル大橋と同時期の水害で
破損したが、住民の手が回らず復旧が遅れていた
放置された理由は、ポーン郷へ行く覚者の多くが
リム転移を用いるためらしい
column2:
A wooden bridge that connects from Pawn Cathedral to Lynwood. 
It was damaged during the same flood as the South Hidell Bridge, but restoration was delayed as the residents were unable to handle it. 
The reason for its abandonment seems to be because many Arisen who go to Pawn Cathedral use Rift Teleport.

column1:
森林北部にあるフォレストゴブリンの集落
カボチャの栽培や狩猟だけではなく、ここには
人や家畜を襲って得た物品も集められている
特に長である《緑鬼グリッガ》とその手下達は
好んで人を襲うため、警戒しなければならない
column2:
Forest Goblin settlement in the northern part of the forest. 
In addition to pumpkin cultivation and hunting, they also gather items stolen from people and livestock. 
In particular, Gurigga the Green Demon and his minions, who are especially skilled, enjoy attacking people, so we must be cautious.

column1:
祭祀場にはさまざまな魔物が出没するが、このほど
特に攻撃性の高いエントの出現が確認された
以前も起こったこの特異なエントの出現は
さらに大きな脅威に繋がる可能性がある
早急な討伐と監視が必要だ
column2:
Various monsters have been appearing in the ritual hall, but recently, the emergence of an especially aggressive Ent has been confirmed. 
The recurring appearance of this peculiar Ent could potentially lead to an even greater threat. 
Swift subjugation and surveillance are necessary.

column1:
リンウッドほど近くにある地下水路
魔物が巣くい使われなくなって久しいが、以前は
この水路で河川の水位を調整し水害に備えていた
リンウッドが水路を閉鎖した後も魔物は増え、
時に凶暴な大猿が出没することもある
column2:
An underground waterway near Lynwood. 
Although it has been abandoned by monsters for a long time, in the past, this waterway was used to adjust the water level of the river and prepare for floods. Even after Lynwood closed the waterway, the number of monsters increased, and sometimes ferocious apes would haunt the area.

column1:
注意すべきドレッドエイプ、《唸り猿》が
縄張りにしている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は食い散らかされた動物の残骸が
散乱しており、恐ろしい上非常に臭い――
column2:
The Dread Ape, known as the "Howler Ape," has taken over the abandoned house as its territory. 
The surroundings of the abandoned house are littered with the remains of devoured animals, making it both terrifying and extremely foul-smelling.

column1:
特に危険なドレッドエイプ、《裂き猿》が
巣くっている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は正体不明の死肉が散乱しており
不気味な様子を醸し出している
column2: In the rundown building where the ferocious Dread Ape, "Ripper Ape," resides, there are unidentified pieces of dead flesh scattered around, creating an eerie atmosphere.

column1:
とりわけ獰猛なドレッドエイプ、《豚喰い猿》が
ねぐらにしている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は攫われた家畜や野豚が
多数溜めこまれている
column2:
The abandoned house that the particularly ferocious Dread Ape, "Pig-Eating Ape," has made its lair.
Around the abandoned house, numerous abducted livestock and wild boars are gathered.

column1:
ミスリウ森林の外れに位置する広大な鍾乳洞
そのあまりの深さと、そこをねぐらにする
凶悪な魔獅子の存在から立ち入り禁止になった
奥にはさまざまな魔物や資源があるだろう
column2:
Located on the outskirts of Mysree Forest is a vast limestone cave. 
Due to its incredible depth and the presence of a demon lion that have made it their lair, access to the cave has been prohibited. 
There are likely various enemies and resources deep within.

column1:
リンウッドからミスリウ森林深部へと向かう一本道の
中ほどにある、少し開けた場所。背の高い木々が多く
鬱蒼としている上に靄が出やすく、開けた印象の割に
視界が悪い。そのためか盗賊や魔物が潜みやすく
森を抜ける際の一番の難所と言われる
column2:
In the middle of the straight road leading from Lynwood to Mysree Grove in the Mysree Forest, there is a slightly open area. There are many tall trees, and it is dense and foggy, despite the open impression. 
The visibility is poor, making it easy for bandits and enemies to lurk. 
It is said to be the most challenging place to pass through the forest.

column1:
ポーンの民が渡る、この世ならざる空間
世界の淵辺にあたるとされ、普通の人間には足を
踏み入れるどころか、入口を見ることすらできない
“異界歩き”と呼ばれるポーンがなぜ覚者に応え
現れるのか、それを知るのは竜のみである
column2:
The space where the pawns traverse, a realm unlike this world.
Believed to exist on the edge of the world, beyond the reach of ordinary humans who can't even step inside, let alone see the entrance.
Only the dragons know why the pawns, called 'striders of other worlds', answer to the Arisen.

column1:
ミスリウ森林南西の大洞窟
深部にある巨大空洞には、名の由来でもある
《燐光虫》という虫が棲息し、星空に迷い込んだかの
ような美しさであると言われる。しかし、鬼人や
エイプの住処ともなっており危険は大きい
column2: Mysree Forest, located in the southwest, holds a massive cave. Deep within this cave, there is a breathtaking sight named after the "Glowworms" that reside there. It is said to possess a beauty reminiscent of getting lost in the starry sky. However, it is also known to be a dangerous dwelling for Demons and Apes.

column1:
森の南部に位置する小洞窟
内部にはそこそこ開けた空間があり
魔獣の類が巣にしているらしい
時おり、外にまで唸り声が聞こえるという
column2:
In the southern part of the forest, there is a small cave. 
Inside, there is a decently spacious area. 
It seems that creatures of the magical kind have made their nests there. 
Occasionally, their growls can be heard from outside.

column1:
普通の人間には入口を見ることすらできない
世界の淵辺にあたるとされる空間の深層部
この空間がどのようにして成り立ち、どこに
続いていくのか未だ知る者はいない
column2:
The entrance is not even visible to ordinary people. 
It is the deep part of a space considered to be the edge of the world. 
No one yet knows how this space is formed or where it leads.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ森林から深部へ続く洞穴に埋もれていた古い
地下墓地。夜間、どこからともなく森に現れる不死者
達はこの墳墓から彷徨い出たものらしい。長く封じら
れていたため、あまり見ない魔物が潜む可能性が高い
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A hidden underground cemetery that was buried deep within the caves leading from the Mysree Forest. The undead that appear in the forest at night seem to have emerged from this tomb. Since it had been sealed for a long time, there is a high possibility that unseen enemies lurk within.

column1:
最大標高を誇るボルド山を主とした山岳地帯
鉱石の名産地であり、古くから採掘師と武具職人
にとっては中心地だった。さらに、現在活動
は見られないもののボルド山は火山であり、温泉や
毒を含んだ液体なども多く噴出する
column2:
Mountainous region centered around Mount Volden, which boasts the highest elevation.
It has been a renowned mining site and a central location for miners and blacksmiths since ancient times. Furthermore, although currently inactive, Mount Volden is a volcano that often erupts hot springs and various liquid substances, including poisonous ones.

column1:
ボルド鉱山ふもとに広がる温泉町
湯あみ場《キノザ鉱泉》を中心に、古くから採掘者や
武具職人になじみの強い地として有名だった
近年鉱山に強力な魔物が出現したことで、
坑道の開発に支障をきたすようになった
column2:
A hot spring town at the foot of Volden Mines.
It is famous for its strong connection to miners and weapon craftsmen from ancient times. In recent years, powerful enemies have appeared in the mines, causing disruptions to the development of the tunnels. The heart of this town is the Kinoza Mineral Springs, where people come to relax and soak.

column1:
鉱山の町キノザを象徴する大温泉
労働者から富裕層まで男女問わず広く愛される
レスタニア随一の保養地である。３種ある浴室は
それぞれ内装や泉質が異なり、誰もが一度は
最高級の湯を夢見る
column2:
The great hot spring that symbolizes the mining town of Kinoza, loved by both men and women, from laborers to the wealthy. 
It is the finest resort in Lestania. 
There are three types of baths, each with different interiors and spring qualities, and everyone dreams of experiencing the highest quality hot spring at least once.

column1:
自然洞窟を利用したゴブリン族のねぐら
《貪欲のギルスタン》を王とし、多くのゴブリンが
洞穴に出入りしている。王の蒐集癖のせいか
生き残りのためか、洞穴に住まうゴブリン達は
人間との対立を避けているようだ
column2:
Goblin tribe's lair, utilizing a natural cave.
With Gilstan, the King of Greed, leading, many goblins come and go from the cave. 
Perhaps due to the king's hoarding habit or for the sake of survival, the goblins living in the cave seem to avoid confrontation with humans.

column1:
ボルド鉱山とダウ渓谷の境には、南壁谷と
呼ばれる谷道があるが、その中ほどにあるのが
《南壁のひび》と呼ばれる洞窟である。採掘に
出向いた者がことごとく戻らなかったことから
キノザにより入り口は閉ざされた
column2:
Southern Wall Gorge, on the border between Volden Mines and Dowe Valley.
In the middle of that gorge is a cave known as the Southern Wall Fissure. Due to the fact that everyone who went to mine there never returned, the entrance was sealed by Kinoza.

column1:
レスタニア最大鉱山、中腹の坑道
最盛期には百人とも言われる鉱員が採掘に勤しん
でいたが、崩落と巨人の出現により閉山されて
いた。それでも良質鉱石の産地であることに
変わりなく、再開発を望む声は多い
column2:
Lestania's largest mine, the tunnel on the mountainside.
During its heyday, it was said that about a hundred miners worked diligently in the excavation.
However, due to collapses and the appearance of Giants, it was closed down.
Nevertheless, it remains a source of high-quality ore, and there are many voices hoping for its redevelopment.

column1:
ボルド小坑道へ続く山道。坑道に住む強力な
オーガ《坑道荒らし》の返り討ちに合い、派遣された
騎士団の骸が残されていることから、そう呼ばれて
いる。小坑道は採掘がまだ可能だが、現在は
近づく鉱員はほとんどいない
column2:
The mountain path continues towards the Volden Narrow Tunnels. 
It is called so because the remains of a knight from the dispatched order were left behind after being defeated by a powerful Ogre "Tunnel Thief" who resides in the tunnel. 
Although mining is still possible in the narrow tunnels, there are hardly any miners approaching them currently.

column1:
ボルドの野盗、ムジナ団がアジトにする廃坑道
長らく封鎖されていたものの、鍵が破壊された
らしく再び盗賊の活動が活発化してきた
身ぐるみ剥がされる覚悟がなければ
近づかない方がよいだろう
column2:
Volden's bandits, the Badger Gang, has made an abandoned mine its hideout.
Although it had long been sealed off, the lock has been broken.
It seems that the activities of the thieves have once again intensified.
If you are not prepared to be stripped of everything, it is best not to approach.

column1:
山頂の小堂が無人化して後、グリフィンが居付き
巣を作ってしまった。そこには、レスタニア各地から
巨鷲の「目に適ったモノ」が集められており、その
多くは人力では撤去できないが、主の不在を狙えば
思わぬ宝物が手に入る――かもしれない
column2:
After the summit chapel became unmanned, a Griffin settled in and made its nest there. 
The nest contains various items suitable to the Griffin's eyes, collected from all over Lestania. 
Many of these items cannot be removed by human force, but if one were to take advantage of the absence of the owner, they might unexpectedly obtain a treasure.

column1:
《ボルド大坑道》の最奥、地層の硬さにより掘削が
見送られた洞穴部。数々の問題を解決して再開発を
行おうとした矢先、不気味な噂が流れて鉱員が
逃げ出し、再び開発の手が中断されることとなった
column2:
In the depths of the Volden Large Tunnels, mining was halted due to the hardness of the earth layers. 
As they attempted to solve numerous problems and proceed with redevelopment, eerie rumors spread and the miners fled, causing the development to once again come to a halt.

column1:
キノザ近くに存在する元治水路
今は治水路としての機能はなく、鉱毒が溜まる
危険な場所になっている
向かうなら、毒への備えが必要だろう
column2:
Former flood control channel near Kinoza is a hazardous location. 
It no longer functions as a drainage channel and is now filled with toxic minerals. 
If you plan to go there, you will need to be prepared for the poison.

column1:
ボルド大坑道と同時期に開発された坑道
ここも以前は鉱員の出入りが多かったが
人喰い鬼が出現するようになり寂れてしまった
たびたび騎士団が派遣されているが
いまだ退治完了の報告はない
column2:
This tunnel was developed around the same time as the Volden Large Tunnels. 
In the past, there used to be many miners coming and going, but it has become desolate since man-eating demons started appearing. 
The knight order has been frequently dispatched, but there is still no report of completion of their task.

column1:
周辺を荒らす悪鬼たちが群れる岩窟
ホボリックの小鬼達と対立するゴブリン集団
のほか、凶悪な人喰い鬼もこの洞窟をねぐら
にしている
column2:
The evil demons that rampage in the surrounding areas flock to the cavern. 
In addition, there is a goblin group that opposes the Hobolic goblins. 
Furthermore, brutal man-eating demons also make this cave their lair.

column1:
ボルド大坑道で採掘が盛んだった頃
鉱員がダウ渓谷との連絡用に使っていた坑道
使われなくなって久しいものの、南壁谷の
道がなんらかの事情で塞がった場合は
唯一の交通路となる
column2:
During the time when mining was thriving in the Volden Large Tunnels, miners used this tunnel as a means of communication with Dowe Valley.
Although it has been unused for a long time, it serves as the only passage if the Southern Wall Gorge road becomes blocked due to any circumstances.

column1:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
ボルド鉱山の頂き近くにあり、キノザからもその
姿を見ることができる。まだ参拝者もいるが
巨鳥が近くに巣くってしまい、悩みの種と
なっている
column2:
In the past, there was a white dragon altar that was celebrated in various places. 
One of them is located near the peak of Volden Mines, and its presence can also be seen from Kinoza. 
There are still visitors, but a giant bird has built its nest nearby, causing troubles and becoming a source of worry.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《ボルド大坑道》の内部で発見された旧坑道
地熱の影響で坑内の気温が非常に高くなることが
あり、鉱員により早期に封鎖されていた
内部で希少な鉱石が採れるのではと推測されている
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Inside the "Volden Large Tunnels," an old tunnel was discovered.
Due to the influence of geothermal energy, the temperature inside the tunnel becomes extremely high,
and it was sealed off by miners early on.
It is speculated that rare minerals can be mined inside.

column1:
平原と山岳地帯の中ほどに位置する大渓谷
渓流と針葉樹林の茂る美しい景観が最大の魅力
自然だけではなく、旧白騎団の古城、見張り塔
など遺構も数多く存在し、かつてここが繁栄の地で
あった事を偲ばせる
column2:
A large valley located in the middle of a plain and mountainous region.
The most significant charm of this place lies in its beautiful landscape with flowing streams and lush coniferous forests. It's not only the natural beauty but also the numerous remnants of the old White Knights' castle, watchtowers, and other structures that evoke memories of the past prosperity of this area.

column1:
険しい渓谷にしがみつくように残された小村
かつて、ドリード城主が健在だった時代は賑わって
いたが、北部オーク軍の動きが活発化した頃から
強力な魔物の襲撃もあり、徐々に人が離れた
しかし、景観や古城に魅せられる探訪者は多い
column2:
Nestled in a treacherous ravine, a small village remains clinging on.
Once thriving in the days when Lord Dreed ruled, it gradually lost its inhabitants as the movements of the Northern Orc army intensified. Nevertheless, many visitors are still enchanted by the scenery and the ancient Dreed Castle.

column1:
ひょうきんな軽業師、チェスターが住む家
登ることと身ごなしにかけては卓越した
技能を誇る彼に師事すれば、《シーカー》
としてより高みを目指すことができるだろう
column2:
The house where the playful acrobat, Chester, lives.
If you study under him, who excels in climbing and agility, you will be able to aim for greater heights as a Seeker.

column1:
旧時代、ドリード城と周辺の警戒のため建てられた
監視塔。ダウが関所で封鎖される前は、騎士団詰め所
として前時代と同じく利用されていたが、侵入した
オーク軍との一戦により壊滅、再び廃墟と化した
現在は、死肉に集ったハーピーが占拠している
column2:
In the olden days, a surveillance tower was built to guard Dreed Castle and its surroundings. 
Before Dowe was sealed off at the checkpoint, it was used as a knights' headquarters, just like in the previous era. 
However, it was destroyed and turned into ruins again due to a battle with the invading Orc army. 
Currently, it is occupied by Harpies gathering dead flesh.

column1:
ダウ渓谷の滝近くにある浅瀬。ここはもともと
サルファーリザードの棲息地帯だが、とりわけ
大きく強力な個体が確認された。この個体
《タイガーテール・サルファー》については
特に注意する必要がある
column2:
There is a shallow area near the waterfall in Dowe Valley. 
This place was originally a habitat for Sulfur Saurians, but particularly large and powerful individuals have been confirmed. Special attention is needed for one individual specifically, the "Sulfur Tiger-Tail"

column1:
崖上にある自然洞窟
各種鉱石の採掘場として人の手が入った
時期もあるものの、過去に恐ろしい魔物
の住処となったことで封鎖されていた
column2:
On the cliff, there is a natural cave that has been used by human hands as a mining site for various ores.
It has been sealed off due to becoming a dwelling place for terrifying creatures in the past.

column1:
ドリード城近くの地下墓地
城が白衛騎士団の本拠地であった頃、処罰された
罪人や獄死した者を葬っていた場所であり
今なお重く冷たい空気が漂っている
column2:
Near Dreed Castle is an underground cemetery. 
It was a place where convicted criminals and those who died in prison were buried when the castle served as the headquarters of the White Knight Order. 
Even now, a heavy and chilling atmosphere lingers.

column1:
ダウ渓谷東部、最も標高の高い崖上に、石象の並ぶ
奇妙な空間がある。そこに、昔ジンゲンに甚大な
被害を出したスフィンクスが再び姿を現した
《妖歌のローレライ》と呼ばれるこのスフィンクスを
確認した際は、急ぎ手を打つ必要がある
column2:
In the eastern part of the Dowe Valley, on the highest cliff, there is a strange space lined with stone statues. 
There, the sphinx that caused enormous damage to Jingen in the past has reappeared.
This sphinx, known as the "Demon Songtress Lorelei" must be dealt with urgently if it is confirmed!

column1:
ダウ渓谷、カタコンベ付近の木立
逃げ惑う姿勢のまま石と化した人影が木陰に
多数紛れているのが発見され、ジンゲンの
村人を恐怖に陥れた
column2: Numerous figures, frozen like statues in a posture of fleeing, were discovered hidden among the trees near the Catacombs in Dowe Valley. This discovery plunged the villagers of Jingen into fear.

column1:
廃墟の地下食糧庫。腐った食べ物を求めて
不死者がぞろぞろ入り込んだという噂があり
ジンゲンの民は気味悪がっている
column2:
A ruined underground supply store.
Rumors have circulated that undead creatures have swarmed in, seeking rotten food. 
The people of Jingen are feeling uneasy about it.

column1:
渓谷の一軒家の裏手にある井戸
まだ掘削中らしく、水源には届いて
いないようだ
column2:
There is a well in the backyard of the Lone House in the Valley.
It seems that they are still in the process of digging, and it appears that they have not yet reached the water source.

column1:
ドリード城にほど近い廃墟の地下ワイン庫
かつては城に献上するワインが集められて
いたそうだが、現在は見る影もない
column2:
The underground wine cellar, located near Dreed Castle, is now nothing more than a ruin. 
It used to store wines that were once offered to the castle, but now there is no sign of its former glory.

column1:
廃墟傍にある古井戸
なぜ「閉ざされた」と呼ばれているかに
ついては詳しく知られていない
column2: The old well near the ruins is called "closed," but the detailed reasons are not well known.

column1:
ドリード監視塔の地下、かつて白衛騎士団
の詰め所だった跡地
ハイデルに神殿が築かれてからもダウを守る
要所だったが、二十年以上前オークに攻められ
無人になった。今も騎士の骸が彷徨っている
column2:
Underground of the Dreed Watchtower, the site of the former Headquarters of the White Knight Order.
It was a key point protecting Dowe even after the temple was built in Heidell, but it was attacked by orcs over 20 years ago and
left uninhabited. 
The remains of the knights still wander around.

column1:
ダウ渓谷、一軒家に近い崖際にある坑道
中には鉱員のなれの果てや野盗、小鬼
などが住みついている
ところどころ、爆薬があれば破壊できる
岩壁が存在する
column2:
In the Dowe Valley, there is a tunnel located near the cliff, close to a house.
Inside, miners, bandits, and small demons, among others, have taken up residence.
There are occasional rock walls that can be destroyed with explosives.

column1:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
渓谷深くにひっそりとたたずんでいるが
風景と相まって廃墟化した今も美しさが残る
column2:
In the olden days, this was one of the altars of the White Dragon, which was celebrated in various places. 
It stands quietly, deep in the valley, but even now, amidst its ruins, it retains its beauty, blending with the landscape.

column1:
ダウ渓谷にそびえ立つ古城廃墟
３００年前は騎士団長が城主を務めレスタニアの
守りを担っていたが、白竜が墜ちた後に捨てられ
今に至る。内部には住みついた魔物だけでなく
旧時代の遺物も多く残されているらしい
column2:
Standing tall in the Dowe Valley is the ancient castle ruin.
300 years ago, it was the stronghold of the knight commander who protected Lestania.
However, it was abandoned after the fall of the White Dragon, and it remains deserted to this day. 
Inside, not only are there lurking demons, but also numerous relics from the past era are said to be preserved.

column1:
ダウ平原中央に存在する水路跡
内部には川の水が流れ込んでおり、同時に周囲
に生息するサルファーリザードも多数
入りこんでいる
column2:
Located in the central part of the Dowe Plains, there is a trace of a water channel. 
Inside, the water from the river flows in, and at the same time, there are also many Sulfur Saurians living in the surrounding area.

column1:
かつて、ドリード城主がドリード監視塔と城を
繋ぐために作ったと言われる地下道
そのため入口の一つは塔の近くに、もう一つは
城のどこかと繋がっているらしい
罪人の墓地としても利用されたようだ
column2:
It is said that the underground passage was once created by the Lord of Dreed Castle to connect the Dreed Watchtower and the castle. 
As a result, one entrance is said to be near the tower, and the other one is apparently connected somewhere in the castle. 
It appears that it was also used as a graveyard for criminals.

column1:
かつてドリード城からハイデルへの物資搬入
などに使われていた地下通路
ドリード城が捨てられると同時に封鎖され
現在は朽ちた物資もそのままになっている
column2: Once used for the transportation of goods from Dreed Castle to Heidell, an underground passage now lies sealed since the abandonment of the castle, leaving the decaying supplies untouched.

column1:
ドリード城内、《地下通用口》から繋がる水路
もとはドリード城と河川の運搬路を繋ぐ連絡路
であったようだが、城の牢で獄死した者の骨や
入りこんだ魔物、瘴気が溜まり本来の機能は
失われて久しい
column2:
An underground waterway connected to the "Underground Side Entrance" within Dreed Castle.
Originally, it served as a passage linking the castle and the river for transportation purposes. However, it has long lost its original function due to the accumulation of bones of those who died in the castle's prison, as well as the presence of invading monsters and miasma.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ダウ渓谷の北にある関所のすぐ裏手にある井戸
何年も前に井戸としての機能を失い、不便な場所に
あったこともあって、修理もされずに放置されていた
いつしかその存在すら忘れられていた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】 Door</COL>
There is a well located just behind the Checkpoint to the north of Dowe Valley. 
It lost its function as a well many years ago and was left unattended due to its inconvenient location. 
Its existence had been forgotten over time.

column1:
ミスリウ森林奥地の湿地林
イニアス湖を中心としたこの森は、リンウッド周辺
とはまた別の表情を見せる。湖の周囲には神秘的
な遺跡が点在し、ここが人とは異なる者の生活圏で
あったことを今に伝えている
column2:
The Mysree Forest, located deep in the wetland forest, 
presents a different facade from the surroundings of Lynwood.
Mysterious ruins are scattered around the lake, 
telling us that this place was once a habitat for beings different from humans.

column1:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
ミスリウ森林深部を見守る管理者がおり
森深くを訪れる者にとっては大切な
憩いの場所である
column2:
In the old days, there was a shrine of the White Dragon that was celebrated in various places. 
In the deep part of Mysree Forest, there is a guardian who watches over it, and it is an important place for visitors who delve into the depths of the forest to find solace and relaxation.

column1:
凄腕のマタギ、イヴァンが住む山小屋
彼の腕は《ハンター》としてレスタニア随一
であると、知る人ぞ知る有名人
だが気難しい性格のためか、戦技を教えて
もらえる者はまれらしい
column2:
Ivan, a skilled hunter, resides in a mountain cabin. 
His prowess as a Hunter is renowned throughout Lestania. 
However, due to his difficult personality, it is rare for anyone to receive instruction in his combat techniques.

column1:
森林奥地へ続く山道の崩落が除かれた
これで、さらに深い樹林に踏み入ることも可能に
なった。奥地は秘境のため、十分準備をして
向かうべきだろう
column2:
The collapsed mountain path that leads to the depths of the forest has been cleared away. 
With this, it is now possible to venture further into the dense woods. 
As the interior is an uncharted territory, it would be advisable to make thorough preparations before heading there.

column1:
森林深部、イニアス湖の北岸に密猟者がキャンプを
構えている。たちの悪いことに、密猟者が獲物とする
のは獣だけではなく、狩人や旅人も含むという
不意の狙撃に合わぬよう、十分な警戒が必要だ
column2:
In the deep part of the forest, poachers have set up a camp on the north shore of Lake Inias. 
Unfortunately, the poachers target not only animals as their prey, but also hunters and travelers. 
To avoid unexpected sniper attacks, it is necessary to be vigilant and cautious.

column1:
イニアス湖西側、浅瀬と草地の混じったこの場所は
ブルーニュートが多く出没する。その中で、近年
強力な電撃を纏った変異種が現れるようになった
これら《コバルトニュート》と遭遇した場合
討伐が推奨されている
column2:
On the western side of Lake Inias, in this area mixed with shallow waters and meadows, there are many Blue Newts. 
Among them, in recent years, a mutated species that is enveloped in powerful electric shocks has started to appear. 
In case of an encounter with these "Cobalt Newts," it is recommended to subdue them.

column1:
住居跡らしき神秘的な遺跡
廃墟と化してなお、緑生い茂るたたずまいは
壮麗さを残している。内部には不思議な装置が
あり、奥に進むには仕組みの理解を要する
column2:
Mysterious ruins that resembles a place of residence.
Even in its state of being in ruins, it retains its splendid beauty, with lush greenery surrounding it. 
Inside, there are peculiar devices, and understanding their mechanism is necessary to proceed further.

column1:
霊泉のテラス深部に純白の獅子が現れた
その姿は大理石のように淡く輝き、瞳と口は血と
魔力で赤く濡れているという。フォレストゴブリン
が聖獣として崇めるこの白獅子が村に出てゆく前に
何とか対処しなければならない
column2:
A pure white lion appeared in the depths of the Sacred Spring Terrace. 
Its figure was pale and radiant like marble, and its eyes and mouth were said to be wet with blood and magic, creating a red hue. 
This white lion, revered by the Forest Goblins as a sacred beast, must be dealt with before it leaves for the village.

column1:
いつ存在し、いつ滅びたかも不明な廃村。村の
跡地は緑に覆われ、今や完全に人の気配はない
だが、付近で人のすすり泣きのような声を聞いた、
怪しい人影を見た、といった噂が狩人の間で
囁かれているらしい
column2:
A deserted village whose existence and demise are uncertain. 
The site of the village is now covered in greenery, and there is no trace of human presence whatsoever. 
However, there are rumors circulating among hunters that they have heard voices resembling a person crying and have seen suspicious figures nearby.

column1:
森の南、ディナン山道への途中にトロールの寝所
がある。かつて覚者に撃退されしばらく姿を見せな
かった巨人ヨトンがどうやら戻ってきたらしい
人を憎み襲うこの巨人は非常に危険なため
近くを通る時は最大限の警戒が必要だ
column2:
On the way to the Dinnan Mountain Road in the southern forest, there is a troll's resting place. 
The giant Jotun, who was once repelled by an Arisen and had not been seen for a while, seems to have returned. 
This giant, who hates humans and attacks them on sight, is extremely dangerous, so maximum caution is necessary when passing by.

column1:
イニアス湖南側、《霧幻のテラス》付近にて
霞んだような人影に声をかけられたという噂が
続出するようになった。声に応じようとしても
返答が返ってくることはなく、その不気味さ故に
近くを通る者はさらに減少したという
column2:
At Lake Inias on the southern side, near the Misty Illusion Terrace, rumors have been spreading that people have been approached by a figure that seems to be shrouded in mist. 
Despite trying to respond to the voice, there is no reply, which has only increased the eerieiness and caused even fewer people to pass by.

column1:
緑に侵食された廃墟の地下倉庫
密猟者が、食糧の貯蔵や寝食に潜むことが
ある。近くには彼らのキャンプもあるため
可能であれば近づかないほうがよい
column2:
Underground storehouse in the ruins, overrun by greenery.
Poachers may hide here for food storage and rest.
There is also their camp nearby, so it's best to avoid approaching if possible.

column1:
ミスリウ森林深部、西側にある古い遺跡
内部もまた緑で覆われ、野獣や森小人が
現在の主となっている
column2:
In the deep part of Mysree Forest, there is an ancient ruin on the west side. 
Its interior is also covered in greenery, and animals and forest spirits have become its current inhabitants.

column1:
ミスリウ森林深部、南端にある遺跡
特に様々な森の獣が集まる場所であるが、
その理由は遺跡内に存在する霊泉の活力
によるものであるそうだ。また、その奥は
恐るべき白獅子の住処であったという
column2:
In the deep depths of Mysree Forest, located at the southern end, there is an ancient ruin. 
It is particularly known as a gathering place for various forest creatures. 
The reason for this is said to be the vitality of the sacred spring that exists within the ruins. 
Furthermore, it is said that deep inside, there was the dwelling of a fearsome white lion.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ深部、イニアス湖の南で新たに発見
された森民の遺跡。湖からくる湿気のせいか
白く靄がかかっている。靄は遺跡の外にまで
漏れ出し、全ての輪郭を朧にしている
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】Door</COL>
A newly discovered forest tribal ruin in the depths of Mysree, located south of Lake Inias.
Perhaps due to the moisture from the lake, a white mist hangs in the air, obscuring the outlines of everything, even leaking beyond the boundaries of the ruin.

column1:
レスタニア最奥、樹海に閉ざされた秘境
樹齢数百年にのぼる巨木が生い茂るこの森は
以前エルフ族が住み、その都を築いた場所である
森の名もまた、エルフ族の言語が元であると
言われている
column2:
In the deepest part Lestania, a hidden paradise secluded in the forest.
This forest, over hundreds of years old, is densely populated by towering ancient trees.
It used to be the home of the Elves, where they built their capital city.
The name of the forest is also said to originate from the language of the elves.

column1:
ディナンの森唯一の住民が暮らす遺跡
エルフの文化や戦闘術を学びたい者に
とっては特に重要な拠点となるだろう
column2:
The only inhabited site in the Deenan Forest.
An especially important base for those who want to learn about Elven culture and the art of warfare.

column1:
エルフの言葉で“森の淀み”を意味するこの場所
には、汚れた土や不純な精気が溜まりやすい
という。それらは時に形を持ち魔物化する
ため、見かけた場合は討伐し浄化したほうがよい
column2:
In the Elven language, this place means "the stillness of the forest." 
It is prone to accumulate unclean soil and impure energy. 
Occasionally, these can take shape and turn into enemies, so it is advisable to defeat and cleanse them when encountered.

column1:
エルフ族の大規模な住居跡
いくつもの広場や部屋で構成されており、相当数の
エルフがここで暮らしていたことを物語っている
遺跡内部には、特別な水を湛えた井戸が
あるという
column2:
The remains of a large dwelling of the Elven race.
Consists of multiple plazas and rooms, telling the story of a significant number of Elves living here. Inside the ruins, there is said to be a well containing special water.

column1:
ディナン南部を意味する河岸一帯
銀色の毛を持つ凶暴な猿鬼が徘徊するように
なったようだ
その銀の猿鬼は、エルフ族が森でもっとも
出会いたくない魔物筆頭であったらしい
column2:
The riverbank area that signifies the southern part of Deenan.
Seems to have become a place where a ferocious monkey demon with silver fur wanders.
It seems that this silver monkey demon is the foremost creature that the Elves did not want to encounter in the forest.

column1:
ディナン低地には美しい霊水を湛えた泉がある
その生命力に魅かれ、度々肉体を持たぬ者が
彷徨い出ては命ある者に襲い掛るという
不自然に白い人影を見かけた場合、泉には
近寄らぬほうがいいだろう
column2:
There is a spring in the lowlands of Deenan that holds beautiful sacred water. 
Drawn to its vitality, beings without physical forms often wander and attack those who have life. 
If you happen to see a strangely white figure, it's best to stay away from the spring.

column1:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》一角にあるという
住居群の一つ。広大な区画らしいが、長らく閉ざ
されており、内部がどうなっているかは不明
出入り口が閉ざされたのには、なにか理由が
あるのかもしれない
column2:
One of a group of dwellings located within a corner of the Erte Deenan, the elven capital. 
It appears to be a vast area, but it has been closed off for a long time, and the interior remains unknown. There may be a reason for the entrance to be sealed.

column1:
森の中でも有数の大樹がそびえ立つ広場
まるで大樹に守られているかのような静かな
空間だったが、突如この場で暴れはじめた
エントが確認され、状況は急変しつつある
column2:
In a clearing where one of the largest trees in the forest stands tall, it was a peaceful space as if protected by the great tree.
However, suddenly, an Ent, a rare sight in this area, started rampaging, and the situation is rapidly changing.

column1:
かつて森の民が使っていたディナン深層林と
ミスリウ森林を繋ぐ自然洞窟
長らく閉ざされていたため、内部が
どうなっているか知る者はいない
column2:
A natural cave that connects the deep forests of Deenan and Mysree, which were once used by the people of the forest. 
It has been closed off for a long time, so no one knows what it looks like inside.

column1:
ディナン深層林、南西にあるエルフ族の住居跡
聖なる泉、エルネア・スプリングに近い穏やかな
地のはずが、今や他と同じく野獣の住処に
なっている
column2:
The remains of the Elves dwelling in Deenan Woods, located in the southwest. 
What used to be a peaceful land near the sacred Elnea Spring has now become a dwelling for wild animals, just like everywhere else.

column1:
巨木に覆われ、緑の葉影が美しい遺跡
遺跡内に生えた巨木の中には、入る者
を拒みエント化したものもあるという
column2:
Covered by towering trees, the ruins are adorned with the beautiful shade of green leaves.
It is said that some of the gigantic trees that grow within the ruins have become Ents, refusing entry to anyone who approaches them.

column1:
南部、水辺近くにあるエルフ族の住居跡
かつては水面に映る月が美しい場所であると
エルフ達の人気も高かったようだが、
今やその面影はない。水の運用に関しては
最も進んだ設備を備えていたらしい
column2:
Ruins of the Elves residence near the water's edge in the southern region. 
It used to be a beautiful place where the moon reflected on the water was highly admired by the Elves. 
However, now there is no trace of that beauty. 
It seems they had the most advanced facilities for managing water.

column1:
エルフ族が築いた壮麗なる都
しかし、エルフ族が姿を消して以降美しさはその
ままに、ゆっくり時と共に森に呑まれつつある
彼らの神秘的で精緻な技は、今なおエルテ・ディナン
のいたるところに遺されている
column2:
A magnificent city built by the Elves.
Even after the disappearance of the Elves, the beauty remains, gradually being swallowed by the forest with the passing of time.
Their mystical and exquisite craftsmanship is still left everywhere in Erte Deenan.

column1:
どこかにあるという、エルフ達が築いた
美しい地下水路
遺跡で見つかった書物に存在が記されていた
column2: According to a book found in the ruins, there is a beautiful underground waterway built by the elves somewhere.

column1:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》内にある
区画の一つ。蝶印のついた鍵で閉ざされて
いるため、立ち入るのであればまずは
鍵の入手が必要になる
column2:
Located within the Elven capital, "Erte Deenan," this is a section of the city.
